You are more than welcome to check out our FAQ for more info and/or alternatives :) https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-', 'modified': '2022-01-26T14:21:58Z'}

review:
I was the type who was always skeptical of any sort of self care, especially anything that seemed spiritual in nature. I started Headspace just on a curious whim and now I‚Äôve been using it almost every day for over 2 years. 
You start to change your perspective on what is important when you consciously sit in silence every day.  It seems silly but this app has been one of many tools to help me find a new appreciation for the present moment and has actually changed my life for the better. 
If you haven‚Äôt, I highly recommend giving this app a try.
title: Best Source of Self Care

review: Tl;dr: meditation and the methods used are great, the app is poor for tracking ongoing goals and features.  I enjoy headspace content and recently re-subscribed after a long period off.  Many of the new features on the app are not really to my taste or needs, but I hope someone enjoys them.  The frustrating part is that past meditation is annoying have to find chronologically, and finding a feature takes you directly to a session and not the enclosing program or course, so its incredibly difficult to navigate the structure repeatedly.  I also would think by now there would be a filter by teacher/voice for all sessions.  Hoping for improvements.
title: Poor App navigation and recall
developerResponse: {'id': 33404380, 'body': "Thank you for your review, we're sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with our recent updates, and we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.", 'modified': '2022-11-28T11:36:53Z'}

review: I am a licensed professional counselor, and I cannot say enough good things about headspace.  It is an excellent app!  There are many mindfulness apps out there, and many various free resources, but none offer the clarity and ease of use that is provided by headspace.  Headspace is clearly organized and user friendly!  It is not too overwhelming, but at the same time has a meditation for almost any need.  I encourage all of my clients to use headspace!  I wish there was an affiliate or referral program, because I literally tell everybody about it.  Keep it up! And THANK YOU!
title: The best thing you can do for your mental health and wellness

review: I am confused on why the app developers decided to only make this a subscription app. Before, they had free meditation courses that were super helpful to me as someone with anxiety and depression. Then one day they completely changed it, and all my previous courses are under lock and key. I‚Äôm a college student, so I can not afford these pricy courses. I‚Äôm super sad, because I absolutely love headspace and wish I could have a subscription, but it‚Äôs not even the fact that you can‚Äôt do anything, it‚Äôs the fact that you used to be able to and now can‚Äôt. It seemed more like a cold business move than a company actually caring about the people it serves. Extremely disappointed. I still look forward to when I will be able to afford a subscription, but I feel hurt by this decision
title: Great app, still upset

review: I have been meditating on my own for about a month now and my experience has been mixed. Some days I have intense focus, others I can‚Äôt shake my worries and responsibilities. Today, I downloaded the Headspace app because I thought I could benefit from some guidance. After a short 5 minute guided session, I was almost in tears. My teacher, Dora, effortlessly explained and guided me through my meditation and I was shocked at how easy it is to relax and be at peace; something we all need. Thank you, Headspace. Those 5 minutes of peace were priceless. Please try this app, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.
title: Just Wonderful

review: My school is providing Headspace accounts for students. I‚Äôve been using it almost every day for a couple of months. Each meditation, whether it be a "course" or a stand-alone meditation starts with 1 or 2 sentences on the topic, and those sentences aren‚Äôt even helpful, and the other 10 minutes are exactly the same as every other meditation on the app. "Start with the eyes open, take some deep breaths, on the next exhale close your eyes. Starting at the top of your head, scan down your body, etc, etc." Nothing at all addressing the topic of the meditation you chose.  This tells me that not a huge amount of effort is going into this app to make it worth the price. Try Insight Timer. Even with the free version you get a thousand meditations. All different. On topic.
title: Same meditation literally. Every. Single. Time.

review:
Invest in your self, this app has changed my life with the relationship I have with everyone around me. Please don‚Äôt just scroll by this app actually try it. Plus the you can try it for free!

**Only one thing I‚Äôll add to this over the years I‚Äôve watched certain things in society change and I‚Äôd hoped that this would remain a safe place for me to stay away from all of those things so I was sad to see their inclusion of different material and even phrasing of words to be more ‚Äúinclusive‚Äù. Again great app I still use it I‚Äôd just hoped it would remain a safe place for me away from things of that nature.**
title: Don‚Äôt just look over this app

I subscribed to this app last week at the monthly rate to try it out. Then last night it would not let me access my paid account without ‚Äúsubscribing‚Äù again, but this time charged me the annual amount with no trial time to figure out how to fix the issue. review:
Headspace changed the way I look at anxiety. I like how Andy gives you understanding of anxiety before each meditation. It really makes a difference for someone who doesn‚Äôt understand what anxiety really is.
I feel like 10 min of Headspace in the morning gives me some kind of protection. Almost like nothing bad can happen. 
I like animations, especially The Blue Sky‚Äù as it shows everything we need to understand to feel better. 
I‚Äôm so grateful for Headspace and cannot thank you enough. I‚Äôm also grateful for Andy‚Äôs calm voice and the way he guides me through meditation.
title: Headspace is the best

review: Found Headspace when it first came out. Whenever I come back to it I am reminded why I love it. The interface continues to get more robust while simultaneously being easier to use. It makes it very easy for a busy parent to integrate even a few minutes of meditation into your life. I found first thing in the morning even for a few minutes changes my attitude all day. That is worth every bit of the cost of this app. I wish I could write Andy a personal letter and let him know that he & his team know that they have truly changed my life.
title: Not even kidding

review: I have unfortunately been on a divorce journey. Those who‚Äôve been there know the chaos our mind and body endure. Headspace was a lifesaver, and continues to be. Through the guided meditations I was able to sleep again ‚ù§Ô∏è. Starting my day with a meditation has helped me to calm my raising mind, reducing the raging anxiety. I am also a teacher struggling with this Covid culture. It is heartbreaking as well. Headspace has allowed me to put those worries into perspective as well as to share the meditations with my students. Thank you Headspace and Andy, you have helped me, and my students, more than you can imagine.
title: Grounded

review:
Is that Headspace really helps me gain my focus and learn to look at all the possibilities in life. I‚Äôm learning to be calmer with my brother and my friends. Now whenever I get angry with them I either scream in a pillow or walk away and take a break for a little bit. But I don‚Äôt always do it though. And that‚Äôs where Headspace comes in.  

When I meditate in the morning it gives me a positive and calm outlook on the day. I‚Äôve already recommended this to an angry friend and now she‚Äôs happy and calmly handling her situations. So that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm recommending this for you! So get Headspace if you want to live a long, happy, calm life.

P.S. that pillow that I sometimes scream into, POOR PILLOW!üòùüòÜ
title: What I think‚Ä¶

review: I started using headspace a year ago to begin my meditation journey. I enjoy the levels of pro, helping guide me to require less guidance. It holds me accountable, when I see my streak it makes me want to continue on. Seeing the minutes I‚Äôve meditated over the course of using headspace has motivated me. I‚Äôm now at the point where 10 minutes feels like 2, and I‚Äôm able to finally calm my mind and my thoughts to create peacefulness. I listened to a podcast on the founder and it is amazing the work that has been created. Thank you so much for making your idea a reality!
title: Best meditation app

review: Using headspace consistently has helped me so much. It takes discipline to stick with it, but it‚Äôs 110% worth it. I‚Äôve drastically improved my ability to sleep since using headspace for over a year now, after 14 years of insomnia. I‚Äôm more aware of how I‚Äôm feeling and what I‚Äôm thinking at any given moment, and this helps me respond more appropriately to situations. My focus has improved too. It‚Äôs not a magic wand that will make problems disappear, but the biggest problem with problems is how we view them and headspace taught me how to view things differently.
title: Life changing

review: I got this app because I started jr high and it‚Äôs been really hard. I‚Äôve been experiencing some pretty bad anxiety than just a few days into having this app I noticed a change in my mood and how happy I was I wasn‚Äôt as anxious and I learned how to control my breath a lot easier. This app is so amazing it really helps me to stay calm and to take a few minutes to just relax and try not to think of all the worry I have going on in my life. The meditation is very helpful it just gets you in the right mindset and it is a comfortable relaxing space. I just love this app!!!!

review: I have tried to meditate for years, but never could develop a routine. When I found myself anxious and wasting hours on my phone to distract myself, I heard about this app (sounded completely ridiculous to buy an app to use your phone less, but there it is). And from the beginning, the change was immediate. From starting the day, to taking a break, to falling asleep this has been transforming. I finally understand meditating and have a daily morning routine. I‚Äôm not perfect but I can see easy ways to focus and decrease stress dramatically. It‚Äôs worth it!

I love this so much! It‚Äôs the best app ever! Haters back off. I love this so much! Aaahhh I can‚Äôt stop using this app. Ok I will stop saying how much I love this. One suggestion. Can you make more emojis? Thank you other then that I love it.

review: A colleague urged me to try mindfulness through Headspace because it had worked so well for him and I was sharing my own frustrations with my scattered mind with him. That was almost two years ago. I have missed days more than once, but I then do it the next day and the day after that and so on to reset my routine. Now I can feel myself able to stay calmer and to recognize the signs when my mind is running off. I can usually call it back by focusing on my breathing. So it works for me and I feel better. What more could I ask for?
title: The practice does matter

review: Back in April 2020, I‚Äôve been under quarantine and been seeing my mental health to decline, thanks to repressed memories of accidents and my Dad‚Äôs harsh punishments. (He‚Äôs a jerk, but I still love him.) When commercials for this app started to pop up back in Fall of 2020, I‚Äôve been thinking this is a great idea. Almost a week ago, I downloaded it after I had a troubling time with my homework. I gotta say it really helps. I‚Äôve been feeling slightly better. Andy is a great coach to help me get back into happy Daniel again. Headspace might be my #1 favorite app of all time. 5 stars! Definitely recommended to those whose mental health is on the decline!
title: Thank you, Headspace!

review: recently returned after having been a subscriber a few years ago and have been pleasantly surprised by changes and new content added since then. I especially like that there are now several different guides to choose from for most exercises. It really helps keep things from feeling too repetitive, which actually got a bit distracting after a while last time around. Now when I get that feeling I can simply switch to another guide and the exercises feel brand new.
title: great updates since last time i tried

review: I have tried so many apps for my anxiety and constant worrying that has been going away ever since I started using Headspace, it is the best app I have ever used for my anxiety. It has so many different things you can use if you have a mental illness you need help controlling, you can even use the app if you just need it to take a breath, meditate, if you have trouble falling asleep or waking up in the middle of the night, yoga, workouts and there‚Äôs always more to explore with headspace I recommend getting this app for any of those reasons.
title: Most useful app I‚Äôve ever used 5/5‚≠êÔ∏è

review: I love this app and everything they‚Äôre building with it and the purpose behind it. It does have possibly hundreds of different meditations and sounds and things you can do, but everything seems to be along the same procedure. For sleep, I‚Äôd love some progressive tensing and relaxing. I‚Äôd love some depression or ADHD content. Other than that, they have several different teachers you can listen to. I like Dora üíú. They have Star Wars meditation, Pride based meditation, meditation for finding Black Joy. They have a ton of really cool stuff and I will continue to use some of my meager income to support this and have it support me back.
title: I‚Äôd like a little more variety

review: There are lots of ways to try meditation‚Äîso this app wasn‚Äôt my first time with that.  Although their teachers are stellar, I love Headspace because the app‚Äôs wholistic design makes it so easy to integrate mindfulness into my day to day life. Whether I want some quick breathwork, or a month-long meditation class, or an hour of focus music, or a cool video to learn something new, the folks behind app have mindfulness down to a T. Headspace has opened me up to a whole new part of myself. Through meditation, yes. But also through all the other small kinds of mindfulness.
title: Worth every penny

review: This is a great app that makes mediation so much easier than it has ever been before, whether I tried it on my own, or with a group. Thanks to a newspaper article on Jimmy Fallon that said he used Headspace to help him meditate! When I read that, I knew I had to try it! All my creative juices often keep me from meditating, but with this app, it teaches me how to embrace my thoughts - and breathe. üôè This is a wonderful, non-judgmental approach to meditation. The morning ‚Äúwake up‚Äù videos are great! No matter what time of day I listen to/watch them! So fun to have Kevin Hart talk to me about once a week!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
title: I'm Finally Meditating!

review: I recently dived into Buddhism and for anyone who‚Äôs familiar with it knows how important meditating daily, throughout the day is. I attempted meditating on my own, but since this is a skill that requires practice to become better‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs hard to attempt it blindly with no instructions. Headspace sets the mood and makes it extremely easy to follow along. There‚Äôs also plenty of other great features to this app, not just meditation. I did the free trial, only expecting to get the hang of mediation then i‚Äôd cancel but no‚Ä¶ I guarantee you it‚Äôs worth the money and I use it all the time.
title: amazing way to learn meditation!

review: Last year I started using Headspace again after the death of my nephew and also my best friend of 30 years as well. Covid isolationism is hard too. I have been doing meditation for many years and yoga for more. But this app brought me back and guided me through the grief process and all that goes with it. My sleep is improved and I‚Äôm feeling more joy than ever. It‚Äôs worth it if you commit to using it a few times a day or at least daily. I have tried all the mindfulness apps and Headspace and Buddahfy are the very best.
title: Got me through the worst time of my life

review: Whether you are looking to build a habit of meditating daily, or need that occasional peace, or just looking for 5 minutes wherever you can, this app has helped me develop and build something I‚Äôve used throughout my day. If I‚Äôm stressed at work I take a second to breath and ground myself using techniques I learned here, I‚Äôve used it to help me fall asleep, and I used it especially after therapy sessions when I need to just love myself. It has been such a useful tool, even though I‚Äôm not regular it encourages me to keep trying to make it more of a u conscious habit. This is a great investment and worth the subscription!
title: Moments of peace

review: I have found Headspace to be more helpful than any therapist I‚Äôve been to or pill I‚Äôve taken (and there have been plenty). I wish someone would‚Äôve helped me with emotional regulation prior to finding Headspace as an adult. Being able to pause, and redirect my attention (as needed) is indispensable to healthy living; I view it as important as exercise and stretching. I regularly use Headspace Basics course while working with my patients as an occupational therapist. I bought a lifetime membership years ago and have no regrets. It‚Äôs no quick fix, but it works.
title: Integral to my mental health

review: The service is OK. I tried using it for a while but eventually found it not especially helpful to me. I know others like it and get value from it. When I decided to stop it, however, I found that they have made shutting off auto-renewal extraordinarily difficult. Given the high level of development of their app, I can only assume this is intentional. I have wanted to shut it off for two or three years, but it is extremely difficult to stop their auto-renewal and I just keep getting charged 70$ every year for something I don‚Äôt use. I would dissuade others from giving them your credit card info unless you are really sure about using this.
title: Feels kind of scammy when you try to stop using it

review: Headspace was the first time I‚Äôve truly learned the techniques for mediation, and thus have stuck with it. The basics course was a great starting point for learning meditation and also a safe space to feel okay that it is tough getting started! Couldn‚Äôt recommend the app more for anyone struggling with anxious/ running thoughts, those feeling like there‚Äôs never enough time in the day, or struggle with sleeping. All these were part of my life and I can really say meditation has helped with all 3 of those issues!
title: What everyone could use to get started with meditation‚Äô

review: Pre pandemic I was clueless about focusing inward or being in the moment‚Ä¶ I was always on to the next task , thinking about past or future, anticipating people‚Äôs actions and spending a lot of time judging. 776 straight days later I am able to navigate life in a calmer manner , the death of a loved one and a health scare were a testament to my new ability to not project and to be able to grieve in a healthy manner . I used to think people who meditated were superficial and now I realize they are truly present . Thank you for giving me an opportunity for a contented appreciative life
title: Headspace for Health

review: Most of your narrators have soothing voices but for some the pace at which they speak seems a bit choppy. I particularly enjoy Simon and the stories he recites. His voice is the most comforting to me and the narrative of his stories the most appealing. I am a retired educator and there are nights when I have difficulty clearing my mind of information or musical lyrics from a recent song. A friend who is a psychologist recommended Headspace, and though it is a bit spendy, it works for me. Thank you for your services! I will continue to explore the other offerings you provide.
title: Soothing sounds and voices

review: I have found this app to be a perfect companion for new and seasoned meditators alike. You are offered meditations as short as 3 minutes up to 20 minutes for most meditations offered with a section that offers guided, semi guided or unguided timed meditations up to 120 minutes. The instructors explain the lesson/goal at the beginning of the meditation to give you a good foundation especially in their basics course. The way they guide you through the meditation helps you stay focused rather than get distracted by an explanation in the middle of a guided meditation which can derail your focus.
title: Favorite meditation app!

review:
This app genuinely helps me personally deal with overwhelming mental issues I am dealing with. Anxiety and Panic attacks have been a big one. They have SO many courses to choose from. 

If i had to make one recommendation, I LOVE Eves voices and have always connected with female guided counselors more. I would like to see Eve voice the SOS small segments as I use that one a lot. Andy is great as well but I can always meditate better when guided by a female. Once again this app is an amazing service that truly works. I could go on and on‚Ä¶.
title: Can‚Äôt even find the words to describe how grateful I am for this service

review:
I did not believe in meditation and ‚Äúheadspace‚Äù I have had a very rough last couple of years with family and commitments, let alone pandemic like everyone else. I found myself being very impatient, exhausted and just plain disinterested. I received the email about Headspace offering free to healthcare workers and decided to try it- what could it hurt!?! 
I cannot say enough about the changes in my life, my routine, interactions, health, etc. It was nothing like I thought meditation had to be- makes you comfortable, is informative, real-life advice and support. Just amazing!! Thank you!
title: Life changing!

review: I wish that you guys could make a program that was free because some people really need this but they don‚Äôt have the money for it when you make people subscribe they want to delete the app at least make two programs one that has everything but have to pay for and the other is limited a little bit and is free. Please consider what I‚Äôm saying and try and figure something out it makes me a little frustrated when every app I get I have to pay for the subscription. But you can make a change and start making a difference cause more people are going to buy your app. Thank you for your time and Service.
title: Little disappointed

review: I have known about this app for years and gave into resistance (aka I never got it, came up with many reasons why I didn‚Äôt need it, etc). Then in 2020, everything was lining up and headspace just seemed to be something I was meant to have in my life...man I don‚Äôt regret it one bit. Right now I‚Äôm doing the headspace 365...wow.... that‚Äôs all I can say! This app has allowed me to be aware of my physical body, how to not be mad at the fact that I have thoughts, in fact it has helped me see them with this loving kindness and also allowed me to create more space within my mind. I can‚Äôt recommend this app enough.
title: Resisted but now I‚Äôm here

review:
Beautiful well put together , I‚Äôm just in love I even gotten my husband to meditate along with me !!!! That on its own it‚Äôs a miracle ! Thank you to the creators of this lovely app! 

Only on basics and REALLY considering purchasing a whole year. It‚Äôs so much help and I can‚Äôt go a day without meditating!

I have been using headspace for about 3 years , however, lately it has a lot of glitches and problems. Although I paid for a yearly subscription I have been unable to use the app for over a week already, saying ‚Äúsing up and pay for subscription‚Äù but I‚Äôm already subscribed and paid for a full year!!! For an app that is meant to calm your mind is definitely causing a lot of unnecessary distress!!!! Now I can‚Äôt even get a refund for that whole year I paid. I can not use the app at all.
title: Amazing/ changed my review

review: Love this app and all the features and meditations. The sleep casts have been super helpful during this past year. I would give it five stars if it wasn‚Äôt for the wind down exercise of ‚Äúswitching off.‚Äù  That language seems so unhelpful. It‚Äôs not a feeling (like relax or soften), it‚Äôs not a visualization (how do I visualize my legs switching off?  Do they go dark?  Or just look dead?). The word switch is a bit harsh and has a variety of meanings that aren‚Äôt very calm. It‚Äôs really hard to understand how those words were the right choice. And it‚Äôs on so much of the sleep related content!  Other than that, though, I love it all :)
title: Would be five stars, if it wasn‚Äôt for ‚Äúswitching off‚Äù

review: I‚Äôve known about this app for years and while it does take a little time the pay off for doing daily meditation is a lot more than just people expect definitely helps strength your mind resilience and ability to handle stress. Remember it takes about 30 days for your mind to form a true habit so if you aren‚Äôt seeing any result the first week keep with it is well worth the effort. I start seeing results ether the beginning of the 2nd or end of it deeper results by the third and true results by the forth. The trick is doing it every day.
title: It‚Äôs a great app

review: About 2 years ago I moved to LA for an opportunity, although I didn‚Äôt know anyone I remember being so excited and optimistic about my new journey but then 3 months later the pandemic started and my anxiety and depression resurfaced. About a month into the pandemic I seen a Headspace ad on IG offering a free membership to Los Angeles County residents and I can‚Äôt thank Headspace enough for offering that! This app has helped me stay grounded and optimistic, I really like using it to aid in sleeping and meditation. I use to use Calm all the time but I definitely like what Headspace offers better! Thanks Headspace!!!
title: Thank You Headspace

review: My go to app whenever I‚Äôm struggling. Whether it‚Äôs stress, feeling down, not being able to sleep there is something there that will help me. In that regard it‚Äôs 5 stars. I only gave it 4 because there are some nit picky things about the functionality of app that I would wish they would change. No reason the app shouldn‚Äôt be able to continue where you left off on music, especially on hour long songs. Also need better way to organize saved videos for later reference and the ability to review the video of the day in case you missed it.
title: Invaluable Resource
developerResponse: {'id': 32518918, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. However, please send us a note with this detailed feedback at help@headspace.com and we will be happy to assist you further.\r", 'modified': '2022-10-11T20:46:51Z'}

review: My daughter showed me headspace. When she was at collage playing Rugby, the team would have meditation time together. They would listen to headspace. We started to try it. Now we are hooked! It so fun to see all the new stuff available on the app and it‚Äôs cool to see it on Netflix!! I‚Äôm so grateful that you guys work so hard to provide me a space to help keep my thoughts on track. The part on Netflix about the guy enjoying his cup of coffee, has helped me to recognize that I enjoy my morning routine and cup of tea. Anyways just wanted to say THANK YOU!!! I‚Äôm soooo glad I found headspace!!
title: Headspace fan!

review:
I‚Äôve had Headspace for a few years now and it is one of the most useful apps you‚Äôll ever download to your phone.

Having all of the wisdom in guidance that this company has to offer regarding mental health available in the palm of your hand anytime you need it it‚Äôs a wonderful! Every time I‚Äôm feeling stressed, overcome with anxiety, depressed, unmotivated or overwhelmed I turned to Headspace and by the end of a guided meditation I feel significantly better. It‚Äôs one of those apps where the more you use it the more you get out of it, but it‚Äôs always useful even if you haven‚Äôt meditated in a while.
title: You Want This On Your Phone!

review:
Headspace is the first app I downloaded and subscribed to. Its good but not great as I discovered when I downloaded Breethe shortly thereafter. Both apps are similar but Breethe tends to update their material more often. Particularly the sleep casts. Having paid for both, I find myself 9 out of 10 times using Breethe. So I will not be renewing the Headspace app. at the end of the current subscription period. 

Tip for Headspace: Provide new sleep cast stories and get rid of that stupid whisper cast. Its barely audible, which makes it annoying. We can turn the volume down on our end to make any cast lower but that whisper cast does not seem to ever become loud enough.
title: Good But Not Great -  Subscription will not be renewed

review: First of all, I literally never write reviews. Like this is the first I‚Äôve ever written. But Headspace has been such a game changer for me, so here we are. If you are into meditation or want to try, my advice would be to do the free trial. Ignore those price tags and just try. If you‚Äôre like me, it will make such a difference in your life, that you‚Äôll gladly signup after your trial ends. Seriously, I feel like I‚Äôm such a kinder person because I‚Äôm able to take time for myself and recharge throughout the day with Headspace. Click download lol you won‚Äôt regret it :)
title: You should get this app

review:
I‚Äôm a monthly subscriber and I absolutely love Headspace. I use it everyday. However, everyday, I have to pass a large section on the main page that tries to prompt me to become an annual member. I‚Äôm already a subscriber. This ad should be placed on the free version. (although the free version needs to allow people access to content. As a free member, you don‚Äôt get anything. You have to pay money in order to mediate with Headspace.) The ad should NOT be on a subscriber‚Äôs version. 

Please fix this. As a consumer, it feels like you don‚Äôt appreciate my business as a monthly subscriber; you just want more of my money and that‚Äôs not a good way to do business.
title: Please Stop Advertising Yearly Subscription
developerResponse: {'id': 34466162, 'body': "We are sorry for the trouble you are having with this ad in your Headspace app. Please send us a note including a screenshot of the message or pop-up you received to help@headspace.com and we'd be happy to assist further.\r\n", 'modified': '2023-01-24T23:05:10Z'}

review:
I never write review for apps but honestly headspace has helped me out so much I need to share. I suffer from bad anxiety and panic attacks at night and insomnia (fun stuff).
Headspace has been my saving grace.
There are so many amazing options from meditations, to soothing sounds, breathing exercises, to night time stories that help distract my mind SO much. If you suffer from anxiety or just want to truly relax this app is god sent.
I wish I could give headspace 10 stars, I don‚Äôt take any medication and this app honestly is the reason why. Thank you headspace!
title: This app has saved me so many times

review: I think head space is amazing, I focus on the sleep part of it and it helps me fall asleep so easily! Whenever you put more new things into the sleep era, I get really really happy. I do have one suggestion though. I think you should add at least one new video to sleep every day. (I have done all of them three times already and I think that will keep me going. I also think it will help a lot of other people that are focusing on the sleep era. Thank you for taking your time to read this and I hope you do what I suggested. Bye!
title: Head space is amazing!

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for over 2 years now. I go back and forth between calm app and headspace 2 or more times a day. I love meditation and being aware of myself from head to toe to inner feelings and emotions. I‚Äôve learned to be still for long periods of time and enjoy every moment of it!! I find myself using the techniques throughout the day at different places, in line at the gas station, waiting for my food at fast food stops and just sitting in my car to have time to myself. Thank you Andy for all the help you‚Äôve given me and the rest of the community!! I am truly grateful!!üòä
title: Get you some!!

review: I found myself in a very dark space and hurt the feelings of someone I really care about because I wasn‚Äôt allowing myself any time to be still with myself in order to begging doing that internal work. I‚Äôve been here for just a few and I‚Äôm managed to learn a lot about myself I have some experience with meditation but this has definitely helped me keep on track I feel I may even be experiencing some inner child healing. The power of being in touch with yourself and grounded in every environment is a privilege that we can all access.
title: Newbie

review: I love this app. As a grad school student I have been using this app throughout my schooling and have found so much peace of mind while using it. I  really enjoy waking up in the morning listening to my morning lineup and beginning my day in a clear mindset. I wish there was a lifetime membership but they really make it feasible for I individuals like me and a small budget. I am so so thankful for their student plan and as someone who is going into mental health and speaks on it regularly I continuously find myself referring people to this app. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
title: Lifelong user

review: This app is amazing and has gotten me through a newer season of sleepless nights due to anxiety‚Ä¶thing is, this app gives me anxiety. Lol! Soundscapes are so good at keeping me asleep for the 480 mins, when the time is up it turns off, waking me up. My body now freaks out at like 3/4 am just to reset the time so I can sleep past the allotted 480 mins (or 6:20 am for me). It‚Äôs annoying. I wish Headspace would allow longer times. 8 hours of sleep is not the set standard for every single person. It can‚Äôt be. Great app that has changed my sleep hygiene for the better. Just wish it were longer or more customizable.
title: Sleeping Great(ish)!

review:
I‚Äôve been using Headspace for over 6 years now and the app has become more and more developed through the years.  The animations are great and have really educated me on what meditation is truly about.  I went into meditation thinking one thing but learning something completely different.  
Also, I sent in a suggestion a few years ago and they actually included it.  I thought that was awesome.  I haven‚Äôt tried any other apps so I can‚Äôt really compare.  I‚Äôve just been so happy with Headspace I didn‚Äôt see the need to try anything else.
title: Great!

review: This app was great, I used to use it every night for sleep. There were only a few free options but they worked great and I love it. However one day I opened the app to turn on my nightly meditation to find out that they decided to make all sleep related content only available for premium. I can not use this app at all anymore without paying for premium. I think it is completely unfair and if I could give 0 stars I would. It was frustrating enough to only have 3-4 free sleep meditations but for them to completely block it so it is only available for people who pay is ridiculous. It seems the creators of this app are only after the money they can make. Hope that they decide that people who can‚Äôt pay still deserve some access.
title: I used to love this app
developerResponse: {'id': 28428619, 'body': 'Thanks for reaching out. We appreciate your feedback. If you would like to discuss some pricing options that may work best for you, please send us a note at help@headspace.com.\r\n', 'modified': '2022-03-07T15:18:16Z'}

review:
This app is so easy and fun to use that it feels like a game when you start. It‚Äôs the perfect introduction to a lot of deep topics. It covers topics such as happiness, focus, depression, relationships, and anger to name a few. It helps you have way healthier relationship to your mind and your emotions. Such a worthwhile investment, this is amazing.
If you are searching for some more clarity or peace in your life. Take the time to sit down with yourself. I‚Äôve been using this app for over 4 years now, almost daily, and by god it is the best money I have ever spent. Hands down, bar none.
title: Changed my life

review: Headspace has been an absolute godsend for me. I have been suffering from insomnia for some time, so I decided to try the sleep wind down mediations and they have helped tremendously and I would even go as far as to say they have cured my insomnia. We live in a world of constant stimulation that is hard to shut off. Use headspace and it‚Äôll put you in the right mind frame to drift peacefully to sleep. Also If you are like me and sometimes wake up during the night with a racing mind, headspace has you covered with their night time sos as well.
title: Worth every penny.

review: A while back, there were some things free that allowed me to at least get into meditation. I wanted to start simple and got tried the basics course, as there wasn‚Äôt much else I could access without paying. I tried it and loved it, i used it for awhile and eventually was able to do everything by myself, so I didn‚Äôt use the app anymore. Eventually however, I forgot the process and wanted a refresher course, but I found that there is literally nothing I can access for free, except a single ‚Äú3 breath‚Äù thing if I make a new account. I would consider paying if it weren‚Äôt $70 a year for something as small at a meditation that I don‚Äôt even use that much. I would go straight back to 5 stars if they just put the single basics course back to free.
title: Nothing is free anymore
developerResponse: {'id': 36895032, 'body': "Thank you for sharing your feedback and experience with us! we would definitely take it to improve our members' experience, we hope to see you back soon, in the meantime, you can check out our free content available on our social channels, If you need help please reach us at help@headspace.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2023-06-02T21:19:29Z'}

review: That‚Äôs pretty much all I have to say. This program does everything it says it will. It helps me start, organize, and end my day well. I suffer greatly from a few mental illnesses, and while western medicine (psychiatry and various therapies) is a vital part of my recovery and managing my symptoms, I do not think I am exaggerating to say meditation and mindfulness is equally vital to my well-being. This app is a godsend for me. If you have been thinking about it for a little while or teetering on the fence for a very long time, I am Ploor you to take the plunge, you will not be sorry.
title: It works

review: Yes. I say ‚Äúyes‚Äù because you may be asking, ‚ÄúIs it really that good?‚Äù Yes, it really is that good. I‚Äôve dealt with anxiety, depression, and ADHD my whole life. But I never found anything that really worked. Medication? I‚Äôm not a fan. Exercise? It works, but it‚Äôs a pretty high maintenance thing to do. It may seem OK if you sit a lot. But if you happen to have a very active day and need to unwind, well, good luck. In cases like that I‚Äôm out of luck. I get even more exhausted just trying to relax. So, to keep this short, I‚Äôll just say that you should give this app an honest attempt. It‚Äôs great.
title: It‚Äôs as good as they say

review: Definitely my favorite app for guided meditations. The teachers have lovely voices that are soothing and not distracting. I very much enjoy the wide range of topics the app has too. Additionally, I have an anxiety disorder and while therapy has helped greatly lessen the frequency of my panic attacks, I find that for the few odd ones I do get Headspace‚Äôs SOS Panicking meditation helps pull me out of them.  I also love and appreciate the discount they provide for students. Their easy to follow instruction makes meditation accessible for everyone, and this an app I recommend to all my friends.
title: Favorite guided meditations

review: Due to some serious life changes, I‚Äôve been very anxious and panicky. This app has been a salve to my soul. When I feel an attack, I just choose something soothing and it helps calm me and bring me back to center. There are so many activities to choose from - sleep help, mindfulness meditation, breathing and stretching exercises. It‚Äôs easy to choose what I need in any given moment. I‚Äôve not started a course yet but that‚Äôs next! I highly recommend Headspace. It is worth every single penny. Great customer service too! Namaste.
title: Has helped my anxiety and to restart meditation

review:
I have been using this app on and off since 2017 and it is by far the best one I have used. My attention span is very short and that‚Äôs part of the reason why I love this app. They have meditations for all type of behavior styles and personal goals. 
I have literally used this app in my car on break at work for 3 mins. I have used it to wake up and fall asleep or just to calm down. If you are looking for a variety and endless choices to that include what voice you want to lead the meditation then this is definitely the app for you!
title: Best Meditation app ever

review: This app was offered for free to all healthcare workers at the beginning of the pandemic. I can not express how helpful this app has been to myself and family. It‚Äôs a great resource that can be used through your day. Wether you are ready to start your day, need something to keep you focus or help you wind down at the end of the day, Headspace is all you need. It was created so beautifully and easy to navigate. Everything about it is perfect. I even use it for my little one (2yrs old) at the end of our day. The storytelling feature for kids is a plus. Highly recommend it!!
title: Healthcare worker

review: I have been having a hard time lately and I thought this app would really help, and none the less, the one, 60 second breathing video is great! But you have to pay 60$ for everything else!!! The fact you have to pay is not reducing my stress, but increasing it! That is not the purpose of this app. Stress may be caused by money and you‚Äôre literally making people pay to be happy! If it was 3 dollars as a one time purchase, I would totally do it, but it‚Äôs not. I do really like the cartoon aspect and think that is really nice and relaxing. But considering everything else, I may delete this app. I am unimpressed by the creators and they‚Äôre choices.
title: MUST READ BEFORE GETTING

review: Headspace has literally changed my life. For over a decade I was unable to get into a regular meditation practice b/c I was striving for a blank slate of a mind and feeling like a failure when I couldn‚Äôt do it. These meditation courses taught me that mediation is actually about the practice of turning inward versus about the result, and the guided practice helps me maintain focus. Thanks to Headspace I‚Äôve meditated almost every day for two years now. Meditation led me to realize my drinking was a problem, and I am now 19 months sober. That‚Äôs just one of the many realizations and positive life changes meditation has given me. I‚Äôm so grateful for Headspace.
title: Life Changing!

review: I‚Äôve tried many mediations apps and found headspace to be the only app to capture my attention and be a genuine and successful learning tool. They teach you how to meditate step by step, offer courses for any goal or state of mind, have an extensive library of physical exercises and sleep music and an interface that‚Äôs really lovely to look at and interact with. I most love their meditation courses guided by Andy with easy to understand techniques and a clear context and goal for why we meditate. Headspace is like a warm blanket I want to wrap myself into making it easy to turn to first thing in the morning.
title: A gentle guide to mind training

review:
Listen to me: Just spend the money. The annual fee for this app is 100% worth it. I‚Äôve been using this app every single day for three weeks now and it is probably one of the best decisions I have ever made.

I‚Äôm definitely on the cheap side of life. I hate spending money on things and I especially hate spending money on myself. You will not regret spending your money on this for a single second. 

From exercise, guiding breathing and meditation, to sleepcasts and uplifting music playlists, this app has everything you could want and more
title: worth the money

review: What really makes this app work is Andy and his passion for and knowledge of mindfulness practice. I have used other mindfulness apps which each have their own approaches, but, for me, this is the best. I appreciate the simplicity of the approach. It doesn‚Äôt try to make mindfulness mystifying or ethereal through background sounds or ASMR-esque narration. You simply deepen your awareness of yourself and the present moment a little more each day with the help of Andy and his team. There are no fancy tricks (except for maybe the sunlight visualization) but it really works. Give it a try.
title: Life-Changing

review:
So I‚Äôve had the app for around 2 years now and I used to absolutely it. It helped me sleep and kept my stress to a minimum but last year they locked one of my favorite sleepcasts, i didn‚Äôt really mind it and just found another one but then they pretty much locked the entire app under a subscription lock. I‚Äôm too young to have a job and this helped me with the daily stresses of life. I‚Äôm very disappointed that the so went from those that wanted to help those with mental health and insomnia-too money hungry people who don‚Äôt care. 
If you really cared about the people you say you ‚Äúwant‚Äù to help at least make a few things free for this who can‚Äôt afford it. And I hope you know developers, this hurts. To see an app go downhill so quickly is really disappointing.
title: Used to be good‚Ä¶

review: I initially got this app to help me with sleep, which it did, but my favorite part is the stuff to help my kids!  We love the Sesame Street stories and the guided sleep stuff is amazing!  I am also pleased with how much this app has and the way you can customize a lot of the lengths of meditation.  Sometime I have a lot of time, sometimes just a little bit I always find something that fits.  I also love how you can switch between narrators.  I‚Äôve had this for a month and I‚Äôm still discovering new ways to use this!
title: Perfect for my whole family!

review:
I‚Äôm quite impressed with this app. My sister gave me a free month subscription because she‚Äôs been blown away at the transformation she‚Äôs had using it. I‚Äôve historically meditated for 10 minutes with just breath awareness but these specific courses have helped me just after 5 days!
Amidst the pandemic and being pregnant during the winter in New England, I‚Äôve been struggling mentally. Getting this subscription now has been perfect timing before losing my mind. 
SUGGESTION: I wish it was easier for me to get to the courses I‚Äôve started. It took me a couple
Days into the Managing Anxiety course to remember how I got to the course at all. The grey button on the landing page to ‚Äúview course library‚Äù is light grey and easy to miss. I missed it the first few times and then forgot where I had previously seen it the next time I used the app. 

Keep up the great work. As a scrum master and a UX design enthusiast, you make me want to work at Headspace! Love this app.
title: The courses are game changers

review: I love the headspace app. I usually use it for getting to sleep but have recently been using it for meditation and movement as well. The sleep music has been a godsend for drowning out my boyfriend‚Äôs snoring; and the sleep casts help me calm my mind, get tired, and fall asleep quickly. I love that some of the sleep music lasts all night that way when my roommates dogs are moving around the house it doesn‚Äôt wake me. The only recommendation I would like to give is to give a last listen to date on the sleep section!! I know it would be beneficial to me because I use it so often!
title: I use this app every day!

review: I recommend this app to everyone wanting some peace of mind and true relaxation. If you never meditated before (like me) then it will take you at least 8 weeks to begin experiencing benefits. The benefits are only experienced, you cannot read about them and hope to understand them. Some days are difficult but the majority of the days I‚Äôm more mindful and living in the moment. I can choose which thoughts I give energy to and which I can just let them be and not choose to engage with them. Good luck.
title: User since 2016

review: I was skeptical about this app. Not that I didn‚Äôt see the benefits of meditating, but I was so tired of hearing about mindfulness. As opposed to what? Mindlessness ? So with this great attitude I began using Headspace. But to my surprise, Andy (who developed the app) is relaxed, kind, talks sort of like a friend, and doesn't make any ridiculous claims. He guides in a natural way through meditation basics and beyond. I don't know how mindful I'm going to become, but I've been meditating for some months and plan to continue. This is the best meditation guide I have ever had, and I highly recommend it.
title: Don't mind if I do!

review:
I recently had brain surgery and had found this app previously. It helped with settling my mind and focusing, but it has also been very helpful in the physical and emotional healing of my brain post surgery. The five deep breaths, morning wake up call, and guided meditations have allowed me the ability to calm my racing brain and also help deal with the physical pain of recovery. 
I would highly recommend for everyone! Not only is great for every day health but for anyone recovering from surgery or suffering from chronic pain or health issues.
title: Healing your mind post brain surgery

review: I will say 5 reasons why headspace is so good. 1 after a long day all I have to do is go on the app and relax. 2 you can do meditation to sleep and focus. 3 For a app to help you relax this is the best one I found. 4 If your a very stressed person all you have to do is download this app that is for all ages and enjoy relaxing. 5 The last reason why I think this app is amazing is because it really helps and I get reminders to meditate. Also the app gives nice positive words throughout the day. These 5 reasons is why I think headspace is a amazing app.
title: The app is amazing!

review: I started using Headspace at the beginning of the pandemic. I had never been able to successfully meditate before. This app made it so easy with lots of options for how long, various topics, teaching techniques, I‚Äôve learned so much! I went from meditating 10 minutes a couple times a week to mediating 15-20 minutes every day for over 8 months straight! I highly recommend this app to anyone wanting to learn to relax, deal with stress or other difficult feelings, become more aware & present in life, live more fully.
title: Fantastic coping!!!

review: So I have been using headspace. I have had to do the same session over and over again. I wish that it would be free so I can try all of the sessions without having to pay a ridiculous amount of money. I think that having to pay for an app that helps you to be calm and close to falling asleep. I have issues falling asleep so I got this app but it wasn‚Äôt worth it because I have to pay to use most of it. I am only 14 and I can‚Äôt pay for it. I wish that is were to be free. Instead of having to pay a ridiculous amount of money for an app like this. So don‚Äôt get this app if you don‚Äôt wanna pay for it try and use other things that are free to use or try.
title: It‚Äôs good but too expensive

review:
I‚Äôve tried Headspace on and off for a few years and came back to it again for the I don‚Äôt knowth time. And while their guided meditations have always been good it was hard to keep the habit. They‚Äôre new(to me anyway) feature is a daily wake up and suggested meditations for morning afternoon and night. This has incentivized me to come for the advice and you naught of the daily wake up followed by a quick meditation. Then I can do the others if I‚Äôd like through them day.

TLDR the Daily Wake-up makes habit forming easier.
title: Come a long way

review: Purchased a year long family plan to give it a shot thinking that was all I purchased. My kids tried it, and one actually used if for a few months but the other two used it very little. I tried it and it did nothing for me. Then the other day I got a notification for another year renewal for $100. I logged into the account to try to cancel it, and could only cancel the following year. I got a hold of someone from customer service and they weren‚Äôt willing to do anything not even a partial refund. So now I‚Äôm out $100 for a service I haven‚Äôt used in months and won‚Äôt use ever again. Don‚Äôt waste your time or money. Somewhat Good idea terrible execution!
title: Company is all about money for a product that is in my opinion mediocre at best
