review: This app is very useful for if you have any sort of disorder or nightmares your having lately. They help me sleep and meditate more often they are just very relaxing and I feel happy when I sleep and meditate or even get up for the day when I‚Äôm feeling down. I strongly suggest you get this app if you having trouble sleeping or being able to go out and run around and getting started with your day. Thank you headspace for doing this for me I and keep up the good work!ü•∞üò∫üçÉ
title: Calming‚ù§Ô∏è

review: Maybe the way you justify this is because you have to pay for anything else in the world like therapy or medication, maybe it was wrong of me to set higher expectations for an app and myself on a journey to wellbeing. I‚Äôve been trying to use the app consistently, but every time there is a ‚Äúlocked‚Äù daily meditation, there goes all my progress into the hands and pockets of you. I‚Äôm just disappointed. You don‚Äôt really care about me or any of your customers. Mental health is a necessity, and when you started this app, maybe you had that in mind? But you don‚Äôt anymore.
title: Paying for mental health

review: I have lived most of my life in state of dissociation; struggling with anxiety and then plummeting into depression. When I started seeking help and going to therapy, I learned about the Headspace app and the value of meditation in the healing journey. Headspace has been part of my life for a few years now. I‚Äôve tried a number of other meditation app, but have finally settled back on this one. The guided meditation and music selected is exceptional, the graphics and animations make me smile. I highly recommend this app!
title: Learning to Meditate

review: The convenience of having a meditation aid as close as my phone has made a significant change in my ability to meditate regularly. The grief module helped me thru the loss of my husband; the pain module helped through my broken elbow recovery. Now as I go they the Pro series I am getting deeper into what meditation is all about. Then there‚Äôs yoga modules. I Can‚Äôt say enough about the difference having this app on my phone has made in my life. Thank you headspace
title: A different space created with headspace

review: This is a great compliment to Headspace and also my mom who introduced me to this app with a subscription almost three years ago. I did meditate in college but since I‚Äôve lost my marriage, I needed to focus more on myself and this is such an easy way to do that daily practice until I have more time on my hands after my second wedding! So thank you for the money videos because they‚Äôve got me thinking through my purchases right now and why I feel so dejected after losing my job this year.
title: Engaged and Indebted

review: I‚Äôm just on day two of the pain management series and am amazed at how different it is having me approaching my pain. Honestly, when I do Headspace consistently it makes such a big difference in my life. Not sure why I disappear at various times since I‚Äôm so lifted up when I come back. Well, as they say it is what it is and I am absolutely showing up every day for this pain series. It helps SO much more than pain killers. Go figure! Thanks for being there.
title: Great help with pain

review:
Awesome app. Takes a few sessions for you to start to appreciate what it offers but wonderful all around.

Support is great too!

The only thing I wish headspace did that it doesn‚Äôt is let you see what courses or meditations you‚Äôve already completed (I know you can see mid pack or after if you click back in, but you can‚Äôt see like your history other than total minutes meditated!). But still rockin in every other way!
title: Great App - Feature Add Would Be Cool

review: I have been a user of Headspace for quite a while and had always appreciated the neutral space they created for mindfulness and mental health. However, recently, they have shifted their focus heavily towards politics, particularly favoring a left-leaning perspective. While everyone is entitled to their political opinions, I believe that a mental health app should remain apolitical to provide an unbiased and inclusive environment. Unfortunately, Headspace seems to have deviated from its core mission. Its new direction has created an imbalance in the content and disturbed the peace that I, and probably many others, came here seeking in the first place. Therefore, I cannot recommend this app until it re-centers its focus on mental health without political overtones.
title: Lost Focus on Core Mission
developerResponse: {'id': 36990391, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you are not satisfied with our content and appreciate your feedback!  If there is anything else you would like to share, please send our team an email at:  Help@Headspace.com.", 'modified': '2023-06-07T22:21:14Z'}

review: I have downloaded and signed up for many apps that turn out to be not for me, so I get a lot of junk mail in my junk mail email account and who knows what personal info is out there. So when I downloaded to look at what it was all about, I couldn‚Äôt because there was no ‚Äúintroduction‚Äù other than signup first. So I had to delete it and now looking for another. Shame too, it seems to get a lot of rave reviews! However, reviews nowadays aren‚Äôt worth their weight in gold. Developers - Please consider even a small introduction to show us how the app works before asking for personal information. The pics on the App Store just aren‚Äôt enough. Thank you in advance.
title: Sad I had to delete
developerResponse: {'id': 35749260, 'body': "Thank you for sharing your comments; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2023-04-03T18:58:14Z'}

review:
I signed up for a 30 day trial. It‚Äôs ‚Äúinteresting‚Äù that their trial doesn‚Äôt offer a way to stop the subscription through iPhone‚Äôs built in settings. Instead you have to use a web browser to access your headspace profile bc their phone app also doesn‚Äôt show subscription settings. Once on the website you have to turn off auto-renewal. 

It seems like this company has a financial bottom line. The app is ok enough but can be overwhelming with their constant advertising for courses/instructors you have no curiosity about. If you want a meditation app, I recommend looking elsewhere (give the app Balance a try).
title: Ok enough app but sneaky
developerResponse: {'id': 34598986, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we are sorry for any trouble you had managing the subscription, also we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com. \r\n", 'modified': '2023-01-31T20:37:44Z'}

review:
Honestly the service is amazing. What is ultra frustrating is that the download feature almost never works. Even when it does work, which isn‚Äôt often, downloads will randomly
disappear. So when I fly, which is also often, I don‚Äôt have headspace. This is counter intuitive; during the most stressful times you can‚Äôt use headspace. Unfortunately, this isn‚Äôt a new problem. It‚Äôs been reoccurring for years. Alas, after being a loyal customer for years and after having referred literally 10s of people, I am likely switching to Calm.
title: Amazing and frustrating

review: This app Is amazing and very helpful. I do wish it was a little cheaper. I know it‚Äôs a very high quality app that is insanely well done, but I know that there are many people who maybe can‚Äôt afford it and I fell like everyone should have a better chance to use it. Also if you could make a meditation about going back to school after a long holiday, because I‚Äôm going back from winter break tomorrow and I‚Äôm really stressed and I would love a meditation to help with that
title: Love it!

review:
I was excited when my company began offering this app for free. After a few weeks of use I‚Äôve deleted it and went back to the superior (and free) smiling mind app. Headspace just does not work for me, I don‚Äôt want star wars in my daily meditation, I don‚Äôt even want to think about Star Wars or pod casts or anything commercial or semi commercial. I just want to be calm and meditate, and this app does not do that for me. 

In addition, every single one of the over 20 meditations I tried were the exact same in principle. This may have just been back kick with selection, but it does seem that head space has much less content that originally appears to be the case on first glance due to the sameness of each mediation. 

The folks voicing the sessions seem to do a good job from what I experienced. I again prefer smiling mind here, mainly due to the longer gaps of silence interspersed throughout the meditation. 

Overall, this app tries to do too much and misses the mark of what meditation truly is (for me).
title: Commercialized
developerResponse: {'id': 30326299, 'body': "Thank you for your review; I'm really sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with our recent update, we'll be sure your feedback is heard as we're still working on our system and content. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.", 'modified': '2022-06-13T11:14:05Z'}

review: Other apps seem to try to press toward enlightenment: meditation as a religion or belief system. There are no talismans in Headspace. No trying to gain insight or wisdom. Just the idea of putting more space in the mind where thoughts and feelings can be released instead of bound up in constant regurgitation. I have found elements of cognitive behavioral therapy here also in the practice of shifting perspectives, not holding on to thoughts or over emphasizing them, evaluating them or giving them too much power.
title: An excellent companion to therapy

review: The core of the app is to lead to a daily practice of meditation but in comparison to similar programs, this app is particularly helpful in welcoming everyone into that practice. There are entry points for those looking for a specific aspect of mindful meditation such as better sleep or improved focus, but also a feeling of safety and recognition of various, often marginalized, populations such as racial minorities, women, and LGBTQA. That sensitivity to representation means a great deal and it‚Äôs a huge component of my decision to continue the journey with this app.
title: Truly welcoming

review: With 1000‚Äôs of meditative moments behind me, I now live more aware and consciously. It‚Äôs a journey. Understanding and applying patience is the key to a daily practice. Headspace taught me that there is no bad meditation, and that sometimes when your mind is busy and it takes longer to quiet down, that it is a reflection of what‚Äôs happening in your life‚Ä¶ the next morning it will and is always different as there are no two moments that are exactly the same as one begins to live mindfully. Love‚Ä¶
title: Changed my life

review: I use Headspace almost every day. I really love the content and the different options they offer. However, the most recent update changed the layout and I really do not like it. The bottom menu options are now much more limited, and they‚Äôve deleted key sections like Sleep. Now I have to search individually for those kinds of tracks instead of having them easily accessible. The update is not helpful.
title: great app, but the new update is not

review: At the beginning of the year, I started my journey with the headspace guide to meditation on Netflix, watching an episode a day. I‚Äôve quickly gone up to doing two short and one long sessions a day and have seen improvements in so many areas of my life. I feel less stressed, less anxious and more accepting. My relationships with the people in my life are much better. I feel better rested and more energized. I have to say, headspace has improved my life in ways I did not even expect to have happen.
title: Love this exercise

review: Headspace has taught me meditation, helped me feel confident in my meditation skills, and assisted me in coping through tough times. At one point, the meditation of the day was free. That along with Basics 1 was great for the free Headspace experience. Now it‚Äôs only Basics 1. There are a few free episodes out there as well, but they are more meant for encouragement and don‚Äôt teach you meditation skills or guide you through a session. Even if just the meditation of the day was made free again, I would be perfectly happy. I‚Äôm a college student living paycheck to paycheck, and I can‚Äôt afford a headspace subscription.
title: Wonderful app, but stingy with free content

review:
What a wonderful app. I look forward everyday to see what is coming up for the day.  

One suggestion:  Wouldn‚Äôt it be nice if you could select the thoughts and feelings you experienced during the meditation so that the app could suggest exercises or course to take that were specifically tailored to the individual and their journey on the already thoughtful timeline on the Home Screen?  That is the only suggestion I have to truly perfect an already outstanding app.
title: Love it!

review:
This is such a great app and it‚Äôs helped my anxiety and helped me learn to meditate. I love listening to the sleepcasts, but I wish there were some like a crackling fire in the winter or maybe holiday themed sleepcasts? That would be great. I‚Äôd love a Christmas one.

Also, this is a long shot, but I‚Äôve listened to the Star Wars themed sleepcasts and maybe you guys could do some Harry Potter themed ones? I‚Äôd love a cozy gryffindor common room

Anyway, thank you so much for the wonderful app, I really appreciate what it does for me
title: Friendly suggestions!

review: I mostly use this for the sleep scapes. It calms my racing thoughts. I usually fall asleep within like 10-15 minutes, I love them. There‚Äôs some I want to listen to but can‚Äôt because some of the narrators have thick accents that I find distracting. I really like that you balance the sounds of the narration and the ambience. I usually turn up the ambience to hear the wind and water sounds. While there is a large library, I wish there was a new sleepscape more often.
title: Sleepscapes for sleep

review: Day 1 Basics, i tried this a year ago and really enjoyed taking time for myself. But i get impatient then make excuses. Nothing good came from giving up which is a habit including feeling stressed and uncomfortable . Just listening to Andy's voice is relaxing. I now now from all the challenges this past year i need help and got some relief. Why suffer if there are alternatives and Headspace is the best app to help you get out of your head. Commitment to myself, that is the beginning.
title: Feeling Hopful

review:
My main complaint right now is that I can‚Äôt reset a half completed course so that I can start again. I have to actually write down which session I‚Äôm on each day until I get past where I last completed.

Also, the interface changes way too much. I adjust after a month or two but it‚Äôs crazy guys. Make it simpler, easier to find my favorited content, and do away with this ‚Äúday‚Äù plan idea! Tell me how many people are spending 1hr+ on headspace each day. It makes no sense for the average people who just come in for one session.
title: Great content, confusing app
developerResponse: {'id': 25798843, 'body': "We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. We have been aware of this issue and working on a solution. Please send us an email at help@headspace.com to follow up. ", 'modified': '2021-10-20T19:28:04Z'}

review: I haves used the free version of headspace which was only the Basics 10min sessions since 2015. I have turned on a lot of my friends and have always referred this as a great meditation app. Many of of those people subscribed after using the free Basics. Recently the free Basic is no longer free and only available for a 7 day trial. Such a bummer since I was a daily user and so appreciative that they provided a very basic version for those who can‚Äôt afford a subscription. After 6 years of references and usage of this app, I no longer can keep up with my mental heath routine that I learned from them. Now I‚Äôm forced to use something else. Bring the BASICS BACK FOR FREE PLEASE FOR THE PEOPLE WHO CANT AFFORD IT
title: Long time user, but recently disappointed

review:
i‚Äôm a recent college grad who also moved out on their own and i have trouble even paying my monthly bills, let alone $13/mo or $65/year for a mindfulness app that i only ever listened to the daily wake up on. if they maybe offered different price packages so all i had to pay was $2-3 a month instead to access the daily wake up maybe i‚Äôd consider, but i refuse to pay the full amount when i never even wanted to access the full content library to begin with.

everyone!!! i highly recommend "smiling mind," they offer ALL of their content for free! (at least for now). i‚Äôve accessed them for 2-3 years now and never been asked for a penny, you‚Äôre welcome <3
title: bad move on headspaces part

review: This is the best app if your struggling with falling asleep and going back to bed also is really good for staying and making you more  productive in life especially in work! I really recommend this, it  helps for everything and I   just really enjoy it and without this app, i was struggling with going and falling to sleep and i‚Äôm proud to put a five  star for this app and also taking  my time on writing this review thank you for the person who made this game!
title: The  best for sleeping and its free!

review: During the pandemic, being diagnosed with a life long illness, having so much anxiety and dread I found this app. I can honestly say that it has changed how I live! The amount of help, clarity, and calmness I get from the days that I practice meditation makes a dramatic difference. But like anything else it takes practice. I do notice the major differences in the days that I don‚Äôt practice. I can honestly say that headspace has given me a way to feel better.
title: A way to feel better

review: I like that you can adjust the length of the meditation, and sometimes which teacher it is. The only thing is every meditation is the same. Only the little thought of the day at the beginning of each meditation changes from day to day, then your 10 min of meditation is exactly the same. I would like it better if they had you visualize different things or referred back to what the message of the day was in some way. But I‚Äôve used the app every day for almost a year, so it‚Äôs at least easy to be consistent.
title: Good, but a little repetitive

review: I love headspace and depend on it. I have learned so much about deep breathing, the importance of perspective, and how to better care for my mental health. I do have one request: a series for getting through physical health difficulties. I have been sick with long Covid for 18 months, and I have listen to the series on cancer, but that, of course doesn‚Äôt fit exactly. So, if you are inclined, I think a generic series for encouragement during health struggles would be appreciated by many users. Thank you!
title: Review and request

review:
This app has talked me down too many times to count. I‚Äôve been a user for about two years now, and I use it every day. Mostly for the sleep features including story time with adjustable ambient noise and narration, sleep sounds, and my favorite the late-night SOS. 
Amazing wind-down meditations for frustration, anger, burnout, and pain. 
Head Space even has meditations for more long-term issues including depression, grieving, and trusting others. 
10/10 do recommend it.
title: A life saver
developerResponse: {'id': 8537758, 'body': 'We appreciate your feedback and thank you for sharing your thoughts. Please send us a note at help@headspace.com to discuss some pricing options that may work best for you. - Ryan HQ', 'modified': '2019-05-06T19:47:21Z'}

review: For a stress reduction app I was appalled by their customer service. The app was not for me and I cancelled the app before it expired. I still got charged for a year and the same day the charge came through, I contacted customer service and requested a refund. They said I didn‚Äôt cancel the app properly (the fine print said I had to cancel through headspace not on my App Store - like I‚Äôve done with EVERY other app I‚Äôve canceled)-  And so they would not issue me a refund!! Oops, ok I did it wrong. I‚Äôm requested a refund the same day as the charge. That should be honored! I asked to speak to someone else and now they just won‚Äôt respond. What a scam. They got $70 from me for a product I don‚Äôt want.
title: Horrendous Customer Service/Scam Alert!

review: I was just charged an automatic renewal fee of $70 for an annual subscription. I do not remember getting an email reminding me that my renewal was coming up. When I tried to cancel I was informed that they sent me ONE email, two months prior to the renewal, to remind me. I could not find this email and it‚Äôs possible I unintentionally deleted it. However, I thought I should give a warning that they only send out one notice, two months before the auto renewal-it almost seems like they‚Äôre hoping you‚Äôll forget to cancel. It‚Äôs a shame because the app is wonderful, and I was a customer for two years-but I could honestly not afford it this year. I guess I‚Äôm stuck with it now!
title: Warning-Automatic Renewal

review: I started when Andy and Eve were the teachers. Over time the content has expanded to include most challenges we face as humans and guidance as to how to navigate change. The animations are perfect for this visual learner. The courses are many and profoundly helpful. My only wish is for content that addresses the issues of aging. The new teachers are too young for me. I hope there are plans to help my demographic. Thank you for all those you help.
title: Depth and breadth with room to grow

review: This is a must-have app for everyone in the world and should be priced on a sliding scale. It should be free for the indigent and is worth 10 units of local currency for the middle class: e.g. $ 10 in the US, ‚Ç¨ 10 in the EU, ‚Çπ 10 in India, etc. Charge Jeff Bezos and Bill Gates as many millions as you like. Why? Because the app is so helpful, it should be accessible to all‚Äîirrespective of their financial status. Indeed, it should be part of school curriculums.
title: This is one of the tools to help make the world a better place

review: I have practiced with meditation before and this was my first time trying an app. I think I got lucky with this one! there are a lot of courses to teach you mindfulness & meditation if you‚Äôre not experienced on your own. I like that there are multiple topics to go through if you‚Äôre feeling more stressed or sad or angry, and there‚Äôs even courses to help students, families, or individuals with specific stressors. I also love the focus section and the focus music playlists!
title: Genuinely Wonderful

review: I am 15 years old and have a difficult time dealing with anxiety and perfectionism. Headspace has created a new mindset for me where I can go every morning and every evening to meditate, and as Headspace has taught me, I can go to that mindset of peace and breathe anytime I need to throughout the day. I love the meditation teachers and all the wonderful courses. This app has truly changed my life and shown me how to be mindful. I will continue to grow in my meditation journey everyday. Thank you Headspace!
title: Headspace is my sanctuary!

review: Hi, I put three stars because for most of the lessons I could only understand through Video but also it is not explained very well so I was wandering if you could add more videos and more explanation to help us understand more and for each lesson have a audio and animations for each lesson so we can have two different versions to help us, animations for those who understand them through animations and audios for those who understand through audio! That would be a great and most helpful change to me especially because I have adhd.
title: From a fellow who uses headspace
developerResponse: {'id': 29268283, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any other questions, suggestions or issues, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.\r", 'modified': '2022-04-19T19:55:35Z'}

review: Using this app has been life changing. Like everyone else, I have gone through some tumultuous times.  Head space has given me the ability to understand myself and to keep learning about my mind and my thoughts/ reactions for a better life for myself and those around me. It helps me remember that I get to choose in each moment to be aware and present and to gently encourage my brain not to get wrapped up in the negative thought patterns.
title: Life changing

review: So if been feeling a lot of pain lately, and I was having a pretty tough time. But then my friend told me about headspace. She was saying how great it was and how it would make me feel better. So I Immediately down loaded it, and the set up was so nice. I took one class and I already felt less tense. But I had to pay so that really bummed me out. So I took the month one and the free trial. Let‚Äôs see how it goes and how I feel in 1 month I hope can help me and so far it has!
title: Saved me

review: Was in a very dark spot when I bought a subscription for this app. Meditating even just for 3-5 minutes every day has completely changed my life and helped get me on my feet again. Everything about this app is perfect, the guides, the different meditations, and all the programs they have for whatever problem you‚Äôre facing. I don‚Äôt write reviews really on the App Store, but I had to for this one. Subscription is 100% worth it.
title: Changed My Life

review: I learned about headspace from my mom (I am 12 by the way) one morning when I was very anxious and I went on to meditate for 10 minutes a day for a year or so. I then stopped using it for a while and just recently started again. I am so glad that I did because I am writing this right after my first session in around half a year and I felt so much better during my meditation. I will go back to 10 minutes a day!
title: üòÄ so glad I did this!

review: I like the concept of the app and that is good with the cute little characters and everything but you can‚Äôt do anything unless you pay and you keep saying this trial that you can do like that but I like have that for a week and I don‚Äôt understand how this is going to help the average person who would want to use this app because you have to pay for everything you have to pay you for the basic meditation thing you can do except for the week up thing and that‚Äôs it you can‚Äôt do anything else there‚Äôs nothing else in the ad that you can do it‚Äôs a great concept but I wish you would have more things that people can do without having to pay
title: Ummmm wellll

review: Sometimes I put off meditation like I put off calling my blabbery aunt who never stops talking. I know I need to do it, but ‚Äúlater‚Äù always seems like a better time. Headspace helps by making the experience way easier by providing a fun and intuitive user interface, and with amazing guided meditations that leave me feeling all warm and fuzzy on the inside. It feels like a massage for my brain, and I keep coming back for more after all these years.
title: Best Meditation App Ever!

review: When I first downloaded the app I purchased a subscription, but it‚Äôs kind of expensive and I wasn‚Äôt utilizing all the features. I switched to the free version and they still had some ‚Äúsleepcasts‚Äù available, which are amazing. Rainday Antiques was my absolute favorite and it was one of the only things that would help me get to sleep after a stressful day. Why are you getting rid of free access to all the sleepcasts? In the middle of December when the sun barely shines and everything is just a little harder? I thought you cared about my mental health‚Ä¶ please just give me Rainday Antiques back. Thank you.
title: You were so good, why are you doing this?

review: I've been using the app for about two years and love everything it offers, but I have one suggestion. The sleep meditations and sleep music are in night mode on their menus, but as soon as you are able to click play they go to a white screen. It messes with my eyes every night, and I use it at bedtime and in the middle of the night. Thank you for your consideration! Just hearing Andy's voice on TV commercials relaxes me. I'm so thankful for Headspace.
title: Grateful for Andy and Headspace

review: This app has worked wonders for me. I have a very busy mind and often times my thoughts are unhelpful. The guided meditations, as well as the anxiety and stress programs by Andy and Kessonga have really helped me be more mindful. Now, I have a much easier time of recognizing patterns of negative thinking and am able to stop them right in my tracks. Headspace truly is amazing. It has saved my life. Thank you to everyone over at Headspace.
title: So helpful if you want to manage your anxiety

review: Headspace has good and varied content that is very helpful for navigating life. Every time I use it though, I long for an option which would allow me to queue up multiple talks and meditations so I do not need be interrupted and inconvenienced to grab my phone to click the next option. I like to use the app lying in bed, morning or evening. Please increase the functionality soon. It‚Äôs an easy fix, after all.
title: Good Content, needs more functionality

review: Most reviews are about the benefits of meditation itself, but this app specifically meets a need I‚Äôve had for years. Most meditation apps seem to come with a spiritual philosophy attached and the meditations are half about selling that. I just want to meditate, I don‚Äôt want to become a Buddhist or a yogi. You don‚Äôt have to make meditation spiritual, it‚Äôs practical. This is the only app I‚Äôve ever found that makes meditation fun.
title: The only meditation app that doesn‚Äôt take itself too seriously

review: Yes, I am very willing to pay the steep price that comes with all good mindfulness apps. But no, I will not pay before I‚Äôm allowed to even sample what the app has to offer. Not before I listen to the voices of the coaches to know if I want to listen to them guide me for the next year of a subscription. Yes, I understand there is a free trial period ‚Äúafter‚Äù I pay, but why don‚Äôt you make this a true, no-strings trial? Let potential customers use your app unconditionally during the trial period and then simply turn it off if not purchased. I may have truly enjoyed Headspace ‚Äì I‚Äôll never know. You may have had me for a lifetime customer ‚Äì you‚Äôll never know.
title: They lost me in the first three minutes
developerResponse: {'id': 34046279, 'body': "Thanks a lot for your review. We're really sorry about the confusion, however, we're offering 7/14 free trials that convert into a paid membership after the free trial ends with an option to cancel it before the payment has been processed. If you have any additional questions please send us a note to help@headspace.com and we'd be happy to assist further.", 'modified': '2023-01-02T14:22:05Z'}

review: I‚Äôd love a ‚Äúplay next‚Äù option! So often I find myself listening to a sleep cast and waking up right after it ends, or even wanting to play a couple focus playlists in a row, I‚Äôd love for an option to do so! I‚Äôd also love to customize my ‚Äútoday‚Äù playlist and notifications for moments when I know I could probably use some **headspace** love the app, my whole family has been on a plan for a couple years, best thing ever! CAT MARINA IS LIFE
title: I‚Äôd love to see this feature

review: This app is the best meditation and mindfulness tool that I have ever used. It makes learning how to be mindful easy and practical with an easy to use interface, appealing animations, and high production value videos and recordings. Headspace has made consistent meditation a real habit in my life that has increased my overall happiness and wellbeing. I would recommend Headspace to anyone and would say that it is well worth the subscription for the amount of content and utility gained.
title: Life changing

review: I love headspace. As a disabled person with extreme mental health concerns, headspace was an accessible way for me to meditate and I was able to see my progress even using the extremely limited free content. I am rating this app one star because of their decision to get rid of all free content. The free content was already limited enough, and not having any free content honestly makes me sick‚Äîheadspace has the power to help people and you shouldn‚Äôt have to pay for that. Headspace was helping me, and I shouldn‚Äôt be blocked from that because I can‚Äôt afford it. I understand having a premium subscription‚Äîyou have to make money somehow‚Äîbut blocking the content altogether in a mental health app? That‚Äôs awful.
title: No Free Content

review: Honesty, open mindedness and willingness. Meditation is a power that is unexplainable. It has transformed my life for the better in so many ways. It is not an over night fix. It takes honest effort and practice. Headspace is a perfect tool to train the mind. I can‚Äôt give this application enough credit. It truly has helped change my life and helped me in ways that have now become a lifestyle for me. 5 stars easy worth every penny! üôèüèªüî•‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Honest effort = life changing

review: Have loved this app for years and all the thoughtful functions - I‚Äôve tried everything the app offers! However, I‚Äôm disappointed with the self-promo I‚Äôve started seeing in the daily wake-up feature. I know they need to spread the word about their current projects somehow, but being forced to watch a disguised ad at the end of the daily video/podcast segment, instead of using the time to instill a few takeaways (like they do with most other functions) rubs me the wrong way.
title: ‚ÄúStudio Headspace‚Äù

review: This app has helped me so much not just through meditation but getting through my bad thoughts fueled by anxiety. It gives you so many options for meditation categories for any situation such as learning to love your self, helping you challenge yourself with some exercises, or even just sitting down to catch some you time. It is a game changer for meditation and I would recommend it for anyone looking to get a better outlook on life with meditation.
title: Mediation

review: The breathing exercises I used before Headspace were in times of stress and frustration. They helped lead me to the full understanding of mind and body, as one. After going through the pains of finding myself, I found love for myself. Shortly after, I was enlightened with the gift of Headspace. I have been using it to help develop my full potential, in all things. What your mind can do is unbelievable to most. I hope Headspace finds it way to everyone!
title: The All in All

review: I was skeptical at first, but I am so grateful I stuck with Headspace full time. The variety of options on offer is incredible and it truly caters to whatever skill level you are as a meditator. In addition to its wide library of meditation courses and singles, Headspace also offers an incredible selection of informative videos, mindful exercises, and monthly check-ins to track your progress. This app is amazing and you should download it today.
title: Worth Every Penny

review:
Ok hello why you may ask? Well it is an ok app if your looking for some COMPUTER VOICeS and some 1 minute videos! People say it‚Äôs ‚Äúoh like duh 40 minute videos bla bla bla‚Äù! No this is wrong!
You have to pay for EVERYTHING! There is only 3 videos you can watch if you don‚Äôt pay! And if you do the videos are only like‚Ä¶..13 minutes I prefer not with this app and it‚Äôs glitchy and has like 5 adds every 39 minutes! So I would not recommend! Also for the app guys can you change how many videos the free non paying people get! You guys also are ripping us off on the prices I can find another app that has 5 stars and is completely free!
        Bye bye now have a. Great day!:D
title: This app is not great‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.yeahhhhhhü´†

The customer service team, diligently worked with me to resolve my issues and then went above and beyond to make sure I remained a happy headspace member.  I highly recommend this meditation app. From what it has to offer to the people behind the screens, 10/10 would recommend!! Thank you headspace üíï

review: I really like this app. It‚Äôs been helping me a lot. The only problem I have with it is that when you download the material you still need network connection. That‚Äôs why I downloaded the sessions so I wouldn‚Äôt need a network connection to get it started or to finish it. And one other thing, I wish it had more longer sessions or options for longer sessions. All in all it‚Äôs a great app besides those two things
title: No network connection

review: I‚Äôve dabbled in mindfulness but never really made it a habit but even the beginner set is eye opening! I love this app, it‚Äôs the first thing I open in the morning. Having a panic attack in the grocery store, I come home and turn it on and turn my brain off. I just can‚Äôt speak highly enough about this app. And the outreach that headspace has makes me so happy. They have an interactive thing on Netflix and they make college student accounts. I‚Äôm just so pleased!
title: Great for beginners!!

review: I am not one to usually write reviews - good or bad, but as someone who has used Headspace for years I am heartbroken to see that my favorite ‚ÄòSleep Music‚Äô that has literally put me asleep every night for I don‚Äôt know how long now is LOCKED! I was so grateful to have found a tool that was free, more than a sound machine, and honestly something I relied on. I wish Headspace would have given some notice that they were headed towards strictly membership. I am heartbroken. I would give 5 stars if it wasn‚Äôt for this.
title: Long Time Headspace user

review: I was diagnosed withe Pancreatic Cancer last labor day.  Typically they give you 4 to 6 months to live. With the help of HEADSPACE, I have far exceeded this estimate.  I would highly recommend everyone who is diagnosed with cancer to take this course.  It help me answer many of the difficult feelings associated with being diagnosed with cancer.   My only wish is that another two weeks could be added to the course, with longer sessions
title: Every Cancer Patiend should seriously concider

review: I've struggled with anxiety and insomnia for most of my life. Headspace used to be my go to for that, until recently when it started to shut down or kick me off mid meditation. I'm infuriated, disgusted, and frankly disappointed. To pay for a subscription, just to get booted off is upsetting to say the least. I hope that they can work this out for future customers; and hope they have an update that will fix this soon.
title: Used to Love
developerResponse: {'id': 30503086, 'body': "Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry for the trouble with the app crashing. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com and we'd be happy to assist further.\r\n", 'modified': '2022-06-22T14:40:35Z'}

review: I‚Äôve been a subscriber for over 5 years. It continues to help, but is now commercialized for quick hits. The app is hard to navigate, there‚Äôs very little long-form meditations, and it seems to be set up for a quick hit of meditation instead of a true practice. Maybe the strategy is to be more like Calm after Andy left, but it‚Äôs lost its roots. At least create a function to find sessions by length for those looking for something longer than 4 minutes. Go back to the foundation of Andy‚Äôs offerings. We don‚Äôt need another Calm jam packed with surface-level quick hits.
title: Long time subscriber‚Ä¶app ironically losing focus

review:
Bc I love love love and look and look and listen cause I find new levels to track episodes and lesson daily with 4 voices to choose from. 

I think it would have an easier voice notification by clicking their picture and say ‚Äúhello, my name is Steve and I will be your guide‚Äù so I don‚Äôt have to listen to each voice in the next screen separately. Unless I looked at the wrong place. Please correct me if I am wrong. 

Thank you!
title: Would give six stars

review: We all have a complicated life which may make us believe that is normal for us not take care of ourselves and most important or mind. Headspace show me a new Potential within me, and respect for others, that not only change my life, but is going to continue changing my whole family generations to come‚Ä¶ Thank you so much Andy and to your Team, keep spreading  the love and the Peace, my family appreciate it.
title: Life change Thanks to Head Space

review:
Love Andy this guy is great to listen to I‚Äôm going to pick a new person every day because I think it‚Äôs important not to get stuck on one path of therapy.  I think listening to someone I may not think I can relate to will be a great challenge and also help me out side of my practice of meditation. I‚Äôve been down this road sense my injury in 09 and I must say head space has helped so much with my recovery. Along with magic mushroom micro-dosing, ketamine injection therapy, yoga, exposure therapy. 

THANKS & SEMPER FI !
title: Amazing (MARINE VETERANS)

review: I started using headspace several years ago when it first came out. The app seemed to be getting a little tired and the material seemed to stagnate after an initially awesome year or two. I left. Well, I‚Äôm back and I‚Äôm absolutely delighted with the content!! This app taught me to meditate, and I feel like I‚Äôve come home again. üíï Great work, and Thank you for all you do. I think your the best meditation app on the market! (I tried all the others too)
title: Coming back

review:
My main complaint is the sleepcasts.  This is the main reason I subscribed, for help with sleep.  The problem is, while the sleepcasts are great at making me fall asleep, they wake me right back up!  The voice telling the story jars me back out of sleep!   üò©

My suggestion? They need to have separate timers for voice and background sounds in each sleepcast.  For example, set the voice for 20 min but set the rain sound for 45 min.  This would solve everything. I would fall asleep without having the person‚Äôs voice jar me back awake.
title: Sleepcasts need improvement

review: This app is a great way for beginners to take up meditation. They really explain the purpose of the exercises and how you do them very thoroughly. I‚Äôve been using Headspace daily for 3 weeks now, and it‚Äôs so easy to build the habit. All the meditation sessions are guided and there are sessions that focus on specific things like anxiety, stress from work, loneliness, or depression as well as sessions just to practice. I use it anytime I need to get grounded and feel more at ease with my feelings. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough!
title: Great app for beginners

review: I have an anxiety disorder and a high stress career. My doctor recommended this app, which she uses herself, and thought it would be great for me. She was right!! This guided meditation has really helped me to be able to recognize feelings or emotions, and accept them without disruption. I‚Äôve subscribed since completing the basic program and am enjoying the different programs available. There‚Äôs even one for kids of different ages, so my 10 year old daughter and I meditate together. Love this app!!
title: Doctor Recommended

review: I have depression, just always feeling anxious or stressed, lots of the time for no reason, and always having depressive thoughts about death and if the world is real. However, headspace has been a game changer for me. just after one 5 minute session, i had already felt completely relaxed, and my depression was cured for many hours. I thought meditation was stupid and medicine was the solution but i couldn‚Äôt be more wrong.
title: For anyone with depression or anxiety

review:
Such a great app. I‚Äôve been using it on and off for around 3 years now. When I started, I was so stressed and anxious that I couldn‚Äôt even sit still for 10 minutes. It‚Äôs incredible what 10-20 minutes of meditating can do to change your life. I feel like a whole different person.

In the years since, they‚Äôve added so many features. I don‚Äôt use them all, but some of the sleep sounds a helpful.
title: Life changing

review: I recommend this app overall because the content is very good. I like the videos, the sleep section, the 10 min meditation courses, and the morning discussions. However the app will log you out very frequently (as often as once a day or more) based on your usage, and then you need to click on choices across several screens to log back in again. If you are using the app for relaxation or sleep, this is very much counter to its purpose.
title: Great content, frustrating UI

review:
This app is such a wonderful thing in my life. During the most difficult time (divorce, cancer, surgeries, hardship, etc). Andy‚Äôs guided meditations made it so much easier to pull through the many challenges thrown my way.
Discovering this app is one of the best things that has ever happened to me.. Note: It only works after being very consistent and sticking to it . Do not expect magic, rather, gradual very tangible positive change.
title: Andy literally saved my life!

review: I rated this a 5 star review because this app is everything. If you are having anger issues or helps. If your friends are being mean or leaving you out, they also have that! They even have something for if you feel small. It also has sleep casts, sleep music, and so much more sleep things. It has stuff for waking up In the morning which is very useful to almost everyone. THANK YOU SO MUCH HEADSPACE FOR EVERYTHING YOU DO FOR ME AND MANY PEOPLE OUT THERE!!!!!! I LOVE YOU!!!
title: Mindfulness is HELPING!!!

review: I mistakenly purchased a year subscription to this app after loving the Netflix content. Decided to actually utilize it this morning before work and somehow ended up in tears at the end of the first session. If you really focus and put your full attention to following the direction the best you can, this can really do something for you. I needed that. And will continue to utilize it. What a way to start the day. Sheesh. Highly recommend.
title: A great ‚Äòmistake‚Äô.

review: Thank you to Andy and his team for allowing me the opportunity to meditate. 2 years ago I could not ever imagine being able to sit silent with my minimal thoughts for ten minutes. I suffered from general anxiety disorder and had trouble enjoying the small things, being in the moment and looking on the bright side. Meditation is better than the medication prescribed to me by my therapist. I no longer feel dependent on a pill, I can rely solely on my breath.
title: Life Changer

review: First off, amazing app. So many meditations to choose from. They have everything! From waking up, to focusing, to happiness, to anger and loss, and sleeping. You do have to pay a sloght amount for a membership, but it it so worth it. It helps calm down my mind for sleep every night, and I am not kidding when I say I fall asleep within 10 minutes of listening to pne of their sleepcasts. I highly recommend this for anyone and everyone.
title: Please Read This Review

review: Headspace used to always have a small portion of its app as free to use for everyone. Now even the things that were free you have to have a subscription for. Its sad to see that they have put a  high price tag on helping someone through a tough moment. I among many others will now be unable to use this app because the subscription is very expensive. There shouldn‚Äôt be a price on mental health. Its sad to see how far headspace has gotten from how they used to be. The small amount of free content was immensely helpful to me. I will miss not having that as an option but I guess being healthy mentally through mediation is now reserved for the rich.
title: Was good years ago‚Ä¶ not any more
developerResponse: {'id': 27626582, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.", 'modified': '2022-01-24T11:45:45Z'}

review: I‚Äôve been using the Headspace app for years to learn mindfulness in an effort to help control my anxiety. It‚Äôs been an incredibly useful tool. However, recently they have undergone some changes - adding new meditation guides and topics - that have made Headspace even better. One of the new guides, Dora, is incredibly calming and really resonates with me. Thanks for creating - and continuing to improve - an incredibly helpful product!
title: Been using for years - even better now

review: I‚Äôve tried a few of the most popular mediation apps, this by far my favorite one. By following the basics courses  and having that consistency each day for months I really learned how to meditate so I can use that skill whenever I need it. Some days if I have a stressful day at work I can go back to these methods and it always helps lessen my anxiety. I also love the other. Courses and the variety of courses offered.
title: Favorite meditation app‚Äîchanged my life

review:
I have tried many times during my life to meditate and I‚Äôve never been successful until now. Thanks to Headspace, I‚Äôm 1/2 way through the beginning pro course and I feel more confident that I am actually making progress. I also use the sleep soundscapes regularly, especially when I wake in the night. Today, I plan to try a walking meditation. 

In short, Headspace has proven to be an excellent meditation tool.
title: Perfect Learning Tools

review: I battle anxiety a lot, this app has helped me grow as a person. But more importantly me, I have found ways to help myself, and others to be able to understand and feel my feelings. I recommend this to anyone. Because even though you don‚Äôt have any stress or something emotionally bad, it can help you rest, sleep, relax, exercise, and train yourself to have a happy motivated day, or a relaxed calm evening. Thank you headspace.
title: Being brave in the hardest situation.

review: Meditation is hard. Life is distracting. I‚Äôve seen how Headspace has evolved over the years and honestly, at 25, having these little five to ten minute sessions ready and on tap to re center my brain and re-route my thinking away from negative or distressing patterns is exceptionally useful. Headspace on your phone is like keeping a first aid kit in your car: when you need it, you are super happy it‚Äôs there.
title: When you‚Äôre ready to learn self awareness, Headspace is there

review:
I have a lot of trouble with falling back to sleep, just going to sleep in general, so I decided I would try this app. Once I started listening to a falling back to sleep audio, I already could tell that I was starting to drift off with only 3 minutes into the audio. You can also switch people (coaches), which I really like. But yeah, I highly recommend this app, it works like a charm, and have a nice day.

Love the app!
title: Great App! I definitely recommend (for trouble falling back to sleep, stress, etc.)

review: I started using Headspace a couple of years ago during a stressful time and I am so impressed I‚Äôve continued using it daily. I love everything about it. I started using the sleep wind downs to help me sleep then one of the meditation courses and now added the move part. I look forward to the wake up every day. My husband has even started using the app. Great, thought out content. Has become a real asset to every part of my life.
title: Truly a great app

review: I had given up on meditating as basically I couldn‚Äôt stop my mind from wandering or the judgement of whether or not I was doing it properly. But, after watching the Netflix Headspace series, where Andy‚Äôs guidance and technique simplified the whole process beyond belief, I had to get the app and subscribe to the family pack so my partner and I could reap the benefits. Of all the apps I have ever downloaded or purchased this is by far the most beneficial ever!!! Thank-you to Andy and the Headspace team.
title: Used to struggle with meditation

review: Over the holidays, I suffered emotional and spiritual trauma resulting from a severe injury to a family member who has been hospitalized, battling depression, and suffering a concussion  from a fall. I was not able to sleep for almost 3 days due to my concussion, and the mental, spiritual and physical torment has been intense. I just started using headspace for sleeping at night and working on positivity for sports injury rehab. I‚Äôm looking forward to spending as much time as I can with meditating to heal my brain, spirit, heart and muscles (self).
title: Mental and physical health recovery and maintenance

review: I have always struggled with falling asleep and staying asleep so much so that I would pull all nighters on a weekly basis. Headspace‚Äôs Sleepcasts have changed my life. I look forward to getting into bed and choosing ‚Äúwhere I want to go‚Äù every night. My biggest comment would be to add more. I feel like there have been the same 40 or so sleep casts available for so long, and I‚Äôm so excited to have new favorites to hear too.
title: Headspace sleepcasts are a game changer

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost a year now and have loved it, until they released the new layout. There‚Äôs no other way to provide feedback other than to leave a review, so this is my way of letting the developers know that I hate the new layout. I would rather have a daily customized selection of content than to scroll through a long list and randomly select. Please stop trying to fix what isn‚Äôt broken!
title: Awesome app, awful new layout

review:
I have an annual subscription that I bought through my Apple Store and it‚Äôs been a month and I am still not able to use it, even after I paid for it. I‚Äôve tried to reach out to customer service and it‚Äôs taking forever. They do not have a phone number to call and solve this with someone on a call, their chat bot on their website is just useless with generic information and they only communicate through email and takes forever to respond to your emails.

review: I was getting into meditation and found the series they have on Netflix then I decided to invest in myself and buy the annual subscription, best decision ever, whenever I feel like I don‚Äôt have time to be alone with my thoughts and meditate this app has the option to do a 3 min meditation and I end up wanting more. The way this app is designed is amazing and life changing you won‚Äôt have excuses not to take care of your mental health.
title: This app changed my life

review: I really needed something to get me into mediation. I hadn‚Äôt been to therapy in a while since I relocated and I needed help with my anxiety. Headspace‚Äôs gentle and kind approach to meditation helped me get back on track to getting my mindset back up from where it was. It‚Äôs really easy to use and I really like that you can choose different courses, instructors, and length of time. I recommend this app to whoever I think may benefit from it all the time.
title: This app is a life saver

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace since 2020. Anytime I pause the 8 hour white noise (sounds) to go to the bathroom and I go back to bed (which would be under 2 minutes) the app will timeout and I would have to guess where I left off at and restart it.  Some other times I‚Äôll pause the app 6 or 7 hours into using it and I‚Äôll forget to end the session and when I‚Äôll go back into the app the previous session is still showing. It doesn‚Äôt make sense and is very annoying especially when I‚Äôm just pausing it to go to the bathroom.
title: Good app but‚Ä¶

review: This is one of those rare apps that is truly worth every penny. Headspace has supported me in building a legitimate mediation practice. I use this app almost daily to help manage my anxiety. I do almost all my meditations with Andy. I love the consistency and the option to choose your preferred voice. I‚Äôve also been getting into their sleep scapes which are a great way to slow down your mind if you‚Äôre having trouble winding down.
title: A great investment!

review: I really enjoyed the app at first. It was helping with my sleep issues and calming my anxiety. I enjoyed the beginner services and the daily meditation it gave. Then when I opened the app to meditate, everything was locked and I couldn‚Äôt use the beginner services. I understand making money but how to expect people to pay for a service they have not tried. Making money should not come at the expense of someone well-being. Definitely screams money hungry!! I really enjoyed the service but now that they make you pay for everything, will definitely make them lose customers . Would not even recommend this app to a toddler.
title: what happened to helping people

review: I‚Äôve tried meditation many times over the past 30 years but never felt I was doing it right. Until listening to Andy on Headspace! There is no wrong. How about that?! Also did the grief meditation series and finally let go of the sorrow I‚Äôve been carrying surrounding the death of my mother when I was 13. I now have been able to picture her smiling which is so very rewarding. Give Headspace a go! I‚Äôm confident you will thoroughly enjoy it!
title: The absolute BEST!

review: I tried headspace back in 2020 and loved it, but eventually fell out of my routine. Years later I picked it back up again in hopes to feel more present and calm during my day, and have more restful sleep at night. The first shift I noticed was in my sleep. I was able to fall asleep more quickly the nights I listened to a Wind Down and also stayed asleep through the night. Looking forward to experiencing a shift in my every day.
title: An Immediate Shift

review: I've signed up for the teens program that gives free access to premium content, and I'm very grateful for it. There's a ton of variety in what the app offers which makes it useful for whatever I need when I open the app. The daily plans it lays out set a good framework, and sleepcasts have made sleeping so much easier and less of a chore. Even if I had to pay full price, Headspace is definitely worth it.
title: reduces overwhelm in starting meditation

review: An email from Andy at Headspace just let me know we‚Äôve been together a year now. My husband gifted me a one year subscription ofHeadspace when he learned I was learning to meditate on my own. It was one of the most thoughtful and life changing gifts I have ever received. Mentally, I am stronger and in a much more positive place. My outlook on life is brighter and hopeful despite my every day challenges and the darkness that exists in the world. I definitely recommend.
title: Life Changing

review:
After one of the most stressful days , finding this app was like a golden blanket draping over me. A safe haven . A place to go where nobody needs me and I can only focus on how I am and how I feel. I am a black single mother who works 3 jobs and has a beautiful 10 year old little girl who needs and deserves me at my best for her sake and her growth. Thank-you for creating somewhere for me to recharge , feel safe , and  feel valued .

Forever grateful 
Miele ukee
title: The golden blanket

review: Was brand new to meditating when I first got this app a few years ago. Even though I have some experience now, I still continue to use it. I really like that they are moving meditations and different series to help you through the various challenges in life. I also love that there‚Äôs a children‚Äôs section. My children ask for Andy by name when they have a nightmare or when they‚Äôve had a rough day.
title: Perfect for all ages

review:
This is the only app I have ever paid for and it is so worth. It has been a vital piece to learning to
Manage my anxiety and taking care of my mental health. I am Not an amazing meditator and eat distracted easily but I absolutely love listening to Andy talk. His voice is so soothing. They all are, but especially him.
I have recommended this to many friends and will continue to do so. 
I‚Äôve also used it to get my kids back to sleep in the middle of the night!
title: Love this app

review: I got the ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù two years ago. I the app was alright, but not worth $14 IMO. So i tried to cancel it every month since then. I have changed my card twice. They somehow find it and find a way to charge it. I have informed capital one to no avail. There is absolutely no way to cancel this app once you begin your subscription, so I highly recommend you are 110% sure you want this app because there is no phone number and the email is automated. If you try to cancel it will just pretend like you don‚Äôt know what you are talking about and go in circles until you give up. Then charge you next month
title: Just know that if you give these people your card number, it‚Äôs a lifelong subscription.

If you have any other questions, please send us a note to help@headspace.com. ", 'modified': '2021-03-14T17:42:28Z'}

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace app for over a month and consider myself a beginner in mindfulness practices. I‚Äôm headed into a new chapter in life with many changes about to occur so my anxiety levels are running high. I‚Äôve come to count on this app and the daily practices to help me manage my anxiety and to help me focus. I highly recommend this app. There is so much to explore on here as well but the daily ‚Äúagenda‚Äù they provide helps me not get overwhelmed by it.
title: It works!

review:
I got the app because it was free. Yes, it says in app purchases, but I figured that would be for premium content, and there would be, at least, some things that were free to use. NOTHING is free. Literally, if you want to do anything, YOU HAVE to pay for the subscription. The subscription is monthly or annually. I don‚Äôt care if an app isn‚Äôt free. I am not going to act like I am entitled to free content, but I do believe it should at least say something about the fact that you cannot use any of it without paying. downloaded it and made an account for no reason. waste of time. 
thank you for reading. <3
title: unless you are willing to pay, do not download.

review: I really like all the available courses and little videos. I can tell a lot of hard work and passion was put into this app. I do get a little lost though navigating sometimes to find courses or at least find the section where you can browse through courses. Sometimes I miss the old versions of headspace where you could just tap on a courses tab. With all the new content pumped out by headspace I get a little overwhelmed by it all.
title: Mindfulness Can Change Your Life

review: Tbh I thought this app was hella expensive at first for what it is. I felt silly doing meditation initially but after about a week I really started to see the benefits. And there are so many uses for it and so much content on the app beyond just meditation. I use it on walks, to ground myself when I‚Äôm angry or upset, to help me energize in the morning and wind down at night‚Ä¶just so many benefits. Highly recommend downloading it!
title: Use it Right, Change Your Life

review: i love  it . andy‚Äôs voice is so calming and last night i did one of the sleep one and i fell asleep before i was even half way into the meditation . it was 20 minutes long , this has really helped me especially when i wake up in the middle of the night and can‚Äôt go back to sleep i use the ‚Äúfalling back to sleep‚Äù one . i‚Äôm a high school student , this is amazing to me and i love it . i‚Äôm actually on my way to tell my friends about this app .
title: WOW WOW WOW!!!

review: Headspace has been so helpful to me at times when I am anxious, stressed or exhausted. I love the variety of individuals who lead the meditation. Their voices alone are soothing. The topics are relevant and often what I struggle with such as worry, finances, relationships, stress at work  etc. I love the videos and characters as they make me laugh and are a fun break from the daily grind. Thank you for all you do for so many. Headspace really does make a difference in my life.
title: What I love about Headspace

review:
Really liking Headspace overall but after a few months it is getting pretty stale as there is no new content.   New sleep cast rarely come out out and when they do there seems to be only 2-3 of them every 6 months or so.  It can‚Äôt be that hard to get someone to read a script and release new audio monthly?

Unless more frequent content updates start occurring I‚Äôll likely cancel my subscription on the renewal date.
title: Great app but needs more frequent content updates..

review: Weather you are a beginner,intermediate, or expert at meditating headspace is great! I started with headspace at the beginning or the quarantine! As everything went into lockdown I was spending a lot more time at home and that allowed me to get inside of my head too much. Started having massive anxiety attacks. I recognized that I needed to do something about this. I turned to headspace! With the help of headspace, my attacks have become almost non existent! Thank you!
title: Headspace is great for anyone

review: As a long time yoga practitioner, I knew how helpful meditation is, but with the stress of the pandemic and even before that I just wasn‚Äôt doing it. Headspace got me back to sitting again. I love and his voice, I love all the choices they give you in terms of what you wanna focus on or how long you want to practice. The basics one course with its three minute meditations was exactly what I needed to rememberHow good it feels to just sit.
title: Headspace makes meditating as easy as pressing play

review: I have been using headspace for 2 years.  It has been a game changer for me.  For less than the cost of 1 or 2 counseling sessions, you can have one full year of numerous ways to meditate.  I thought I would not renew this October, but I realize that I need the guidance while meditating.  I love the many courses you can take to improve your well-being in multiple areas if your life.  I highly recommend Headspace!!
title: 2 years and counting‚Ä¶

review: Definitely 7 stars! I would guess that most people take  up meditation because of some issue in their lives. No matter what the issue, headspace has a meditation for that. And it‚Äôs not a one and done type of thing. Once you start headspace for whatever your issue happens to be, you will find that meditation using Headspace becomes a part of your daily routine. It‚Äôs indispensable!
title: Try it, you can thank me later.

review: I recently encountered an issue accessing Headspace. So, I immediately reached out to customer support. No sooner had I hit the ‚Äòsend button‚Äô I received a reply with clear guidance on how to correct my issue. And, it worked! I was not only impressed with the immediate response, but also the quality and the follow-up to be sure my issue had been resolved. This is a model that all companies should follow! Thank you Headspace!
title: Best Support

review: I am an ER nurse and have been using headspace to meditate before work. I feel that it helps center me and gives me a few  moments of calm before the chaos of my work day. I am also IN LOVE with the sleep stories. I used to fall asleep with the TV on and have a restless night. Now I put a sleep story on and fall to sleep quickly and sleep much more soundly. I have recommended this app to many friends at work! Keep up the great work!
title: Perfect for a busy mind!

review: If you have never tried meditation, the you must give it a try right now. It will allow you to discover your inner self. It will give you confidence, increase your focus, improve your stamina, and much more. We all should be spending at least 5 to 10 minutes every day, no matter what‚Äôs happening in your life. I just reached 500 days streak. The feeling is unique. Try it today!
title: A must have App for mindfulness

review: This app and the amazing teachers, lessons, sleep casts, and more have changed my life. Im finding it quite difficult to even put into words how magnificent this app has been for transforming my outlook on my relationships, myself, my presence, and just about every singular aspect of my life. It has been the best decisions I have ever made and I have never once had a doubt in my mind that this wasn‚Äôt the best choice I ever made for myself.
title: A Bright New Perspective

review: A bit of back information, I have anger issues, really bad, and when my sister and I get into fights I use this app to calm me down. I go to my room. And let this app carry me away. It is amazing and please support this app. It deserves so much for how much it helps people. This app will not waste your time. Meditating is so good for the mind. And there are free sessions. Please get this app. I think if everyone had a dose of meditation a day, it would help a lot.
title: The best app ever

review: I was new to meditations when I found this app, but was looking for something that was less spiritual. The user friendliness of it instantly caught my attention. I love having daily reminders and fun short, digestible videos to help recenter me. I support anyone who is looking for a meditation app that is more like cognitive therapy to give this an opportunity. With new videos, subject matters, and playlist I‚Äôm exciting to continue my journey with this supportive app.
title: Download This App!

review: I love knowing that Headspace is always available for me to turn to to lead me in a meditation when I need it.  I am able to yank myself out of any prevailing turmoil in my head and take a few minutes to reset, calm down and adopt a new perspective.  It has also been phenomenal for my sleep pattern.  If I wake in the night, I simply breathe and focus on the breath as in the guided meditations and miraculously fall back asleep in no time.  This has been a worthwhile investment in myself indeed!
title: Handy connection to sanity

review: Headspace is an unmatched tool providing help and support when it‚Äôs difficult to calm the busy mind. I also use the sleep button to explore ways to fall back asleep after waking in the middle of the night and the music option to help fall asleep. My daily ritual is listening to the Wake Up first thing before starting my day. Thank you HeadSpace for keeping the content fresh and interesting.
title: Helping the Busy Mind

review: I haven‚Äôt checked the app out in a while and decided to give it a download. I can‚Äôt even give a proper review because everything is locked. Only the video to introducing the app. You need to pay for literally everything else. If they care so much about well being, how come they‚Äôre costing to even get to at least the FIRST video when earlier it was free? They claim that they have other free projects but you need to pay in some way to get access to that. It‚Äôs clear they‚Äôre main priority is getting into your wallets rather than improving the app for people who need it or even helping people like they claim they are.
title: A shell of what it used to be
developerResponse: {'id': 39600831, 'body': "Thank you so much for your feedback! Our mission at Headspace is to improve the health and happiness of the world, and if we don't have a healthy business, there is no way for us to fulfill this mission. We believe that our products provide value to the world and that is why we must charge a fee: to run a sustainable business and provide a healthy work environment for our hard-working team. We employ animators, illustrators, project managers, finance controllers, customer experience representatives, as well as a full internal engineering team and marketing/community managers to make sure our message is being spread. Not to mention all the scientists that we work with to help us prove the validity of our products. We do still offer free content outside of the app on social media channels and still offer K-12 organizations free memberships in the US, UK, Australia, and Canada. If you have any suggestions or additional feedback for us, please reach out to our support team at: Help@Headspace.com.", 'modified': '2023-10-18T23:12:53Z'}

review:
I had used this app for a couple of months and thought it had some really nice tips and tricks to help manage my anxiety. I did notice a lot of repetitive content but I bought the app on discount so I dealt with it. 

Then June rolled around. The app pushes far left woke culture attempting to force us to believe in agendas which aren‚Äôt biblically correct. I choose not to listen to this type of garbage so unfortunately I had to delete the app. Instead of doing what they did best, the company attempted to join the rest of the left culture and force their ideas onto us. No thanks! 

I‚Äôve stopped my subscription and wish this company the best with their skewed ideologies.

review: These guided meditations have helped me get through a lot of tough times. A consistent meditation practice was something I always aspired to have but had no idea how to achieve.  With Andy‚Äôs guidance I‚Äôve learned different meditation techniques and can now meditate by myself unguided, but I always come back to do the different packs like loneliness, anxiety, happiness and grief, depending on what is going on in my life. I have had this app since 2017 and I absolutely love it.
title: Phenomenon app

review: Meditation is a proven therapeutic exercise for your mind. It has so many positive impacts and yet it‚Äôs so hard to start and stick with. This app is beautifully and thoughtfully designed to do those 2 things. I have been using it for 3 years and love it. It‚Äôs simple and impactful. I have been paying for it but pretty sure the free version is a great tool to get started too. Happy meditation!
title: Just perfect to help you get into meditation and make it a habit

review: I turn to this app when I am the most stressed. I have used it for many years now. I appreciate it because it meets me where I am, and let‚Äôs me do lightweight meditations that range from 5-20 minutes in my practice with virtually no effort. Often, I wake up, and start the day by just trying to center myself. I find a quiet spot, and start a session. I always wind up more serene afterwards, lighter and less at the whim of the day.
title: I love this app.

review:
After expressing to my doctor that I had been struggling more with anxiety recently, she suggested that I try meditating (and even mentioned Headspace by name). I was hesitant at first (like, ‚Äúwho is going to PAY for meditation?? It probably won‚Äôt even work.‚Äù). Let me tell you, I have only ‚Äúmeditated‚Äù 1 time, but I‚Äôve used the array of other things offered and dang! The breathing exercises alone are worth the money. 

I have suffered panic attacks for a little more than 15 years, and this app is the first thing I have found that can 
1. Stop it before it starts 
2. Help me during one 

This app is a blessing, I have told everyone I know about it because I just love it so much. A huge thank you to the developers, I‚Äôve gotten my life back!
title: Doctor Recommended and I can‚Äôt Thank Her Enough

review:
I am a recovering alcoholic from 10 years and other substance. My mind has been raging with anger and misunderstanding. I‚Äôve became a miserable person from it. I‚Äôve pushed my loved ones away from alcohol and substance addiction With the tools this app is teaching me.I am now learning how to become a better person, how to see the good in life, how to ground myself, how to relax my mind,And last and how to love myself. 

Thank you
title: This has helped me

review: While this app is supposed to be useful and I‚Äôve heard about it from multiple ads online I‚Äôm incredibly annoyed. I first downloaded the app late 2021 and was unpleased to see that a lot of their offerings were locked to anyone who didn‚Äôt pay. I was able to get past it and utilize what they did offer for free. However lately I‚Äôve been restless in bed and tried to use the app to help my sleeplessness, but I‚Äôve found that EVERYTHING requires payment. It‚Äôs incredibly irritating and annoying. The app is marketed to help with meditation, sleep etc, but NOTHING is free. What‚Äôs the point of downloading a free mediation app if all of the programs in the app are free.
title: Seriously?

review: i have been using the app for a year and it is the reason i sleep at night. so you see i get into bed and set my alarm and then go to headspace to rest up the rain sound ( it‚Äôs the only sound i have used) and i come to see that i now have to pay 12$ to listen to it monthly. i appreciate the last year of sleeping but the timing is horrible i have my black belt testing tomorrow and i took PSAT‚Äôs this week all i need is a good nights rest this week. please dont charge for the rain i understand for the fitness or the meditation but a simple rain sound goes a long way.

review: I have honestly changed for the better with this app and I use the tools I‚Äôve learned every day. It is truly life-changing. Any way you can make an ipad friendly app? When I find myself in difficult situations mentally, I am always reminded to pay attention to my breath and let my thoughts pass through me because sometimes our thoughts don‚Äôt need to be taken so seriously. Thank you for helping my mindfulness journey, Headspace.

title: Headspace

It would be great and very convenient to be able to edit what appears on the Today tab. For example, I am taking one of the courses and would like to continue it everyday. It would be much more accessible for the course that I am continuing to appear on the Today tab.
title: Great App! Would add a feature to edit ‚ÄúToday‚Äù tab

review: I‚Äôve never written a review before, but Headspace has made my life‚Äîand my family members‚Äô lives‚Äîbetter. It has helped decrease anxiety, improve sleep, increase creativity. It‚Äôs a meaningful experience, which I can say about very little else on my phone. I‚Äôm grateful for this app and experience. It takes a little patience but eventually you will have a better relationship with your own mind.
title: Made My  Life Better

review: Headspace is incredible! They offer such a wide variety of activities in mindfulness. I love their yoga, they have great workouts, and so many wonderful meditation options. The letting go of stress course has helped me a lot and they have a hip stretch on here that is AMAZING! I listen to sleep music or a sleep cast every night and my sleep has improved so much. Downloading this app was the best decision I ever made, my body and mind is happier and healthier because of it!
title: Love this app

review: Headspace has been a game changer for me. I‚Äôve become more mindful and at peace with the challenges that arise every day. I‚Äôve been able to encourage others to tackle their anxiety and issues through mindfulness and even walked my colleagues through a focusing meditation. I didn‚Äôt realize how much I would come to appreciate taking this space and time for silence until I started to reap the benefits! Would recommend using this app every day 10/10!
title: Game changing!
