I know you need to make money but your main thing should be people‚Äôs relaxation. For example I have trouble sleeping and the calming music is memberships only‚Ä¶why should members have a quick sleep? Once again this app is so calming and would 100% recommend but (if the president of the app is reading this) please stop the membership stuff‚Ä¶. :)
title: Love it but‚Ä¶

review:
Am so grateful for this app!!  I am an entry level practitioner, and I appreciate the guided meditations, as well as, the group meditations.  I love the sound meditations, particularly the ocean pier recordings,  which help me to relax before sleeping.  One day, maybe I will be fit enough to try the exercisesüòú.   
 Headspace has been a much-appreciated respite from the stress of frontline covid and from 24/7 political stress.  Truly.
Thank you for all that you do to make this practice  understandable and available!üôÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: Nothing like it.  Transformative experiences.  Brain training.  Life changing for me!! Happier, healthier.
title: Transformative brain training-Happier, healthier.

review:
I enjoy using headspace. I mostly use it for sleep casts and other sleep related things. I am disappointed with the recent changes to the UI in the sleep cast section. It is harder to find what I want and the names of my favorite ones have changed. 
The biggest issue with the app is navigating to find what you want, sure a list of meditations to use throughout the day might be beneficial but when I want to meditate it is usually in response to a stressful situation not a time of the day. Maybe I am just different.
title: Good app poor changes

review: I started using this app about 3 years ago, but more often in the past 2 years. The meditation courses are excellent. I never thought I‚Äôd be able to relax into a meditation practice, but the teachers are clear and calm and I‚Äôve been surprised at how easy it is to get into that space and how some quick mental breaks and cues or breathing exercises can help me refocus my day. The Sleepcasts are nothing short of miraculous!
title: Great source of stability

review: I genuinely love having this app in my life. I started out having never meditated in my life. Now it‚Äôs hard to imagine not having meditation in my routine. Of course, there are times I have let my practice go, but this app is always waiting for me when I return. The classes, sleep sounds, mindful fitness, and everything else this app has to offer makes it an invaluable tool for me. Highly recommend.
title: Worth Every Penny

review: Having suffered from insomnia on and off fior decades I had high hopes for the sleep cast. Mediocre at best. The stories end in 20-23 minutes. Then you get you same old rain etc. no offers of different lengths. So if you can stay asleep after a brief 20 minute story and just listen to the same old same old it is fine. If you‚Äôre like some of us that require 60 to 90 to 120 minutes keep going elsewhere. I contacted customer service and was told it is what it is. So I won‚Äôt be renewing and I regret pre-paying for a year I think it‚Äôs a waste of money  Some of the other things are nice but without proper sleep the rest of it really doesn‚Äôt matter.

so... i can say this app is like- one of my most used apps because i use it every single night... and the fact that im homesick pretty much all the times i leave my house. this just is... YASSS QUEEN. im kind of sad that you need to pay for some off the stuff.... but otherwise im happy for the things they have on it ‚ù§Ô∏è it helps me manage my anxiety & stress and i just love it ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: more then amazing ü§©

review:
I went into this app biased against meditation. It never seemed to work for me. But with these guided meditations, I‚Äôve really been able to truly relax in a way I‚Äôm almost never able to do. 

There are so many courses and voices to choose from, although quite a few of them require a paid membership to use. I personally think it‚Äôs worth it to pay $60 for a year as that‚Äôs less than one therapy session for a whole year‚Äôs worth of calm! 

The meditations get a bit repetitive, but there‚Äôs only so much to change about the process. The app also occasionally malfunctions.

Overall I highly recommend trying out the free trial! I was highly skeptical going into it, but I am very pleasantly surprised by my experience so far.
title: A newfound sense of calm

Can you please add the ability to cast to the television device? We have a Google Chromecast and it would be great to be able to cast the workout videos to a larger screen.

review: Like any tool or technique, mindfulness is as useful as your ability to practice, build new capabilities, and the. enact this in everyday life.  Headspace makes it easy and inviting to make common knowledge into common practice with a variety of teachers, programs and content that will invite you back over and over.  I can‚Äôt think of an aspect of life that hasn‚Äôt improved a little or a lot as a result of consistently practicing with Headspace.  Thank you!
title: Essential Companion for a Healthier and Happier Life

I came here to the App Store and found an update, I updated, but still it is buffering. review: I‚Äôve been using this app for months and am very pleased with it. I struggle with a lot of anxiety and using this app daily really helps to calm me down during the meditations. I use the practices they‚Äôve taught me on my own outside of the app as well when I feel I need to reign back in my thoughts and emotions. Andy and Eve‚Äôs voices are so soothing to me and it‚Äôs comforting to have a partner or two on this journey of trying to achieve a calm mind and calm being! Highly recommend!
title: Very helpful and useful!

review: I asked my 30 year old grandson to consider meditating, when he told me he was struggling with bipolar disorder. After we talked I realized I was prescribing he try something I‚Äôd never tried. The next day I got the Headspace app and began a daily practice that helps me experience real healing energy every day. 18 months and counting of sending my grandson centering energy while sorting out my own life challenges. I am so grateful and continue!!
title: Grandmothering

review: Sheesh it‚Äôs gotten cluttered, expensive, and difficult to find my old fav speaker who was here at the beginning. With no real free content just to even do a 5min test run. I used up my one time free trial and became a paying customer at the beginning. Every so often I come back to the app that used to be so good a reasonable affordable. But now you want $13m! Well first show me your worth it. Can‚Äôt be too confident if not even a subject or teacher‚Äôs first simple meditation is free.
title: Used to be a life changer

review: I have been doing daily meditation in my morning routine now for a couple of weeks. They have amazing lessons that change everyday! I think to make it even more awesome, they could introduce a guided journal prompt or something everyday that goes with that days meditation? I usually write about the meditation but it would be amazing to have a pointed question that allows for some thought provoking answers. But other than that, I recommend! Love love
title: Pretty great, almost perfect.

review:
I‚Äôve been subscribing to headspace for a number of years now. And while I try and do it every day.  I always find myself skipping a day here and there. And I realize that I‚Äôve messed up. Most important thing though is getting back to it and continuing with my practice. 
I love the way Andy talks to us. I love the artwork. I love the addition of the new voices and instructors. I really can‚Äôt think of anything not to be happy with.
title: Andy and Headspace‚Äôs

review: Using it everyday, using sleep sounds. Still exploring what to find, relaxing helps with breathing, still not quite doing meditations without mind wandering off. That‚Äôs a message if I wander off clearing your mind, I must really wander off doing normal things. Concentrating on getting something done without stressing over 10 more things, wandering off focus and getting nothing done. Being overwhelmed I‚Äôm working on.
title: Progress

review: I was becoming hopeless. Started doing grief counseling but there are other issues in my life I can‚Äôt talk about there that weigh heavy on my self-being. This app helps me calm myself and reflect more peacefully. Like instead of going to a real safari, no car or anyone to protect you, it‚Äôs like going to a zoo in which you get close to dangerous animals, but they aren‚Äôt as threatening. The zoo is humane too, unlike some real ones‚Ä¶
title: A Real Difference

review: I was really super excited to try this app. I still am. The stories look great, and there are so many options. I paid for a month already before even trying it! However, anything I play, plays for a few seconds and stops for a few. Then plays for a few and then stops again. This is literally the opposite of relaxing and is only making my anxiety worse! I tried letting it load before playing. I turned off my Wi-Fi. Re download the app. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs wrong or how to fix it.
title: Buggy/Choppy
developerResponse: {'id': 26064573, 'body': "We're truly sorry to hear that but we're more than glad to help! Please send us an email over at help@headspace.com", 'modified': '2021-11-03T18:36:25Z'}

review: I‚Äôve used a couple of different meditation apps, but Headspace is my favorite. I like how they aren‚Äôt overly-philosophical or mystical in their approach to their meditation exercises. They keep it relatively simple and offer a variety of exercises and courses for different situations. I also really like the narrators‚Äô voices and styles. I‚Äôve used some of the Sleepcasts too; they‚Äôre nice, but the meditation exercises are the best part of the app and the most life-changing for me personally.
title: The best

review: Headspace has given me the space to train my mind.  It‚Äôs a workout for my Mind. One step at a time, I can feel the strength growing.  You will see how diverse the options are for however much and how ever hard  you want to work your mind.  Work it lightly if you want, you will only improve your ability to focus your awareness,  however you decide to work it.  Gratitude for the Headspace!
title: Only One Way To Go

review: Nearly 800 days of meditation with Headspace, Andy and the team are absolutely incredible. The mind is free, open, accepting and what comes through to a mind like that is unexplainable and beautiful. Mediation, awareness, and gratitude have helped fill our lives with so much love and compassion, cannot recommend this app and way of being enough. Seizures are a thing of the past, spinning thoughts have quelled, and every form of the mind is accepted.
title: Life-Changing

review: I start my day out with the Wake Up and then do the guided meditation. I love this app, it‚Äôs helped me with my anxiety and to actually be still and enjoy the quiet. I also love the focus music on here. It‚Äôs really helped me to find peace and learn how to deal with life‚Äôs daily challenges. This app has been a lifesaver and I love all the coaches on here. It has really helped me become a healthier person mentally and emotionally. Thank you Headspace.
title: Favorite Part of My Day

review: I wanted to try the app out for the 7 day free period. Decided I wasn‚Äôt really gonna use it much and have been trying to cancel it for months. Just got a random 25 dollars payment fee from them after trying for months to cancel it. The app freaked out and would malfunction every time I tried to cancel and there was no real phone number to call. This is ridiculous u can‚Äôt force people to use your product and steal from them. My account had already been terminated and the payments were supposedly expired and they still somehow charged me. Don‚Äôt use this app you‚Äôll never be able to get out. Ridiculous.
title: Cancellation

review: I have been doing headspace meditation for a few months now.  I can feel the changes in the way I  handle everyday things. I don‚Äôt dwell on things or feel unable to cope. I am calmer. It really has helped me. The way they have set up headspace keeps my attention. I love to learn new things and they provide you with a wonderful program. If more people used it , it would be a better world .
title: How headspace helped me

review:
Was going to give this app a try and signed up for the free week‚Äôs trial hoping for the best. Didn‚Äôt even get to use it before they charged me for an annual subscription. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll like it, but that‚Äôs messed up since I just wanted to try something new.

I may change my review later if this is all friends have said it will be, mostly just annoyed they shorted me like that.
title: So much for ‚Äútrying it out‚Äù

review: I love the app I use to fall asleep and calm down but there needs to be more free options especially for the sleep parts, I need to save as much money as possible so I think you could add more free options I would deeply appreciate that because if I listen to the same thing over and over again I think i might get bored of so I want more variety and options to choose from that are free. I mean this in the nicest way possible, Thank you for reading.
title: Great but‚Ä¶

review:
When I am focused and intentional in my daily routine Headspace helps me start my day grounded.  Unfortunately from time to time I let life get in the way of my self-care. I‚Äôm still working on that so I always find my way back. 

The meditations are easy to follow while providing foundational principles and practices that resonate with me. In addition to the meditations there are many other life enhancing resources available in the Headspace app.
title: I Love Headspace

review: I‚Äôve recently been having a lot of trouble sleeping and I‚Äôve tried many things. This app is absolutely incredible, I‚Äôve tried it for a week and I‚Äôve been sleeping amazing and had no problems at all. If you have had trouble sleeping or just need to relieve stress from your day, use this app. Thank you for making this app, it‚Äôs helped me out so much in such a short amount of time
title: Absolutely Amazing

review:
Thank you for adding captions for deaf and hard of hearing people!!!!!!

Thank you for paying Dora Kamau hopefully lots of money and inviting her to record the courses: Basics 2, 3, Managing Anxiety, and maybe more I haven‚Äôt yet discovered and downloaded!!!

‚Äî

review:
I suffer with depression, bp disorder, and I‚Äôm a huge consumer and bottler of stress. I seek professional treatment but I‚Äôve never been interested in therapy, until I met a therapist who introduced me to meditation.

Mediation is the holy grail of a journey to happier and healthier you. 

Whether you suffer from a mental or physical illness or none at all, give this a try and you will see huge improvements in your life‚Äîphysically, mentally, socially, etc. 

This is not a substitute for treatment, so keep that in mind. But it has seriously improved my life in every aspect. My relationships, my view of myself, my thought process, etc. recognizing emotions before I act on them. 

Cheers to the crew of Headspace. They have meditation for every topic and every level. I have learned so much. Thank you.
title: If the Mind is Healthy...

review: I have ADHD and this has been one of the best ways I have to help myself. That said, I have ADHD, sometimes I lose steam for a pack and quit halfway through. I want to re-train those aspects I didn't finish working through, so sometimes I would like to reset it so I don't have to remember where I was from day to day until I catch up! Other than that, helpful in a lot of ways and not just for regular people!
title: 1 missing feature from perfection

review: I love this app and have been using it over the last year, both before the pandemic hit and over the latest 11 months. It has been a lifesaver during successive lockdowns I‚Äôm my area and has given me support and structure for a meditation practice. The additional cameo appearances during ‚Äúthe wake up‚Äù have been really grounding as well. Thank you to the entire Headspace community for your inspiration and insight to navigate these challenging times.
title: Lifesaver

review: I signed up for the free trial as the app is very expensive and I wasn‚Äôt sure it‚Äôs for me.  App itself is great, really liked the sleep meditation.  However I decided it‚Äôs not for me and within one week I followed all steps provided by Headspace to cancel the service.  Immediately received a confirmation from them stating they received my cancellation request.  But at the end of two weeks today I was charged for the annual subscription amount.  I have no way to contact them except an email address that I have no idea if they check.  A CS chat option would be nice for issues like this.  At this point it looks like I need to go to my bank to dispute the charges.
title: ‚ÄúFree‚Äù Trial wasn‚Äôt free

review:
I downloaded this app several years ago and almost immediately purchased the full version. 

Learning to meditate via the app has seen me through a slew of personal and professional crises. No matter what is going on in my life, I know I can carve out even just a few minutes for this important self-care.

I owe an incredible debt of gratitude to Andy and all the people behind the app for helping me learn how to meditate and allowing me to discover how to just BE.
title: Lifesaver

review: Been using daily since 2017. Excellent options to help you focus on wellbeing and letting go of the often barrage of thoughts‚Ä¶with focus on your breathe.  Just 3 or 5 or 10 minutes each morning to start the day.  And when I can‚Äôt sleep or wake up in middle of night there are exercises or soothing music to listen to that help me go back to sleep.  Highly recommend!
title: Great tool Lots of options

review: It‚Äôs helped me get through some tough times. You have to keep practicing and meditating to get results consistently. It won‚Äôt work after one session, or maybe it will work for you after one session. But after I‚Äôve always practiced, it‚Äôs changed my life for the better. Thank you, Andy and the headspace team! You made me feel normal again and helped me become more mindful.
title: Great meditation app

review: I want to start by thanking Headspace. They really care about people and making the world a better place. If you download Headspace and make it a part of your day, it only take a few mins a day, you will be a happier, healthier, better version of you. They have tools for EVERY aspect of life. Thank you Headspace, for making my head space a better place to exist.
title: An app that makes the world a better place.

review: I have over 400 minutes of meditation in and I use it wherever I go. I tell all of my friends and family about it, and how much it has helped me. There are so many different topics you can choose from, and if you‚Äôre stuck they have everyday recommendations. I actually set a reminder to rate this app so that people know how amazing it is. I use it everyday, multiple times a day.
title: My Favorite App

review: I have tried other apps and Headspace is by far my favorite!  The ability to customize practices is great and the sheer variety of practices is amazing.  I also love that not only is there meditation, but sleep and exercise options.  I use sleepcasts or sleep music every night for over a year now and the improvement in my sleep has been life changing.  I highly recommend this app to everyone!
title: Love this app!

review: Stressful moments have always been very present in my life, from school to work or friendships, etc. This app has transformed the way I think and view my thinking, and is always there when I need a moment of peace. Whenever I feel myself becoming too overwhelmed, I open Headspace. The app has become part of my daily routine. The meditations are simple yet so effective for me. Worth every penny :)
title: most life-changing app

review: I‚Äôve used this app & the techniques it has taught me on & off since 2018. I‚Äôve noticed that, despite truly being a good app with beneficial courses to improve one‚Äôs mental health, almost every single feature is now locked behind a Money Wall/Pay Wall. I can‚Äôt help but wonder if I was wrong about the people behind this app, seeing as I originally thought that their intentions were good. Now, I‚Äôm not so sure. I shouldn‚Äôt have to pay a chunk of money to be able to access courses, techniques, & patterns that can actually help me cope with my anxiety.
title: Great App.. If It Wasn‚Äôt For The Money Wall

review: The app is great and mindfulness is great, but I want to comment specifically on the sleepcasts. I use them nearly every night and I have never reached the end of one. I couldn‚Äôt tell you what happens after the first 15 minutes of most, in fact. They are SO calming and reliable that I am always asleep within minutes of starting them. If you struggle with sleep, I have to recommend Headspace.
title: Reliably great

review: I was finally able to relax again after doing a few days of meditation. My mind is calm more often than not now and I can see the difference if I skip too many days of meditation. Once I start back up again the mind is quiet and still again, and my body releases the tension it was holding. Thanks Andy and the Headspace team! I really appreciate everything you do.
title: Thanks Headspace

review: I first learned of Headspace through their sleep show on Netflix. Since it helped me get more rest, this lead me into understanding the power of meditation. Finally, I signed up for the Headspace App. I love the courses and really look forward to morning breath work and the The Wake-Up everyday. The music selection helps me with focusing in on daily tasks that I once dreaded, but now can complete. I highly recommend this app.
title: Love Headspace

review: I never write reviews. Headspace is always there when I need it. I have been using it for 18 months. I have focused of the courses ‚ÄúSelf Compassion‚Äù and ‚ÄúAcceptance,‚Äù gladly going the the ten sessions of each at least five times over because this stuff takes a minute to learn and a lifetime to master. Headspace brings structure and joy to both. Thank you for being my companion, Headspace!
title: Always there when I need it

review:
I adore this app. It‚Äôs a wonderful prebiotic; a consolidated therapy resource for easing everyday stress and even SOS panic moments. 

They say to take probiotics everyday to keep the body and gut healthy. Though not everybody can afford traditional therapy (your ‚Äòprobiotics‚Äô), this app acts like a prebiotic that compliments your current therapy, or can be a nutritional supplement to treat your mental health long-term. 

Everything from workouts, yoga classes for situations and moods, meditations, topic specific courses, sleep guidance and podcasts, this lil app is a house for health. 

I‚Äôve benefited by being able to handle stress, anxiety and general emotions so much more productively rather than reactively. This app has helped me build a healthy daily routine to gently heal stress and feel more open, happy and free!
title: Best Mental Health App On The Market!

review: Meditation is never easier or more enjoyable than with Headspace. The cartoon aesthetic is always engaging and puts me at ease. The themes, collections, and sheer variety of meditation and related activities & content is staggering, and I‚Äôm humbled that I‚Äôll never make it through everything. I love the instructors, Headspace‚Äôs intentional attention to representation & inclusion, and that I can stop & relax for as long or as little as I want where‚Äôve I am ‚ú®
title: The best app I have

review:
Let me preface with this‚Ä¶ any app worth it‚Äôs salt pushing health and especially mental health should be 100% FREE TO ALL.

This used to be free to healthcare workers. Last I checked we are still in the middle of a pandemic {dunno about y‚Äôall} but as I write this mid-February 2022, my hospital has never been more overwhelmed with COVID patients, sick staff, and hemorrhaging employees- most are our best workers too! Healthcare workers are flat out leaving the field. And not just us. Teachers too! 

Many are also suffering from the loss of loved ones, isolation, and forfeiting dreams {our olympians are not immune to COVID}. 

Anyone who wants to profit off that suffering is disgusting and‚Ä¶ well, this is why I don‚Äôt have mental health apps on my phone.  If anyone knows of one that‚Äôs COMPLETELY FREE TO ALL- and I don‚Äôt mean a ‚Äúfree version‚Äù where you end up paying for extras, do let me know. I will 100% support that.

So long Headspace. Thanks, not for the opportunity, but for making it so easy for me to turn down.
title: Not Free for Healthcare Workers
developerResponse: {'id': 27952460, 'body': "Please send us an email at help@headspace.com to go over our recent changes, we understand and we apologize for any trouble but we'd be more than glad to explain. \r\n ", 'modified': '2022-02-09T19:24:08Z'}

review:
I‚Äôm not one to leave reviews and this is actually my first App Store review. 

I came across Headspace about 6 months ago. I was very hesitant to sign up due to its apparent pricing - I thought it was expensive. I‚Äôm also a beginner at meditating so I couldn‚Äôt justify paying for this app. 

Fast forward, I threw in the towel and decided to sign up (at least for the free trial). 

It has only been 4 days but I‚Äôm OBSESSED with this app. I‚Äôm in love!! 
This app offers so much from meditation, sleep, yoga, courses, and much more. There‚Äôs a lot to explore in the in the app and I find the price to be very fair considering what I get from it. 

Headspace - you‚Äôve found a long term happy customer here. Please keep doing whatever your doing because this is app is kicka**.
title: Let me tell you‚Ä¶.

review: Not only great for me but great for my 9 year old! It gives us the chance to meditate together before going to sleep. She‚Äôs not always easy to put down but she always falls asleep within 10 minutes of the sleep meditation made for kids. I love the daily meditations made for me which I can choose to do 5 minutes or more if I have time. Will continue to use!
title: Highly Recommend!

review: The best way I could describe what I‚Äôm feeling just after my first session is peace, I had woken up in not the best mood, feeling groggy and aggressive towards any thoughts. I would try to fight them back as I have mental health issues but they always seem to come back to battle me. Then after this session they sort of just left my mind for even just a few seconds and those seconds felt great ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Feeling at peace

review: So, my therapist recommended this app to me to help manage my anxiety. I LOVE Headspace. It helps a lot. I do want to request that my downloads stay in the download section. Every morning I go to my downloads, and everything is gone. I would also like to suggest maybe adding a feature that lets you save any daily wake ups that you really liked. I might even try the subscription. Thanks!
title: Amazing, But I have some suggestions on how it could be better.

review:
One marketing trick that is an instant turn off is any time an app marks itself as free but doesn‚Äôt allow you to access anything without paying for it. Be up front with it before I download that the entire app is behind a pay wall. It doesn‚Äôt even allow you to try anything, not even a sample without starting a trail.

Yeah no‚Ä¶ maybe if they would of gave a few samples I‚Äôd find this is an amazing app and I would of subscribed. No, it marks itself as free with in app purchases but then after you download, you find everything is behind a subscription. Not even going to bother‚Ä¶
title: Nothing free about this app

Here's what's included in the free trial: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-\n", 'modified': '2021-09-10T20:02:24Z'}

review: Learning to quiet your mind is incredible useful for stopping the momentum behind and negative thought patterns. By using a 15 minute meditation each morning, I‚Äôve been able to re-direct those reactionary thoughts we all get, and train my mind to focus on thoughts that serve me. Paired with the Law of Attraction teachings, you can learn to manifest anything you want, using the power (and pleasure) of your thoughts backed by positive emotion.
title: Headspace changed my life

review: Being 12 years old, I try to make a habit of meditating. Headspace is a great way for beginning and more experience people to get a quick moment of calm in there day before the business. The sessions range from long to short and even include some kid ones, although I would probably not recommend those for anyone above 8. Headspace is a very beneficial app and I would recommend it.
title: So relaxing!

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for more than a year but since the chaos started last year I‚Äôve been really looking for ways to help reduce my anxiety, keep focused while working from home and sleep better.  I can‚Äôt say I use headspace every single day but on the days I do, I feel better!  Love the newer additions of the daily plan, focus playlists and even exercises.
title: One year in, still love headspace!

review: As someone who suffers from anxiety and depression, Headspace has helped me through dealing with many difficult situations when they flare up. The courses are great to learn different techniques and methods to cope, and I love the feature that sets up a schedule for you each day with activities to meditate and reflect. The sleep section is amazing, and I use their sleep casts every night to sleep. I highly recommend Headspace!
title: Wonderful!

review: I really really don‚Äôt like being told what to do by privileged clinicians. So it‚Äôs nice to still have access to helpful resources. There‚Äôs a lot of life skills this app can help with. My work pays for it idk if I would pay for it myself. The voices and advice aren‚Äôt too pushy. A little bit uppity but at least not pushy. no matter what your background everyone wants more control in their life learning to work with yourself is how to get real control
title: Don‚Äôt like being told what to do

review: I‚Äôve made a decision this year that if I‚Äôm feeling a need for a ‚Äúdistraction‚Äù or ‚Äúquick phone check‚Äù I turn it into a 2 min meditation or look at some of the video content on this app rather than mindlessly looking through socials. Thank you Headspace team for the fresh content, the tried & true meditations & the beautiful sleep sounds. I utilize all three of these very often. üåà
title: Sanity in the palm of your hand.

review: If you need a little focus, perhaps a little help on some structure, or maybe you want help understanding or taming your thoughts, or maybe you just want to have a quiet moment for yourself, this is definitely the best app for that. I've been using it every day since early January, and this has been one of the best things that has happened to me. Thank you! Highly recommend it!
title: Life changing

review: I am a huge advocate for Head space app (love the name) & it‚Äôs so resourceful & amazing! I‚Äôve been using this app for 3 years now, to continue my mindfulness practice to be aware & most importantly present. I love the new teachers & how it‚Äôs spreading to Netflix and podcast. The app has so many features but not too much that‚Äôs it‚Äôs overwhelming at least not for me. I enjoy the Daily list!
title: Head space is the greatest & so life changing

review: Please allow us to use dark mode, the white light is a night killer for those of us using at night just trying to navigate to the sleep section!!!!! Would also like if we could remove certain things from our list‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm never gonna use the Star Wars sleep story, just push those to the side so I can get to the good stuff
title: Excellence, but let me help make it better

review:
Headspace has helped me through some difficult times. I feel there is something in this app for any one in pursuit of a higher quality in everyday life and a better sense of presences for all the moments that come with it, both good and bad.
Be mindful and happy, you deserve it everyday. 
 
‚Ä¶Am I the only one that finds myself saying thank you Andy after finishing a long session lol.
title: Becoming Present Again

review:
I used to love this app, I appreciated that the first ten lessons were free, to listen to over an over again. 
That was all I needed, and it was very useful to have those 10 before being required to pay anything. It‚Äôs fair having to pay beyond that point because of how much the app has to offer. 
But NOW. Not a single thing is free, not even 5 MINUTES WORTH- not without a full subscription- unless you do a free trial. 
 I would have given the app five stars if it weren‚Äôt for this, but to learn basic, step-by-step meditation for a monthly charge is NOT worth it. App deleted. Thanks for ruining something great. I swear nothing good is free anymore.
title: Cheap a**es!!

review: This app takes basically everything you would want for focus and relaxation and ties it up in one neat package. All the animations of all the sections are pleasant to see. All voice actors are top notch and fitting for the scripts. The focus section with curated relaxing music is my FAVORITE and I‚Äôve tried all kinds of stuff from Lofi to white noise in many different apps. This has become an essential very quickly!
title: Refined and lovely

review: I‚Äôm really enjoying guided meditations and mindfulness activities throughout the day. The app is easy to navigate. The wake up videos are interesting and inspiring- it‚Äôs so nice to take a brain break from the pattern of stress I often find myself in. The sound scapes are perfect for quieting my mind in order to sleep. I can feel my overall stress decreasing by hopping back into Headspace throughout the day.
title: An important support to my mental health

review: I used this app for a long time. The foundation was great so I bought it and I love everything they have for sleep. It really helped me get over my insomnia. However, I lot of the programs are EXTREMELY similar and it begins to feel repetitive. That‚Äôs fine for just a meditation practice, I get that meditation alone leads to a lot of mental health benefits, but I was looking for the more specific help that each package claimed to help with but it felt like I was just getting more of the same.
title: Pretty Good

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for a few months to help me fall asleep & stay asleep. I love the abundance of topics, as well as the fact that you can do a single meditation or do a course over 10 session. I have completed a few courses & practice the techniques when I‚Äôm stressed or anxious. I haven‚Äôt explored all aspects of the app, there‚Äôs so much offered. This is a keeper. I recommended the app to friends & family. It helps!
title: Five Stars

review: I can‚Äôt explain how much and in how ways Headspace has changed the way I feel and react to many situations in my life.  I only have one small concern.  It seems to me the morning wake-up has changed.  It seems shorter and too have much less content regard stories I can only define as ‚Äú human interest stories ‚Äú ?  Other than that Headspace has all I need to become a better person!
title: Headspace review

review: I would give this app one million stars if I could. It has allowed me to build a life I love by giving me positive and realistic guidance on mindfulness in all areas of life (family, self, work, play, change, etc). I love this app and it just keeps getting better, with more content that truly matters. Love to the Headspace team ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è thank you for everything
title: Has changed my life for the better

review: The guided meditations are nice, but the UI is misleading as it offers 3-10min long sessions and when I try to go into the settings for longer sessions, I cannot change the length. Also, the instructor often names practices or other advice to help with stress management, but doesn‚Äôt actually explain them, and then says ‚Äúgreat, now that you‚Äôve learned this you can use it,‚Äù even though the practice was not taught apart from general meditation. I‚Äôm going to keep trying this as I mistakenly got caught in a year‚Äôs subscription after the free trial, but so far this is disappointing.
title: Decent app

review: This is literally the only app I‚Äôve ever paid money for. I work about 65 hours a week so my sleep is very important to me. Ever since ive been using this app I‚Äôve been getting the best sleep ever with their sleep casts. There are so many options to choose from and I fall asleep most nights within the first 10 minutes. This is definitely an app I will keep subscribing on.
title: Best app I‚Äôve ever downloaded!

review: I have been using this app for many years and I love the design that a few features are open without subscription. It makes this app a perfect recommendation for those who are interested in meditation and mindfulness. Now after the end of my subscription, nothing is available anymore. I understand that the company needs to profit but I‚Äôm just very disappointed to see how this decision is going to affect all the users. We all know that meditation is not easy to start and it‚Äôs even harder to maintain. I work with children and recommending this app to them just doesn‚Äôt make sense anymore.

review: So im a child and i have anger issues and when i started using this app the anger just disappeared and i am so glad of that and i have a tiny bit of social exiaty and this has helped me with that too. This app is really useful when you have anger issues or social exiaty or even depresi√≥n i had a friend go through depression and i showed her the app she is free from it know thanks to headspace.
title: This helped me so much

review: I got to sleep better than I usually do because I can‚Äôt I don‚Äôt take breathers anymore I just like before I go to bed I will take a breather but I can‚Äôt anymore because I don‚Äôt do that because I have a brother in my room so I can freeze but now I have my own room I can‚Äôt buy forgot to do it so I heard this app was on commercial and I downloaded it then it gets me back to bed better
title: I get to sleep

review: My daughter gave me a month of Headspace because she knew I was having trouble sleeping and stressed out over trying to sell our house. The 1st night I listened to a 45 min story. I listened to maybe 10 minutes, the next thing I knew it was 8 am!!! Did a meditation session today and it was so relaxing. I‚Äôm already thinking about different friends I can give this to. What a wonderful gift!
title: Ye of little sleep

review: The self awareness developed in this course brings peace, focus, freedom from cravings. I originally started during covid because I couldn‚Äôt sleep. It was amazingly effective. Then I found how much more it had to offer. It isn‚Äôt magic, it isn‚Äôt metaphysical, but it is the most practical, effective approach to meditation I have ever found. If you are looking for something more, release from anxiety, acceptance of what you think is unbearable....try it.
title: Headspace works

review: I absolutely love this app! I use it everyday and then some more! I do have a suggestion I would love to see in this app! I love using the soundscapes but I wish I could use that as well as listen to the ‚Äúteacher‚Äù or ‚Äúnarrator‚Äù at the same time! That would be amazing in my eyes because even while meditating I could have a little background noise like rain or etc. same goes for sleeping! Again this app is really amazing!
title: Love it! And some ideas!

review: It bothers me immensely that the free version is so limited. Meditation should be freely given. To capitalize on the lack of mindfulness/the need of people in a modern society that is sick and distressed and disconnected in order to make money is sickening in my opinion. At the very least you could offer more free sos and sleep options. And you could organize it so that you can find the free options easier without having to scroll past 30 locked meditations that aren‚Äôt available unless you pay. Also too many suggestions that I start a ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù which we know is a gimmick to get at least some of my money.
title: Disappointed by capitalism at work in the app

review: I have been meditating with head space for a little over 3 years now. It has become, in that slow, gentle way, a necessity. Many things may get dropped from a busy day, but not meditation; even if I have to shorten the time. Meditation is such a powerful instigator, and yet so quiet as it moves. Yes! It moves quietly and surely like the breathüòäit makes changes within that seem to have occurred on their own. Namaste
title: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù

review: I am a healthcare provider and finding out that Headspace is supporting front line providers by giving them access to their programs was wonderful. I do think it has definitely made a difference for me as I used it during this very trying year. I would recommend it to anyone and find it not only easy to use, but customizable and not hokey at all. Truly a great way to begin the journey of practicing meditation. Thanks, Headspace.
title: Worth It

review: this app comes free like you can download it for free but don‚Äôt think, pressing the exponent asks you if you want to do the free trial that that means that you‚Äôre going to be able to do three things on there everything is locked. Do you have to pay the monthly fee or the annual fee if you want to actually do anything on this app so make sure that you have money saved for someone like me who is only a young girl in middle school doesn‚Äôt have money like that so I read this app one star because not everybody has that type of money and just needs a good meditation app and this app is not the one
title: This is low key a bad app

review:
I was gifted calm‚Äôs annual subscription and tried SO hard to like it‚Ä¶

But it‚Äôs just so superfluous and over the top and the voices all feel so disingenuous. Like I‚Äôm in therapy with someone who doesn‚Äôt understand me but is happy to take my money.

Everytime I put on a headspace meditation, it really does feel like I‚Äôm on a mountain somewhere with this wise monk. I can‚Äôt recommend headspace enough. I highly recommend completing basics courses and the pro courses before anything else.

Also, you should look into the founder‚Äôs story, it‚Äôs very powerful. Andy really did leave the US to study with monks‚Ä¶ and then he got cancer! It‚Äôs unbelievable, and you can feel that depth in the design of the app and the meditations themselves.
title: So much better than calm

review:
I‚Äôve used headspace for a few years now and can‚Äôt say enough good things about it! Especially for beginners, it has an excellent way of introducing and teaching meditation that is very approachable.  I use it a lot with my kids; great content for them and parents.  

Truly you‚Äôll find a meditation for nearly any topic.  Also love the ambient music options for when I‚Äôm working.
title: Meditation for the Masses

review:
I like the content of the app. Although, if you need any help resolving problems with your account, they are not prompt at responding to emails. I‚Äôve been unable to get into my account, I sent an email and they say to allow 5 - 7 days for a response! That is an unacceptable delay. I‚Äôve paid for the app and now can‚Äôt use it! Frustrating that there‚Äôs not better customer service. 

Jenifer
title: Great app if you don‚Äôt encounter technical problems

review: I've been a annual paid subscriber for at least two years now and this app has been bloated with pop ups and features leading to a poor UI/UX. There are way too many clicks needed to find or even start a basic meditation anymore. And there's STILL not a landscape mode a feature I was told was in the works over two years ago.
title: App gets worse every iteration.
developerResponse: {'id': 26242463, 'body': 'Sorry to hear about this, but we appreciate the feedback, and will make sure it is heard by the right ears.  If you need us, please send a note at help@headspace.com and our team will be happy to help you!', 'modified': '2021-11-13T01:03:22Z'}

review: I‚Äôve struggled with anxiety and panic attacks for 15 years and have tried meditation before, but never got the same results as other people I talked to. By the end of the first 10 minute course, I went from stressed and anxious to fully relaxed as the tension melted away. Andy‚Äôs voice is very soft and soothing. Will definitely be starting my days with these courses from now on! Highly recommend!
title: From anxiety to peace

review: Using the Headspace app meditations to start and end my days has been life changing. I have been using the app daily close to a year and a half. I have gotten to know myself better as my mind has opened and calmed thanks to what I am learning on Headspace to train my mind. Thank you to Andy, Eve and all the wonderful people at Headspace that make it possible for us to become regular meditators and learners.
title: Life Changing

review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for about 3 years now. I first downloaded this app when I worked in retail, I first began experiencing overwhelming anxiety. On my breaks I started using headspace with my ear buds in and it made the biggest difference. I still use it for my daily guided meditation, it even has specific guided meditations for different experiences. I highly recommend this app, especially Andy‚Äôs meditation exercises !
title: My life saver

review: First of all, this app should either be free or, like, $5.00 a month. If you think about it, maybe some parents were going to try and use this for their kids that can‚Äôt sleep, or they couldn‚Äôt sleep because of have ing a headache, they thought this would be a great app, but can‚Äôt use it because it costed money. I know it may not be a lot of money for a lot of people, but I think this app would get a lot more downloads if it was free. I am just stating my opinion and it may not be what others think, but I‚Äôm being completely honest.
title: Too Expensive

review:
This app has changed my life for the better. That seems like a weird thing to say about a program on your phone, but the fact that it is so easy to use has helped me make meditation a part of my daily life. That in turn helped my anxiety and my life overall. 

The only thing I would like to see done, is for them to add a favorites button, so I can keep track of my fav meditations more easily!

However, something terrible has happened recently and the app is now a cluttered mess. So many tabs, so many options, it's bringing all that anxiety back again. Also I'd turned off notifications for anything but my daily reminder, yet I still keep getting "suggestions" from the app - which are really not helpful. Polluting my notifications is the last thing I need. Please fix this. Also can you make the app less cluttered somehow? I will be forever grateful.
title: Has become cluttered and marketing-y

review:
A great tool for any person who is trying to become a better person. For the betterment of themselves and mankind.

Excellent place to explore learning more about yourself and others and how to have healthy relationships, including a healthy relationship with yourself.

Great for people learning to manage, anxiety, depression, and many other difficult life challenges.

review:
The one word I can use to title my review above. 
Andy‚Äôs voice makes it so relaxing to get into my own headspace. Taking time for me has been so valuable. I love all of the different courses.  I have told so many friends about Headapace and will continue to disseminate how great meditation really is for all of us! I shared this with my 82 year old mom and she too enjoys the silence! title: Changed my life

Anyway, Andy's voice is lovely, the way he describes things is helpful and as you go on, the sessions become less guided which is wonderful too.
title: Just plain wonderful

review:
I have learned I need to meditate every day to feel centered. I like the different places available for various situations. I have one question... where is The Wakeup? Thank you for Headspace.

By the time I was able to see a therapist it ended up being more just to learn than it was to feel rescued. Not saying this replaces therapy, but I believe headspace is a powerful tool and a big blessing that we have something like this in our lives
title: True life changer

review: I am so happy to start each morning with Headspace. So much so that I have gifted it to four family members (with their approval). I wish I would have had this app 30 years ago when a doctor suggested that I might benefit from taking up the practice. I tried unsuccessfully at the time. The doctor was right; but I apparently needed Headspace to make it happen. Thank you, Headspace!
title: So Happy I Found Headspace

review: I moved to Los Angeles and started getting anxiety attacks for the first time in my life. One of my coworkers recommended this app and it really does help! I stopped taking the anti-anxiety meds the doctor put me on. Headspace is all I need. I'll never go without it. And Andy‚Äôs voice is so calming and relaxing, he might be able to say anything and I‚Äôd go into meditation mode‚Ä¶Thank you for saving me!
title: Always thought meditation was for hippies

review: I really love this app and have noticed how much it is helping through stress that used to consume me. The only thing I would change about this app would be the addition of a journaling feature. It would be great to be able to journal my progress and gratitude within the app and to reflect. I hope this feature is added at some point and then the app would be really perfect!
title: I love this approach, but there is one thing‚Ä¶

Hope to hear from you soon!", 'modified': '2023-10-18T23:17:12Z'}

review:
I‚Äôve used HeadSpace for a year now and am gradually increasing the practice of mediation into habit with results. It‚Äôs a rewarding process. 

Some benefits, besides restoring the mind into calm for me, are clearer writing and thinking and a reduction of eye tiredness and swelling afterwards because I use a cold eye mask while mediating. 

My breaths are deeper and more effective as they seem to help dilate blood vessels where the cold permeates further back to reduce inflammation.
title: No Joke: Life Changing App / Tool

review: I like this app which was recommended by my employer. They provide it to us, but had some billing issues so I pay for it myself now. I been using the app for 960 days as of today. I have completed the Headspace 365 course once and I‚Äôm about to complete it again. The program keeps changing which is good. I would like to see it setup where it grows Avery year. Change is good!
title: A good app

review: I got into meditation around 2018, and I‚Äôve used a variety of apps. What I like with this one the most is really the variety of meditations‚Äôs they have. It was nice to switch between a meditation in focus on day, and another being un-guided the next. I also really like the streaks, and the minutes adding up, and it does bring me enjoyment to see it go up every time!
title: Helps with my habits.

review: This app is great for all levels of people who are seeking meditation, community, and even understanding. I feel like a lot of the guided mediations are talking directly to me and are very relatable. The graphics and lightness used to describe and teach are amazing. I love headspace, I had a pretty bad anxiety attack and this app helped me a ton. It‚Äôs just great, I like the reminders and daily wake up as well. Very worth it. Give it a try!
title: One of a kind

review: I have been using headspace for 4 years now, personally, and as an elementary school counselor. I use it one-on-one with students, in small groups, and in whole classrooms. My students love the "bubble journey", and some of them have gone on to teach their families at home. I highly recommend this program, it has stood the test of time for me and the kids I have used it with.
title: Big fan

review:
Yesterday I was stressed getting my St Paddy‚Äôs Day meal ready. (I find this has gotten worse as I age).  But having worked for the past week with Eve on Breathing into Stress (5 minutes) and with Andy on Managing Anxiety (20 minutes) I was able to use the breathing & noting tools to move through the anxiety fairly quickly.  Really helpful!  I was excited & refreshed when my guests arrived!  Thank you Headspace & 
Eve & Andy!
title: So helpful!

review: I love how Headspace makes mindfulness and meditation friendly and attractive. But I wish there were better functions to celebrate milestones, goals, and streaks. The streak function in particularly is utterly unforgiving; miss one day and you‚Äôre back from 60 to 0. Similarly it gets harder and harder to reach the next milestone which is discouraging! I‚Äôve been doing headspace for about a year, and not reached any new milestones in about half a year. Please add more functions to celebrate, incentivize, and encourage progress and habit formation.
title: Friendly

review:
Finding Headspace easy to incorporate into my daily routine. The variety of sessions offered seem to keep getting better and better. The ability to tailor participation to my current schedule and personal goals is very helpful. 
Each day it is enjoyable to revisit past favorites and discover new favorites. ‚ÄúThe Wake Up‚Äù is especially good (in my opinion).
title: Accessible, helpful, and enjoyable

review: Thing that kept me away was the price but with the student discount it‚Äôs only $10 a year. Does a great job of tracking progress. I‚Äôm calmer when I‚Äôm using it regularly. Highly recommend this to anyone. Doesn‚Äôt matter if you‚Äôre busy or not. Takes 10 minutes and helps you to recognize the need to take a step back and check in.
title: Best meditation app

review:
The infusion of modern technology steeped in ancient wisdom through this app is unprecedented. I am still on the free trial but I‚Äôm relishing every minute of practice. The guided voices are super helpful and it looks like there is live and fresh content I have yet to explore. 

Now 42, and after a break from 20 years I feel it is time to return to mindfulness. I was especially motivated after reading Jonathan Haidt‚Äôs book, ‚ÄúHappiness Hypothesis‚Äù.
title: Fusion

review: I never meditated until Covid-19 hit - and  then doing it seemed a really good idea. I love the Headspace app. The courses have become a great part of a life practice of moving toward being more present and generous. And the Focus music and Sleep aides are worth a separate price of admission. I encourage to try the free month and if you start to develop the habit, buy an annual membership. It was easily the best purchase I made in 2020.
title: The Best Purchase I Made in 2020

review: I love this app I really like the guided  meditation and the sleep sounds help me sleep in 5 min I use to have trouble sleeping but since I‚Äôve used Headspace it‚Äôs no longer a problem and I feel more in touch with myself since using this app the only problem is that you don‚Äôt get a lot of features unless you pay for them  but other than that I love this app
title: I love head space

review: This app has benefited my day to day life with peace and a healthier mind, and I didn‚Äôt even have to try very hard. The app amongst other things gives you a couple videos to watch and exercises to do each day to better your personal well-being. The app also has things for focusing and sleeping. All around this app is worth downloading, you will not regret it.
title: very nice

review: I am loving the headspace app and have shared it with several family and friends who also enjoy it very much. GREAT way to start and/or end a day. It would be wonderful if I could share specific meditations or other features with my buddies... The search function doesn‚Äôt work well. That would be my only critique. Maybe in the next update!
title: Share & Search

review: This app is great but the subscription is overpriced ussaly subscription‚Äôs are only 3-5 dollars (from all the apps I have seen) overall the app is really great just wish there were more free videos and you didn‚Äôt feel forced to buy the subscription I know it may be a free app and all but that dosent mean you make the subscription overpriced?? Maybe if it gets lowered I‚Äôll change to 5 stars but for now I‚Äôm staying at 4.

I do not have a subscription, I tried deleting the app from my history, I turned off my wifi, etc. Everything else works but it‚Äôs just when I click on that one specific area then everything stops.
title: Really helpful!

review: My mental health has been pretty bad, but my therapist, psychiatrist, family, you name it‚Äîthey all agree Headspace is such a great support for strengthening mental health. As a college student, this really helps me get through the days by teaching me about mindfulness and living in and for the moment. I‚Äôve even started showing this to my college friends at Rice who have never meditated before, and they find it super useful, too. YOU HAVE TO DOWNLOAD HEADSPACE!
title: BEST THING FOR MENTAL HEALTH

review:
I‚Äôm in love with this new version of Headspace with a pre-made schedule of meditations. I‚Äôve been sporadically using the app mostly because I never knew what to choose to meditate on. Now it‚Äôs just so much easier to use the app. I love it!
The only piece of feedback I have is that I would also love to see a tool that would help me recognize how or what I am feeling and then recommend a meditation based on that.
title: Love the daily meditation schedule

review: Headspace has changed my life for the better. Making mediation part of my everyday has helped to alleviate the symptoms of my anxiety and my medical conditions. It is excellent for everyone from beginners to those who are experienced with the art of meditation. I find the stats helpful and the streak keeps me motivated to meditate even on days I may not feel like it. For anyone on fence, it is well worth the investment. Invest in yourself, you deserve it.
title: Life Changing

review: I used to meditate all the time a few years ago. Then I started doing it less and less. Since I downloaded headspace and started at the basic level I have noticed that my mind has become less cluttered with the mundane thoughts and way more relaxed. This app is really great, and if you are looking for something to help calms the storms in your mind or just to help you relax form a long day. This is a great place to start.
title: More relaxed

review: Stress comes in all forms - good and not so good - and we all live it everyday, emptying our own cups to keep others filled.  I didn‚Äôt know it was so easy to have my cup refilled by just a few mindful moments.  Never had I imagined taking less than 5 minutes to meditate could help me stay calm and present.  Headspace, my husband and children children thank you even more than I do.
title: Calm in the chaos

review: I have been on this app for years now. I have to say although I immediately benefited just from the breathing, it took me a few years for to understand the lessons on a deeper level. And that‚Äôs not a bad thing. I‚Äôm grateful that I‚Äôve learned how to be more present in my life. I‚Äôve learned to observe my emotions instead of inhabiting them. It‚Äôs made such a difference in my life!
title: Learn What Mindfulness Really Is

review: Headspace has helped me become a new person. My goal was to become a more positive person, increase my patience, be more mindful, more empathetic without taxing myself too much, and practice more gratitude. With that being said, I am so grateful to Headspace for what it provides. It has given me the momentum I need to achieve my goals. It‚Äôs really an amazing app worth every penny. Thank you so much, Headspace.
title: Life changing

review: Through headspace, I have been able to improve every aspect of my life. I am a better parent, friend, coworker, relative, wife, and human. By practicing every day, it has opened me up to all the little things we can chose to practice every in addition to meditation. Some obvious, some not so. I highly recommend to anyone looking to level up and practice being a good human daily.
title: Life practice.

review:
My mind has felt like nothing but chaos lately and after doing the first meditation course I felt relief. 

Its the beginning on a new year and of course I‚Äôve set out to become ‚Äúa better person‚Äù but the pressure of being that person overcrowds my ambition. My imposter syndrome is relentless. 

When the guide said ‚Äúmeditation is about letting go of doing and just being‚Äù I immediately started to cry. I‚Äôve let the little voice in my head bring me down for too long. And now just from meditating I actually have a chance to work on letting those feelings go? I felt nothing but relief for the first time in awhile. 

We‚Äôll see if I actually stick with it after my trial but it‚Äôs looking good so far.
title: I felt hope

review: I love everything about this app and how it has evolved from meditation to over all body and mind wellness. I use this for a morning meditation and/or yoga session; afternoon reset or pick me up; random in the moment reset; evening relaxation; nighttime sleep session; and always in the midst of one of the courses available. If you‚Äôre checking reviews I am 100% confident there is something here for you. üíú
title: In love ‚Ä¶

review: This app is such a great tool. I am new to mediation but the app offers so much more than that. I enjoy the mindful moments and the videos are so relaxing. Really and truly a great way to start developing healthy habits to live a better, happier, more mindful life. I‚Äôm a nurse and I‚Äôve recommended this app to the stroke support group that I hold to help them take steps to self recovery and overall feeling better
title: Live better

review: This app has absolutely changed my life. I‚Äôve recommended this app to friends ,family , and complete strangers when we all struggle to find peace in this chaotic world. The secret that many have known and this app teaches us is, only in our minds can we find a resemblance of peace and even that impermanent.  Thank you headspace for being that bridge over troubled waters. This app is truly a God send.
title: Highly Recommend

review: I‚Äôm enjoying the daily meditations. They have great pace, great teachers and I love the option to choose the length of time. I wish they had better story options for sleep though. The sleep casts are ok but I prefer actual stories, not just describing a place. The incorporation of a wind down at the beginning is a great feature, however.
title: Great meditations, need better sleep stories

review: Due to the pandemic I‚Äôm teaching from home virtually using an online platform that is unfamiliar to me. It‚Äôs like starting all over again as a first year teacher. I was super-stressed until another teacher recommended Headspace to me. This has been a lifesaver emotionally. Every program, from meditation to sleep, helps me unwind and stay calmer which benefits my students, too. This app is a keeper!
title: Thank you!

review:
Please go back to your old layout. I am a massive here on the app, however, The new layout utterly disgusts me. I mean sure, it‚Äôs still usable. But it‚Äôs very disappointing to see that you have taken away The old one because it was far more appealing. It just looked better. I mean I guess other people might like it, but I simply do not. And I beg of you, please please please please please please please go back to your old layout. Please know that the only reason I read it one star is because I wanted it to be seen by y‚Äôall. I think it is a grand and nifty app and I would normally rated four or even five stars.

Sincerely, you‚Äôre number one fan
title: PLEASE GO BACK TO YOUR OLD LAYOUT

review:
I was doubtful to try Headspace at first, but my company has offered us a complimentary annual subscription to Headspace so I decided to give it a shot.

It‚Äôs been very difficult to find available appointments for therapy so I ventured to trying Headspace out of desperation. I have been exploring the different features such as listening to the calming soundscapes and I also just tried for the ‚ÄúReleasing the Wounds‚Äù meditation‚Äî Which was incredibly helpful and it motivated me to write this review.

Thank you for creating this wholesome platform. It has helped me from losing my mind to anxiety and I hope that it can continue to aid me in my journey of healing. 

I hope you know you are making a positive impact on people‚Äôs lives. Cheers to the new year!
title: A wonderful platform‚Äî Thank you!

review: As I am listening to Andy on Pro 6 about self, I‚Äôm also learning separately about IFS and am finding these together to be helpful. I‚Äôm both astonished and a bit sad that I didn‚Äôt know these things or learn about self and parts a lot sooner. I see many struggles that could have been so much less traumatic with these practices. Ah well, better late than not at all.
title: Internal Family Systems

review: I am beyond grateful to everyone involved in the making of headspace and the development of it. Andy , Eve and everyone else. You guys have saved and changed my life. Thank you. For anyone looking to take their mind and body to the next level and to understand their true nature, please give this a try and be patient with the process. Do it daily and you will see for yourself.
title: Grateful

review: I got Headspace because Shine was merged into it. Unfortunately, I preferred Shine as a stand alone app. Now I can‚Äôt get my subscription cancelled, and Headspace‚Äôs customer service hasn‚Äôt gotten back to me although I submitted the issue weeks ago. I HATE apps that make it difficult to unsubscribe, it‚Äôs like they‚Äôre just in it for the money and don‚Äôt care about producing good content to help people (especially considering customer service isn‚Äôt great also). I simply don‚Äôt want to be charged for something I don‚Äôt like and won‚Äôt use, also don‚Äôt want to have to jump through hoops to cancel a stupid app subscription.
title: Not the best
developerResponse: {'id': 34535778, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2023-01-28T22:46:18Z'}

review:
It‚Äôs very innovative to make mediations based on race‚Ä¶ and even more innovative when that meditation is for only one race. So when you pay a sub, you are paying for things you obviously can‚Äôt use otherwise it wouldn‚Äôt be broken down via race.

Cultivating Black Joy, I have zero problems with this‚Ä¶ but in a vacuum and in an app I pay for it is disturbing. Mostly because you are saying that blacks cultivate joy in a different way then say Asians do. So the black mind needs something other then everyone else does? And if that is the case why? Or is the make up of the mind of all races different, in that case why aren‚Äôt the other races represented here?

I get it trying to help folks, but when it‚Äôs put out there like this it just seems like pandering, so sick of pandering.

Had this been just ‚Äúcultivating Joy‚Äù then you would most likely had a yearly sub.
title: Race based meditations‚Ä¶
developerResponse: {'id': 33157230, 'body': 'We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. At Headspace, we strive for our content to be welcoming, compassionate, and inclusive for our diverse and global community. Our community reflects individuals across a spectrum of ages, genders, geographies, races, ethnicities, and perspectives. Our goal is to ensure that our content reflects this rich diversity and to offer a diverse slate of content and topic areas to help our members find mindfulness in all areas of their lives. ', 'modified': '2022-11-14T18:41:37Z'}

review: I‚Äôve been using this app almost daily for three years now. It takes time to start seeing changes but if you stick with it you will. I‚Äôve reduced anxiety a great deal and I‚Äôm happier and  able to accept life‚Äôs ups and downs. The app is easy to use, has a good variety of meditations and I enjoy the focus music. My kids even like to use the kids meditations!
title: It works!

review: Be aware,If you click subscribe via PayPal,The app mysteriously does not allow you to delete the account or cancel the subscription. When you go to settings menu the function does not workNo matter how many times you click it.  When you go to FAQ,You click deactivate can you go back to the main menu AND it still says active and will not let you delete the account.   The only stress I have is not from one to three minute meditation videos, only stress is my inability not to pay for a $69 trial of application you CAN NOT DEACTIVATE.
title: Warning won‚Äôt let you cancel subscription DO NOT TRY IT
developerResponse: {'id': 31915682, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry for any trouble while trying to delete your account. As we don't have your email address, can you please write to us at help@headspace.com so that we can help you better? We look forward to your email!", 'modified': '2022-09-08T16:32:10Z'}

review:
Dora and colleagues know us ‚Äúto a T‚Äù. Her gentle observations about the nature of self criticism and unrealistic demands of self ring so true. More importantly are her suggestions as to how we can be more accepting of our frail selves and the important fact that old habits and inner narratives do not disappear overnight.
But they can be modified over time with great patience and purpose.
Thank you so much for this course and all the others.
title: Self Compassion

review: Love this app and Andy‚Äôs voice and wisdom. I use this regularly to help with managing my anxiety. There are so many topics and meditations to choose from and they‚Äôre always adding more. I do wish it was an option to turn off the notification of your streak of meditating days in a row‚Ä¶ may be helpful or motivating for some but triggers a competitive inner voice for me. Otherwise, a great app!
title: Great for managing anxiety

review: I really wanted to have Headspace on my iPad for quick mediation breaks during my workday. The experience is almost identical to the iPhone app which is great, except I wish that you could use it in landscape orientation. I keep my iPad on my magic keyboard so it is pretty much set in landscape all the time and at this point, if an app doesn‚Äôt support landscape, I don‚Äôt use it. If this functionality were added I‚Äôd gladly use Headspace daily on my iPad.
title: Great app except‚Ä¶

review:
At first I was skeptical of meditation. Where would I find the time? How long do I have to sit still? But honestly it starts you off slow enough that you ease into and you find the time. Gradually you find more time and what‚Äôs the best time to meditate. 

I usually meditate every morning but sometimes, after a long day I meditate at night also. 

It‚Äôs really helping me guide myself to the person I want to become in 2021.
title: Love it

review: Top-notch app. It feels like a high quality experience, with fun illustrations. The library is impressive with lots of good content. One minor gripe I have with the iPad app is that I‚Äôd love to be able to use it in landscape view. I use my iPad in landscape all the time and it‚Äôs a hassle to rotate it just for this app. Also, I find some of the teachers‚Äô accents to be distracting. I know that‚Äôs a highly personal preference for the listener, so not everyone may mind that.
title: Good stuff

review: This app was great to have in my tool box to help me when I needed it. I‚Äôve recently taken a pause from it, but I know I will come back to it when it need it. I also can‚Äôt express how easy it was to start and cancel my subscription. It feels like they really stand behind the service they provide and want it to be accessible. They just get it!!!
title: Pleased consumer

review:
It says there is a download button under the content, which I can‚Äôt find. This is honestly bad design and bad usability if something as important as downloading content is not front and center. Again, I get the most use of this while on a train or a plane, hence not gonna renew my subscription.

The function should be dead simple, while online it should just give you the option of downloading today‚Äôs content before leaving home, or even do it automatically while you are still sleeping if you are on wifi.
title: Still requires an internet connection or bad usability
developerResponse: {'id': 39348517, 'body': "We're sorry for any trouble you are having playing your offline content.  Please send our support team an email at:  Help@Headspace.com, and they will be happy to help you!", 'modified': '2023-10-05T23:59:32Z'}

review:
You can get headspace for $9.99 a year if you are a student. As long as you are enrolled in a school you will continue to pay $9.99. This is absolutely fantastic! I cannot stress enough how amazing this app is and how helpful it has been while I‚Äôm a student in school and also an adult dealing with adult life things! 

Seriously thank you headspace for this!
title: Students take advantage of this!

review: I love headspace. It helped me get through some cloudy minded times, and when I saw that you had to have a subscription to do everything I cried. It would help me fall asleep and be peaceful. However, I‚Äôm too young to pay online for this, so I feel they should go back to having some free options such as, DOZE, rainy day-antiques, and others, etc. So to the creators, please make some free auctions so this girl can get her headspace back when I am old enough I am excited to get a subscription.
title: Subscription

review:
This is soooo helpful. Never though my mobile could help me connect with myself. Technology allows the wonderful people behind this app who distilled thousands of years of wizdom and made it available to others. 

This app helps those who really need the most help from meditation; those who are tired; those who don't have the luxury of joining a group and only may have 10 minutes to themselves, if they are lucky. 

I particularly appreciate the videos and the info on the Web that the company provide. A perfect balance of ancient knowledge and scientific backing. 

 No mystic mumbo jumbo: techniques should not collide with specific religious beliefs.
title: Bringing the benefits of meditation to those who need it most.

review:
Was having a crazy amount of anxiety, couldn‚Äôt do normal things anymore, like I forgot how to just be normal. 

Tried the basic course, had instant results. Anxiety now usually kept at bay, much more
manageable. I just keep cycling through the  pro series courses. With the negative space it reminds I have in me, it makes me the best version of myself
title: Turned things around for me

review: I‚Äôve been trying to get the app open to my account for an hour now. I was supposed to be asleep right now and instead I‚Äôm dealing with this mess. I opened the app and went to start a sleep mediation just to be greeted with a ‚Äúplease sight up‚Äù. I had to go to the log in and then my password wasn‚Äôt working so I than had to reset it. Just for it to give me a message about how I already have an account with this email and to log in (I was at the log in scream already). I even bought the monthly subscription thing and now I can‚Äôt even use it. What a waste of my money and time.
title: Disappointed

review: I bought a lifetime membership to headspace years ago and it‚Äôs one of the best purchases I‚Äôve ever made. I‚Äôve been meditating almost every day in quarantine and it has helped me immensely. Headspace is always adding new content and it‚Äôs all really great. I love the new meditation teachers, especially Dora and Kassonga. Just try it out if you‚Äôre at all interested in meditation.
title: Lifetime membership, huge fan

review: This may very well be the best sleep/meditation app on the market but there‚Äôs so few options for those of us who would like to try it out before purchasing. I understand the concept of ‚ÄúIn app purchases‚Äù but when 90% of the videos and tutorials are locked until you sign up and pay is outrageous. I‚Äôm guessing they‚Äôre videos and tutorials, I wouldn‚Äôt know because I was locked out until I signed up. Your company dropped the ball by advertising this as a free app. I would‚Äôve gladly paid $7.99, having known that upfront. I will be deleting the app and using a company without the deceit.

review: So when I was 7 I started to have the thoughts that threatened me and it got much worse today because I always want to kill the thought person that existed in my mind but the kept coming and I tried to calm down but I just can‚Äôt calm down so can you please upload a meditation of coming down when these thoughts appear

review: I recently went through the loss of a love one and I was left with a lot of emotional and mental pain, which impacted my health overall. Headspace has helped me with controlling the stress I‚Äôve been dealing with the past two months and helped with my sleep too! I will say that it is a bit pricy, I am fortunate enough to have the two-month trial. Overall, though, it‚Äôs a great app for meditation and sleep, which it is advertised as.
title: Amazing!

I‚Äôve tried reinstalling, rebooting, all that stuff. Might want to check out compatibility with the iPhone 14 Pro Max on the latest iOS for this last update. Thanks!

review: There is so much amazing content on this app, the lessons are varied and all helpful, the guided meditations are encouraging especially for those like myself who might not always be as consistent as we‚Äôd like to be, and the sleep/nighttime section really does help you relax if you‚Äôre having trouble getting to bed. review:
I can‚Äôt pause through my AirPods or Lock Screen ‚Äî it‚Äôs like nothing is playing. Maybe they have some idealistic idea that I should be in the app with my eyes closed and won‚Äôt get interrupted, but I‚Äôm a parent and that‚Äôs impossible.

review: Love the app, the ASMR library is amazing. So much great content.
