title: Would like completion designations

review: I could barely focus for even one minute when I first started. My anxious mind kept my thoughts racing out of control constantly. I‚Äôve been using headspace for about two years now, and I see the whole world differently, including my mind. This app is life changing. It also guides you so well from being a beginner to a more practiced meditator.
title: Changed my life

review: I was never one to sit still long enough to meditate and was afraid I wouldn‚Äôt be able to learn. The step by step guidance that Andy provides gently helped me transform my morning and evening routines with Headspace and understand this mindful journey. The key is how much this has helped the people around me as I became more calm and focused. I also now understand the concept of impermanence!! Thank you Headspace!!!
title: So impressed

review: Headspace is something I do for myself. Starting my morning with deep breathing, the Wake Up and meditation helps me to feel calm, which changes how I move through the rest of my day. At night, I always listen to a sleepcast. They are an important part of my ability to unwind, let the day go and fall asleep. I used to struggle with falling asleep and now I don‚Äôt.
title: Best Gift You Can Give Yourself

review: I really liked this app and was able to afford it at one point. After I had to end my subscription I would use the one free sleepcast available. Not sure when it was taken away but it stinks they don‚Äôt have anything for the community who can‚Äôt afford to pay for this app. The developers don‚Äôt seem to care about any feed back either. They just copy and past the same few things under any negative review. I guess they only care about making money. Uninstalling immediately and never subscribing again in the future

review:
I have developed bad anxiety over the years. I don‚Äôt know where it comes from or what I‚Äôm even scared of. Feels like your brain is just filled with thoughts 
That you can‚Äôt control and Andy from head space has really helped me get that under control. If you‚Äôre going though a hard time with the same issue I definitely recommend this.
title: Anxiety

review:
I‚Äôve mostly looked at the sleep features of the app and
1) I‚Äôd like to see more stuff narrated by Simon. He‚Äôs got the best voice for a sleepcast.
2) The indoor fireplace sound is terrible. I have a wooden fireplace that I use often, it has never sounded like your recording. Why does it sound like the microphone is in a metal air duct? There‚Äôs this weird whooshing noise and there seems like way too much air flow around the mic.

review:
I‚Äôve used different applications in order to get used to meditating on a daily basis. This app finally did the job. The library is growing on a good pace and I really enjoy the wakeup.

However, recently I can‚Äôt access the wakeup and it‚Äôs really bothering me. And apparently other people are experiencing the same problem. I hope the bug gets fixed soon.
title: Amazing

review: The app user experience is top notch- well organized, really aesthetically pleasing graphics and fun animations. LOVE all the guides, different focuses and the ability to sort through and choose a series or one off. Bedtime sleep casts are AMAZING! My daughter and I listen to one every night as she falls asleep. This has made incorporating meditation into my life so painless and joyful and it‚Äôs genuinely changing me for the better! Thank you Headspace!!! üíï
title: Awesome medication resource!!!!

review: I wish you could navigate through the courses by skipping levels. Some of the entry levels are the same for each course, and it‚Äôs unfortunate you can‚Äôt have the power over your own practice. The interface is also REALLY confusing to navigate through. I wish you could ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù things or put them into a queue. I see one that looks interesting while I‚Äôm browsing for something else and then I can never find it again.
title: Love the content but interface needs work

review: Ive been using Headspace for quiet some bit and it had really changed and benefited me in such many positive ways-well I had a bit of a pause and lost tracks but when I came back to continue my journey to find out that most of the packs and sessions I used to use were all locked now. It‚Äôs just a bit too much for a person who is just trying to genuinely better themselves and having to pay with this type of pricing - Sorry-will try again when improved!
title: It was great until..

review: I love this app, it‚Äôs truly made me more mindful and turned me into a better person. I love the narrators and this app has become a part of my day to day life. I had anger issues and a major swearing problem, but this app has helped me calm down and be the bigger person. I want to thank the creators of this app for helping me on a journey to be a better self.
title: Wonderful Results

review:
Headspace used to be an app that i would frequently recommend to friends, you could use all of the basic meditations without a subscription fee. 

No longer does that seem the case though, as every meditation on this app requires a subscription, and it‚Äôs not very affordable either. 

If you can‚Äôt afford $12 a month i‚Äôm afraid you‚Äôre out of luck, unless you want to pay a large one year subscription fee, quite sad really, for something that could benefit a large number of people.
title: Not like it used to be

review: What can I say? This app has it all. I‚Äôve been enjoying headspace since it‚Äôs early days and I have been so pleased as it has grown and added more content and excellent teaching tools. Even when I fall out of practice, this app has made it easier for me to start again and keep trying. I‚Äôm a faithful member and I highly recommend headspace!
title: A mindful app for everyone

review: Several times a month, at least, the meditations won‚Äôt play. None of them! Not even the sleepcasts. I have contacted the help desk multiple times, but they never do anything. I try all the things they suggest, like making sure the app is up to date and logging off and back on, but it doesn‚Äôt fix anything. Today, I even went to the website and tried meditating from there and it STILL didn‚Äôt work!! For an app that costs this much money, and that has been around this long, I expect MUCH better performance! DON‚ÄôT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS APP!!!
title: Repeatedly fails to work!!

review: Great content and flow. Equally good as Calm and a great balance as an alternative to keep your meditation practice fresh. Would be perhaps a perfect app if you could reset your progress on a given course back to the beginning at any point - otherwise you have the friction of having to manually remember your place for the next session. That‚Äôs the only significant flaw in an otherwise solid app.
title: Great app with one awful flaw

review: Meditation helps. I am currently doing the year in review series and on the creativity chapter. It has been mind blowing, I look forward to what future lessons bring. This app has helped with anxiety, racing thoughts, thoughts in general, and teaches techniques that can make you feel like an entirely new and refreshed person after each session; I highly recommend it!
title: It‚Äôs a great app.

review: This app quite literally has changed and saved my life. I have meditated 375 days in a row with headspace and my stress levels, my ability to concentrate, my satisfaction in life has all improved. The work is not easy, but if you just show up and practice, you are already taking the steps to be more present and mindful in your life. 100% recommend
title: Life Saver

review: In these extremely stressful and polarizing times, this was exactly what I needed. If you've never experienced the benefits of meditation, I promise you it is worth it. And this app specifically is worth every penny although meditation with or without it is amazing. I just really needed to be guided through it and it made such a huge difference for me. I love this app
title: Much needed in these stressful times

review:
Andy is my very favorite. But I‚Äôve also loved the expanding exercises. This is a very well rounded and expansive meditation and wellness app. The addition of core physical activity through Yoga, cardio, and stretching are fabulous! Please keep it coming. I just can‚Äôt get enough of Headspace. My highest praise to this app‚Äôs developers and very respectable guides and facilitators. 

Kudos! Bravo!! Hip-Hip Hooray!!!  And thank you so much. It‚Äôs changed my life.
title: The best meditation ever!

review: I like issuing this app so much. I love the nighttime bed stories and how they incorporate meditation ans adult bedtime stories to help lull you to sleep. And the session they made to help you focus on each this at a time. I‚Äôm doing the Kindness one now and loved the visualization of filling yourself up with light. Highly recommend, I have Calm app also but I use this more and will stick to in the future. Be well
title: Finding Peace

review:
Everything about the app is great and would be a 5 star rating if the iPad app supported Landscape mode. I use a Smart Keyboard and rarely orient my device in portrait except for when I have to in the morning for headspace. Thanks.

Update 2021! Nothing has changed. Still lacks landscape mode. I know its petty, and I should be mindful of my frustrations, but it would be cool if this app functioned like 99% of other iPad apps I use. I raised it to 3 stars in the event that might make the review more visible.
title: Landscape Mode For iPad Please!

review: There is a technical glitch blocking me from starting my meditation. White box pops up right after I choose the duration of my session. When I try to make the box go away by pushing ‚Äúfinish‚Äù, it cancels out my request for a meditation. I have installed and reinstalled the app, using up my meditation time, but it‚Äôs still happening.
title: Tech problem/can‚Äôt meditate today

review: I started using Headspace regularly 3 months ago. I didn‚Äôt know how cluttered my mind was until I tried to sit in silence for 10 minutes.... That one experience changed my perception of myself and the category of meditation. I‚Äôve got a long ways to go, but headspace scales with my learning. It really is the holistic packageüëåüèª u the techniques behind the practice!
title: The Space Feels Amazing in Head!

review: I held off using this for so long and I regret that wasted time. Headspace is a great tool to build and endlessly sharpen your meditation skills. Ever since I started I have become calmer, more focused, more confident, more creative, and genuinely more in touch with myself and those around me. The teachers are amazing and the sleepcasts are a fantastic tool if you have problems falling asleep some nights.
title: Life Changing

review: I have been using headspace since 2017 and this app has helped me through many phases of my life to find mindfulness. There are so many options to choose from and meditations for any situation you‚Äôre needing help with. I enjoy the daily videos and the sleep music/ stories as well. This is an app I use practically everyday and I absolutely love it.
title: Absolutely Amazing Resource

review: I've used Headspace for years and years. I have appreciated how it got me into a regular practice. But the app has changed so much as a company has grown. It's pretty much unusable at this point. There are tons of different categories- podcasts and short meditations, long meditations, natural parks, London, NFL, the list goes on and on. It takes more time to find what I'm looking for than it does to actually meditate. Would not recommend any more.
title: Headspace has gotten too complicated and messy
developerResponse: {'id': 38487136, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you are not happy with our app! We have expanded our content quite a bit, but do offer a search feature that makes it easy to find what you are looking for!  If you need help, please send our support team an email at help@Headspace.com and they will be happy to assist you.", 'modified': '2023-08-23T21:42:41Z'}

review: I needed help with anxiety that I suffer from and a friend recommended this app.  It has been helping until today.  The morning wake up video called me to action and protest over climate change.  How exactly does this help me control my anxiety. Is this what therapists are doing to the people who trust them?  Use the uneasy ness of life that one has and mold it into what this apps founder wants us to fight for.  I have my own mind and I don‚Äôt appreciate my current weakness trying to be used for someone else‚Äôs agenda.  Poorly done headspace. Portly done.
title: Money not well spent
developerResponse: {'id': 36597278, 'body': 'We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us and sorry to hear you are not satisfied with a recent video we shared.  Please feel free to send our support team a note at:  Help@Headspace.com if you have additional comments or suggestions to share.', 'modified': '2023-05-18T13:27:14Z'}

review: i used to have headspace a while ago when it was a little bit more free. the meditations are very good, the only thing is, none are free. i‚Äôve had the app for maybe a week and a half now. i don‚Äôt think i‚Äôve seen ANYTHING free on there except for the exercise when i first got it (1 min long). i know they have to make money, but honestly just make people pay to buy the app. there‚Äôs almost 0 good meditations for free. although, if you‚Äôre willing to pay it‚Äôs a good app.
title: money

review:
This app is worth every penny. 

I‚Äôve been mediating since I was 16. But I really enjoy the guided meditations found on this app and found that it is adding more depth to my meditation practice. 

Sometimes I get too busy and miss days of meditating but my mind will remind me to click this app on my home screen and return to a sense of balance in this digital age.

review: Amazing app. Has really helped with sleep and anxiety at bedtime. I‚Äôve been getting into meditating and it‚Äôs great. 10/10. Would recommend it. If you or a child or loved one is having some anxiety or sleep problems, please use this app. Also great for tracking stress, anxiety and perfect for those getting into meditation. Please download this app and stay safe ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Please download

review: I am someone who has struggled with mental health issues and insomnia for years. I have never meditated prior to using headspace and it has absolutely changed my life. I listen to the same meditation every night and I fall asleep within minutes. If I am feeling too anxious there‚Äôs a meditation for that too. I love that there are also exercises on here. This is really a great app
title: Life Changing

review: I am only on day 2 and I am more relaxed when I‚Äôm not on Headspace. My anxiety is vanishing. This is HUGE for me, I am a long time sufferer of anxiety since my teenage years. I‚Äôm also happier at work, it‚Äôs changing even my perspective. I‚Äôm so excited to do it each day. I look forward to it because I know I‚Äôm gonna feel so much better. It‚Äôs working! And I was skeptical‚Ä¶.
title: Noticing huge differences

review: If there was ever an app with the possibility to change your quality of life, this is it. I have learned that meditating can be used to help navigate you through any issues you may encounter in life, as it is so adaptable and personable. Headspace makes it easy and fun to meditate, with all-around great features to discover. A beautiful marriage of technology and wellness. Truly a great app.
title: Give it a shot

review: I use to love my morning routine where I listen to Andy‚Äôs talk on podcast and spend 30 mins of meditation on the app. But since the podcast  and some of the meditation practices switched to Eve (not that I have anything against Eve), I quit the podcast and have been unsuccessfully trying to find other programs on the app. I really like Andy and I hope he‚Äôs not trying to quit.
title: Love headspace but...

review: I enjoy headspace because it allows me to fall asleep faster and to be more calm. I‚Äôve been falling asleep better and being more calm while trying to sleep. Headspace has a-lot of videos of different topics and I like it it allows a-lot of people to pick different topics to focus on. One thing that I do not like is that you have to pay for a free trial to get more videos. But mostly I enjoy headspace and recommend it.
title: I enjoy headspace.

review: I can‚Äôt tell you how much Headspace has changed my life! It helped me to get through life as a medical worker in the midst of Covid-19. It has helped with my anxiety, my anger management and my relationships with others and myself. If you haven‚Äôt tried it- I challenge you to try meditation using this app every day for 30 days. It is truly life altering!
title: 8500+ mins (6 years of use and counting!)

review: I got this on recommendation from a friend. I have been suffering with anxiety induced insomnia for years now. Sometimes it‚Äôs getting to sleep and sometimes it‚Äôs waking in the night and not being able to go back to sleep. The sleep casts and sleep radio have become my friend and I drift off peacefully now every night and have been a lot more rested. A HUGE THANK YOU for this wonderful app.
title: This Works, Helps Me Sleep Finally

review: Honestly, this is the best app for meditation. It‚Äôs easy to use and has many aspects to choose from. Along with exercise, this is a daily routine I‚Äôve added to achieve a healthy lifestyle. Headspace has been more important in this past year during these crazy pandemic/quarantine times.  I used to use the app sporadically but now it has become a welcome routine that has kept my sanity! I highly recommend.
title: The Best Meditation App

review: I love headspace. Some improvements would be seeing more of my own historical data so that I can correlate trends to actions over time. Also, searchability -particularly for the daily meditations- and the ability to come back to them easily would be fantastic. I would also like the ability to structure my queue of daily meditations / visualizations (like a ‚Äústack‚Äù).
title: Love headspace

review: I use this app daily to improve mental wellness and to wake up with a mindful state in the mornings. I‚Äôve learned so much about meditation as well. I have an issue to report however. Whenever focus playlists are currently playing, they are closing out after just a couple minutes. It‚Äôs not related to the locked screen. Can you help??
title: Best meditation app

review:
The simplicity of the headspace app when it first came out was perfect for me. Now it‚Äôs too overwhelming and gives me more anxiety than it alleviates. 

The cool thing about teaching mindfulness is that it‚Äôs a practice that can be used in many situations. I don‚Äôt need to find a new meditation  for every single thing that ever happens to me (physical pain, sickness, loneliness, preparing for an exam, etc). Decision fatigue is a real thing. Also nothing screams relaxing like another inbox lol. C‚Äômon headspace‚Ä¶ I want to mediate, not check emails‚Ä¶.

The heart and soul of Andy‚Äôs original headspace is gone. Including the authenticity. Some of the new voices sound like they‚Äôre trying too hard. Quite frankly they‚Äôre annoying.

3 stars because it still includes Andy‚Äôs original meditations and videos. They‚Äôre just harder to find now.
title: More is not more

review:
Big fan of the guided meditations, especially the one labeled ‚Äòfinding focus‚Äô. Since I started meditating, I have been finding more flow and enjoyment in everyday activities. I am less reactive, and have weirdly noticed that I can operate more efficiently on less sleep.

I don‚Äôt think most people benefit as much from meditation as I have, but I am very grateful that an app like this exists.
title: Great app

review:
Hai,
I‚Äôve used headspace for a while now, but as a young adult who had no money, I really relied on the free sounds. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this app is AMAZING! I know this is an app and the developers want to make money, but locking all the sounds??? Bye ^‚Ä¢-‚Ä¢^

review: This is the best app when my dad told me to get it I felt uneasy and I was stressed because of my parents divorce but this app helped me sleep better, it helped me deal with bad situations better, and I feel like I am free from this small box frame so everyone can see my flaws but I have broken out of that frame so I‚Äôll give it a 5 star rating
title: 5 star rating thats allüòå

review:
I have found that in conjunction with therapy this program is so very helpful in readjusting ones ability to put anxiety in less daunting perspective. 
The insights that introduce each lesson are ‚Äú spot on‚Äù in helping you realize how much of what you might be struggling with is in fact far less of a challenge than you might think.
title: A very useful tool

review:
My university was giving out free Pro accounts ‚Äî I recommend checking your school too!

The quality of Andy‚Äôs lessons are incredible. He presents the practice of meditation so measured, so thoughtfully and well understood that even myself as a completely non-spiritual person I am able to appreciate meditation simply for the techniques and strategies it is. Wonderful stuff.
title: Like learning a science

review: Headspace is incredible! I‚Äôm an engineer so I have always been skeptical of the mind how people who believe in things like manifestation might have been crazy. BUT they aren‚Äôt! Every time I do a meditation I figure out something new about myself, or it helps me uncover a solution to problem that had been concerning me. Trust in yourself and in your mind, you are powerful!
title: Amazing App!

review: I have been using this app Headspace for a number of years. I observed myself a noticeable difference on mornings that I do not take time to sit. This app helps me set a positive tone in which to begin my day openly and with calmness. I am a 64-year-old high school special education teacher. It is imperative that I stay centered in my work. I am grateful for this app to help me make that happen.
title: Morning meditation

review:
Snow in Snowfall>Soundscapes>Sleep sounds like heavy rain. But Snow in Snowville>Sleepcast> Sleep sounds like snow. Seems like the snow sounds need a bit of an adjustment. Snow through a forest would be a nice Sleepcast too.
Also, it would be nice if mindspace had Sleepcasts from all National Parks. In Acadia from Blackwoods Campground at night you can hear the buoy, ocean waves, deer through forest, quiet fire going, and the slight wind through the trees-it's magical and always puts me to sleep. And it can show how important our national parks are.
title: Snow sound & National Parks

review: I‚Äôve been struggling on an unhealthy scary level and I‚Äôve used this app before, it‚Äôs helping me stay grounded and it‚Äôs helping me work through my problems like I never thought it would :) I am so grateful to the creators and the team behind Headspace for giving people the help they so desperately need. Thank you all from the bottom of my heart.
title: Helps immensely with my BPD symptoms

review: As most of us do, I have struggled for many years to live in harmony with my own inner monologue. I still do. However with the support and guidance of the myriad resources for practicing meditation, exercise and mindfulness I benefit daily from taking time to align my body and mind. Thank you so much for sharing this knowledge and the resources I‚Äôve needed to grow and improve as a person.
title: A Lifeline

review: I love this app. It taught me how to meditate on my own which I never thought was possible. I subscribed until I knew what I was doing and figured I would just use the focus music after my time was up. Well now that it is, you cant do anything without paying. You cant even listen to just the music. I'd say it's definitely worth the first year subscribing, but you can easily get some of the useful content on the app for free on a different site.
title: It's great, but greedy
developerResponse: {'id': 31596625, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out. We appreciate your feedback. review: Headspace is a fabulous app for meditation practice and mindfulness practice. The guided exercises help keep a wandering mind towards relaxation and the present moment when first learning. There are courses, videos, expert advice and many teacher choices. Headspace has helped  me greatly with medication withdrawal, anxiety and sadness. But Headspace is here for the good moments too! Thank you Andy, Eve and the rest of the Headspace team.
title: Healthy habits with Headspace!

review: For years, I thought I was a meditation failure. When I would try to meditate, I would experience distracting thoughts, and then get frustrated with myself for experiencing distracting thoughts. The Headspace app and instructors helped me to move beyond this, and to embrace the steps I take towards a regular meditation practice. High marks for their Sleepcasts, approach to pain management, and ‚Äúemergency‚Äù meditations. Thanks, Headspace!
title: Letting go of meditation shame

review: While I appreciate the variety of meditation themes, I would love to have the option of personalizing my interaction within the app. For instance, I love the sleepcasts, however, I‚Äôd like to be able to skip through the wind-downs. I don‚Äôt particularly care for the visualizations and would just like to get to the narration.  Also, please make available a choice of voices for the daily meditation. I don‚Äôt always enjoy Andy‚Äôs voice (sorry).
title: Need additional features for personalized experience

review: It‚Äôs a pretty decent app, but I expected something exceptional from headspace given its popularity. It‚Äôs not organized particularly well. I have to wade through so many specific meditations that I‚Äôm not interested in to find what I‚Äôm looking for. I‚Äôm not really into the study, holiday, etc meditations, and it‚Äôs great that those are there for others, but it‚Äôs annoying to have to wade thru so much fluff. I regret not getting the Waking Up app from Sam Harris instead, and will be trying that next.
title: Good But Not Great
developerResponse: {'id': 27000360, 'body': "We're so sorry for your initial experience  but please feel free to send us an email at help@headspace.com to be able to guide you and explain our layout a bit more\r\n", 'modified': '2021-12-22T17:27:10Z'}

review: It‚Äôs hard to believe that this company prioritizes your mental health and wellness when they pay wall every single feature they have. They were nice enough to have a few free sleep casts for those without disposable income to still be able to sleep before they spend hours the next day working to make ends meet. But that changed recently. Does this company really believe that not offering anything will get them more subscribers? I had actually considered subscribing at one point, but after I realized they only care about money, I won‚Äôt be doing that anymore.
title: Greedy

review: I have really appreciated Headspace this past year as a nurse practitioner with the stress of healthcare during COVID. The simple truth is sitting for 20 minutes with some help from Andy has given me the space I need to see my thoughts from a little distance, maybe not get so caught up.  Any realize a little self care goes a long way. Thank you.
title: Quieting the mind. Seeing the mind

review: I have used is off and on but now I finally to go full in well almost I got a 30 free trial I have been using it for about 4 day now right before bed and as soon as I'm done I am about 15 times more relaxed and that make me more tired so I get more sleep and I use it in the morning to wake up  I highly recommend trying this app out
title: Love this app

review: Recently I‚Äôve been having a lot of stress and didn‚Äôt know how to handle it, I‚Äôve also been having trouble with unhealthy habits I‚Äôve been having. When I saw an ad for this app and see if could help me, it has changed my life for the better, I‚Äôve only done 3 sessions and I‚Äôm already feeling so much better than before.üòå
title: This app is amazing

review: so if I‚Äôm being honest, this app irritates me. you have to pay 40 bucks or some expensive fee per month to get a lot of the podcasts or whatever you call them, for an app you‚Äôre just gonna use once in a while. and the people who just want to have a happier, healthier life have to pay extra money to help keep you calm, sleep better, or just relax. review: It‚Äôs rare to find something self help like that truly works. This is worth all the time I can throw at it. My day to day life can be so much calmer because the time I take to meditate. I have had horrible anger issues for as long as I can remember and I actually feel them easing. I stopped yelling so much. Maybe soon I will begin to smile more.
title: Life changing and worth it.

review:
I‚Äôve had chronic insomnia for many years and tried the sleepcasts as a last resort. I was pleasantly surprised and very happy to find that most nights I am asleep before the story ends.
Four stars because unfortunately I am now basically addicted to Eve‚Äôs voice and can only fall asleep to her stories. I‚Äôd love it if you could please provide an choice for male/female (Eve) voice selection like the mediations offer. 
Thank you!!
title: Fantastic for my insomnia

review: I absolutely love this app, and use it twice a day minimum! This subscription was gifted to me. I‚Äôve had a daily meditation practice for years already. Originally, I assumed I wouldn‚Äôt get anything out of it since it seemed to target beginners. After just 18 days of using the app, I feel like I have deepened my practice significantly. I recommend this for all levels, beginner and experienced.
title: Great for the experienced, too.

review: This is the best thing that has worked for me to get more into meditation, peaceful thinking, and mindfulness. It‚Äôs hard these days and negative thoughts have taken over but this has changed the way I react. It makes me feel less stressed and able to take on everything as it comes in time. I‚Äôd recommend this to everyone.
title: ü´∂üèª

review: Headspace helps me de stress, focus and relax. Sleepcasts are my go to after a day of frustration and stress especially as an educator. Thank you for being so scientific, thoughtful and intentional about what you have created and provided.
title: The ONLY way I can sleep!

review: I had downloaded this app a while back as it claimed to have free meditation. I remember why I deleted it now. Unfortunately, there is no free section of this app. You are required to sign up for a subscription. While they allow you a ‚Äúfree trial,‚Äù once it expires you will be charged. Definitely not what I‚Äôm looking for and not at all what was advertised. I‚Äôm happy it has worked for others, but for someone who struggles with mental health and is on a limited budget, this just gave me more stress scouring the app trying to find something that could help me relax without charging me $5.
title: Not at all free

review: Good beginning sections on how to consider problems or situations in life with mediation, and the right amount of prompts throughout. Also the option to move to pro level with fewer and fewer prompts. I love the sleep casts for when I wake up at night and can‚Äôt fall back asleep. These do the trick. Just excellent.
title: I have tried many and this is by far my favorite.

review: Whether it is the 1 minute daily meditation, or the 10-20 minute meditation, it is extremely calming, helps me deal with overwhelming or tense emotions, and is always effective. Great app. Love the move tab which has tension releasing stretches . Will keep coming back to this app hopefully everyday! Favorite feature: the flexibility to choose a meditation time based on my schedule.
title: Game Changer

review: I currently don‚Äôt have access to therapy so paying for this on a yearly basis is what‚Äôs keeping me going. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a replacement for therapy at all but learning how to manage negative thoughts, stress spirals, fear etc. can make a huge impact on your level of resilience. I‚Äôm not as fragile as I was before using this app.
title: This app has both saved my life and changed my life.

review: I really enjoy the courses. title: Love for sleep

review: I struggle a lot with medical. I love music, so the music in the back helps me so much. They should add queen into this. It helps when I breathe üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Thank you for reading. please buy a red iPhone to support aids
title: Helps with My Auto emune deficiency and related health problems

review: This app can help you fall back asleep, get ready for the morning, and exercise. title: This app is awesome

It‚Äôs just the same ones over and over again because there isn't anything new. Now I feel like I have to go and get a different app with another expensive annual subscription just so I can have more content. The rest of the features I don‚Äôt use. They just don‚Äôt apply to my life. It‚Äôs the sleep stories that I need. Disappointed, really. It‚Äôs pretty pricey for what you get.
title: Needs new content

review: That‚Äôs a bold statement to make, but the knowledge I‚Äôve gained from actually learning how to meditate and apply it to my everyday life has been invaluable. I‚Äôd highly recommend this app for anyone looking to better understand how to meditate and to utilize it to address depression, anxiety, worrying, fear, or any other number of issues we all deal with each and every day.
title: The App that changed my life

review: I really like this app, it helps a lot with calming down, falling asleep and things like that. The only problem for me personally is that most of the sessions on anxiety are locked. I get anxiety at night so I was hoping this would help me but, considering most of the the anxiety ones ( that I saw at least) were locked I was a bit disappointed. Other than that though great app.
title: Okay but could improve

review:
Headspace is cool. Don‚Äôt get me wrong‚ÄîI love the idea and the concepts that it‚Äôs built around but the paywall is ridiculous. That‚Äôs my only problem with it. I‚Äôve deleted this app and redownloaded it multiple times in the past few years and every time I‚Äôve deleted‚Äîit‚Äôs because there is nothing to do.

Sure, there are four or five short meditations, sounds, and headspaces, but there is so much content unavailable to non-premium users. It‚Äôs annoying and the app is, essentially, useless unless you pay the expensive fee. As a minor going into highschool I don‚Äôt have the money or the time. 

If you‚Äôre considering getting this app, by all means, get it. Try the premium. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs helpful.

My only objection is the paywall. If that‚Äôs ever removed (or at least lessened, because I understand you need money) then maybe I‚Äôll consider this app again and boosting my review. 

Thank you for your time.
title: Do not recommend

review: This was day four and I noticed last time and this time that it‚Äôs giving me such a feeling of calmness. I‚Äôm starting to use this in the morning one of the first things I do and it says such a nice tone for the day. I do prayer after meditation and then I am just so happy and just psyched for a positive productive day. Thank you so much. I‚Äôm loving this. Eventually I‚Äôd like to do it before bed as well.
title: New to daily meditation

review: I have never found the perfect guided meditation until I found this app. I have been using headspace for about 5 years and it has never let me down. The varying amount of meditations is perfect for when I need something specific to that moment. I recommend this app for anyone looking to improve their mental and physical health.
title: Best meditation app ever

review: Headspace has made such a profound difference in my life-Well I drifted away from doing it with any consistency for a while and my anxiety levels increased and I felt like I couldn‚Äôt focus as well. So I‚Äôm trying to get back to that place and starting over.  I have never felt as well as I did when I was meditating consistently every day
title: Grammies need headspace too

review: So far I have not liked the app. I am having difficulty navigating and the tech support is none existent. Can‚Äôt download any of the programs and can‚Äôt get in touch with a human being‚Äîjust a useless bot. If you contact them via email you get the dreaded we are experiencing high volume and will get back to you in days. Also, the Programs are all over the place and hard to customize to your individual needs. It is like they threw a bunch of stuff at the wall and hope something will stick with you. Do not recommend.
title: Support for app very poor

review:
I have been practicing mindfulness and meditation on and off for a couple of years with Headspace. I noticed improvement in myself but the real proof came when I suffered a serious injury. 

I made it through to the trauma center 5 deep breaths at a time. I remembered everything I‚Äôd practiced on Headspace when it REALLY mattered to me and was able to use it. On the day of my surgery I was able to get into the zone and be present as many people spoke and poked at me. 
In my recovery, sleep casts and wind downs have helped me to not be on edge every evening.

As much as in-person therapy has helped my mental health overall, having this app accessible 24/7 has helped a lot.
title: Has helped with my anxiety

review: I‚Äôve been a member for a few years now. Sometimes I‚Äôll go months without using it but when I go back to it I remember how valuable it is. I‚Äôve done a few meditation courses and I use it regularly to get to sleep. The soundscapes are excellent and the sleep casts, essentially stories to put you to sleep, are excellent. Highly recommend.
title: Great app

review: I have anxiety and I have used Headspace for years in the when I was in the classroom for my students. They loved it! I now use it for me out of the classroom and it has been my saving grace!!! Honestly, there is so much joy in learning how to navigate challenging emotions! I would highly recommend this app, it has helped me navigate multiple transitions in my life!
title: Headspace = Wins

review:
I was recommended Headspace by my physical therapist. It came from a casual conversation, and when I gave it a try, it resolved the tension around my neck that drove me to go to physical therapy in the first place.

Ever since, I went on and off this app until one day, the tension around the neck returned to the degree that I had experienced earlier on.

I quickly took up Headspace once more, and it has since been a daily tool for me to let go of tension, and return to the present.

I cannot thank Andy and the team enough for the courses that changed the subjective experience of my life.

Whether you are tense or fine but curious, I recommend a try to see how you feel.
title: Lifelong practice

review:
thats basically what you guys are doing. i dont even have money. i hadnt used headspace for a while and when i came back, everything was locked. the stuff in my favorited was free, and when i went to check it, i saw everything needed to be paid for. contemplated giving two stars for past use, but i wont because its a now problem. a past review wouldnt work. i know that economic inflation is happening, but theyre also going through that.

tl:dr
      app was good, but now you need to pay for everything. good back then, but not anymore.
title: Pls sub 2 hedspaes 2 do wahtevr is on it
developerResponse: {'id': 27676960, 'body': 'Check out our FAQ for alternatives :) https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-', 'modified': '2022-01-26T14:32:09Z'}

review: I totally understand creating a subscription for nicer, exclusive content, but you can hardly do anything in this app without paying. It's like the goal isn't to relax an anxious audience, but to profit off of them. If your app was about spreading as much peace as possible, shouldn't the basic features be more accessible? I hate complaining about price, because it's obvious that hard work went into this otherwise great app, but it was just sort of a let down. I was really excited to use this :(

Especially in these ‚Äúunprecedented times‚Äù I‚Äôve been really struggling to contain and manage my frustrations and temper as we are all (family of 6) cooped up so often with so many small babies. Headspace practice has helped me be more mindful and present in my daily activities and is certainly helping me live my vocation of motherhood more fully and positively. Highly recommend.
title: More calm and present in motherhood

review: The meditation basics they give you for free are wonderful! However, you do need to buy the subscription in order to do anything else. Maybe if you were to buy the app, instead of it being free, then get everything after you have a 1 time purchase it would be 5 stars. Still though, I‚Äôm seriously considering buying the subscription ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
title: Great app! If you pay for it

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for about 2 years and it‚Äôs been so helpful in centering me in my life. But when I was diagnosed with stage 4 throat cancer last fall, the anxiety pack and cancer pack were enormously helpful in getting me through some really tough times! I was so much more calm, reflective and less anxious throughout my treatments. I can‚Äôt imagine having gone through that without Headspace. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
title: Helped with my cancer diagnosis

review:
I have been a headspace user for five years now, I wanted to connect it to Apple health to have some analysis of data. The instructions to integrate are to delete the app, remove all associated data, start from scratch, listen to the day 1, and then accept the Apple health integration.

I will update to 5 stars when they have a better workflow.
title: Unacceptable integration to Apple health
developerResponse: {'id': 20762903, 'body': "Apologies for any confusion with this process, the good news is you don't need to start from scratch. Please send us a message to help@headspace.com so we can further assist you with this!", 'modified': '2021-01-31T22:59:22Z'}

review: II have a very busy practice seeing clients in psychotherapy. It‚Äôs emotionally draining. Doing Headspace in the morning helps me fully be present and focused on my clients. In addition, I end the day feeling calm. If I miss a day, I often end my day with a headache. At this point, I prefer to do thePro offerings, but I love to intersperse other themed meditation series to give more variety and motivation for my practice.
title: Headspace for a clinical therapist

review:
Great meditation app and I really enjoy ‚ÄúAndys‚Äù approach to guided meditation. I really feel like this company was started by people who were passionate about sharing meditation and not just to make money (even though making money is fine). 

I also enjoy the other features like Focus music & ‚Äúthe wakeup sessions‚Äù and the customs courses like ‚Äúfocus‚Äù etc
title: Great meditation App & Andy is great

review: I‚Äôve struggled with anxiety my whole life, and the anxiety course with Headspace is the only thing that has really helped me be mindful and less attached to those feelings. I use the other meditations and music quite frequently as well. It‚Äôs one of the few apps worth paying for. Been a customer for years! Thanks!
title: Worth it!

review: I originally downloaded because they offer a subscription free to educators (thank you) and I thought I could use it in the classroom. I do and it‚Äôs great, but I figured out that mindfulness is good for me too. Now I use the app and take the courses and look for advice when I need it. Right here on the Headspace App. It‚Äôs really made a post it I‚Äôve impact on my life!
title: I love this app!

review:
The Headspace experience has caused my stress level to increase ‚Äî the exact opposite of what it‚Äôs meant to do.  The app itself is OK. The low rating and bad experience is for the company‚Äôs billing practices. 

The subscription auto renews which many do in the fine print. There‚Äôs a button to opt out, but it didn‚Äôt work. There was no communication that the app subscription was about to renew, only an email saying it renewed that day. Customer service would not refund for any reason. So be sure you want a lifetime charge for this app whether you use it or not.
title: Calm better & Headspace‚Äôs billing is sneaky

review: I love this app so much! It‚Äôs worth every penny! Its a compliment to therapy and I am so grateful for headspace and all that is has taught me and continues to teach me. Not only does it help when I have pain with my chronic illness, it helps when I am depressed and anxious, and it helps when I am feeling good to just also feel connected and grounded. Thank you headspace!
title: Life changing and saving!

review: I use this app for myself, my loved ones, and the kids I work with. This app has something for everyone: from sleeping, to self compassion, meditation for beginners, etc. all with a user friendly interface. I will continue to use headspace everyday and will forever be happy to support this business and the good they do! :)
title: wonderful for all

review: I‚Äôm sure we‚Äôve all been at a point where we are stressed and anxious or even feel overwhelmed with life. Meditation has truly helped me gain a better understating of what I want and brings peace and balance to my life. I recommend buying this for yourself as a birthday present. It‚Äôs the best birthday present I have ever gotten myself.
title: No brainer-if you want to treat yourself get this app!

review:
I had fallen out of my meditation practice for awhile until I discovered this app. It has given me back the gift of mindfulness and helped me cope with my anxiety on certain tasks I have to do in my life. A definite game changer. I recommend this app to the whole world!

review: It is very easy to start the practice of meditation but very hard to keep it going. Fortunately Iam in my 27th day of practice as I write this review. review:

If you want to add a daily practice that will really change your life, try this app out.

title: Headspace

review:
A decent and general all around app but is missing some features.... 
No deep sleep or hypnosis that many popular sleep and meditation apps have like Breethe. 

Also lacks the ability to Chromecast or push any of the workout videos to TV streaming devices from phone. This is a pretty standard video feature these days and it was surprising that an app as popular as this doesn't have support for casting to screen.

title: Works like a charm

The breathing techniques and the general advise at the beginning of each session gives me a sense of calmness and let‚Äôs me establish a baseline of being present throughout my day to day life. title: Very useful

review: I use headspace everyday and love it enough to leave a review if you‚Äôre just dipin your toes into meditation I recommend headspace heavily they have great sleep meditation like no joke it might as well be chloroform because I‚Äôm out like a light straight up goin mee mee mee mee like haw shoo haw shoo in a couple minutes it‚Äôs pretty good I recommend Salon Nights and Sun Down Place Rainy Day Antiques is real good to

title: Life changing

review: i tried this app out with a free trial but didn‚Äôt use it very often so i made sure to cancel my app subscription through the normal apple subscription settings and i was still charged $70 to renew. my card was connected and i didn‚Äôt realize that there were two places i needed to cancel my subscription (i realize this is my mistake but it is very silly to have cancelled it in one spot and for there to still be a second spot) so when i was charged $70 i was pretty upset. i had even gotten a cancellation email directly before i received a payment confirmation email so i was still charged. when i tried to resolve the issue they told me there was nothing they could do since it was passed the renewal date (obviously üôÑ) so just a warning to everyone else, make sure you cancel in both places or you won‚Äôt have gas for the next week (:
title: be careful

review: Headspace has been INVALUABLE to me over the last several months. The gratitude I feel for how easy the app is to navigate, the variety of support options, and consistency, it‚Äôs wonderful. Everyone needs headspace! EVERYONE

review: I‚Äôve used headspace on-and-off for about seven years now. Meditation is powerful, and the app has helped me through a lot (even before I subscribed). review:
I‚Äôve been using Headspace for about 2 years and I like the features‚Äîexcept one. I HATE the ‚ÄúCurrent Run Streak‚Äù feature. I hate that it makes me feel like I‚Äôm being judged on something that shouldn‚Äôt be quantified. If the point is to make mindfulness a habit, why is a counter part of that? It‚Äôs really discouraging.
I wish instead of counting the days and making that known immediately after you finish, it just had a message saying ‚ÄúYou did it!‚Äù or something. And on milestone days ‚Äî 1 week, 10 days ‚Äî it says something.
title: I Hate the Run Streak Feature

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for about 6 months now and it‚Äôs truly changed my day to day. title: The Perfect Little App

review: I do feel I can access more often a place of calm within myself, throughout my days, now that I have been using headspace. I enjoy the assorted options of meditations and videos. I can also acknowledge I am remembering some of the skills and utilizing them more regularly. It has been very helpful, and I am very grateful for headspace.
title: Calm

review:
I had been using this app daily as an introduction into mindfulness, and honestly it‚Äôs been helping a lot! 
But with the updated subscription policy, there‚Äôs no longer any free content on the app, and you have to pay a $13 monthly fee to access any content. That is incredibly disappointing to me, as I can‚Äôt really afford another subscription so I will likely have to stop using this app after it has helped so much. Very upsetting.
title: Subscription Update

review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for at least eight years. One of those years I was able to afford the subscription, but the rest of those years, I just listened to the ‚ÄúBasics‚Äù meditations over and over again. Like hundreds of times. It became one of the only things that can get me to sleep. But suddenly there aren‚Äôt ANY free meditations on the app anymore. So if you‚Äôre hoping to try something new but not sure if it‚Äôs the right fit, this is not the app for you. I‚Äôm personally switching to Insight Timer and UCLA Mindful, where I can get meditations in my price range - free.

When the attack starts, I can‚Äôt hold my iPhone because my body stiffens from lacking oxygen and too much CO2 in my body. So I would really appreciate the Siri Shortcuts and say to my iPhone, ‚ÄúHey Siri, let‚Äôs meditate.‚Äù But Siri responds, ‚Äúit‚Äôs beyond what I can do,‚Äù and won‚Äôt do anything after that. title: Please read!! The truth!

review:
Ever since I found out I received a free subscription to Headspace for teachers, I decided to give it a try. This app is beautifully made for me as an adult and for my elementary students as well. In a time where mindfulness is as important as ever, this app delivers. Here are some of my favorite features:

- meditation ‚Äúpacks‚Äù that deal with everything from the basics to coping with cravings
- a daily ‚Äúwake-up‚Äù which always teaches me something new and helps me prep for the day
- amazing nighttime sleep casts and wind downs 
- music for mindfulness

I could go on and on. Even if you are not an educator I would recommend getting the subscription - the full suite of amazing features are extremely worth it.
title: 5 Stars From a Teacher

review: I absolutely LOVED the graphics of the videos!! I‚Äôm not in a place where I‚Äôm ready to close my eyes and meditate to someone talking. review: Meditation has slowly grown to be a big part of my life this past decade. Much of that help belongs to headspace. title: The most important app on here

review: Sooo, I would definitely not say that I am the most disciplined when it comes to my self care and meditation practices, however, whenever I decided to pick it back up headspace is always there. I love that. However I was setting up Ny Apple TV and super stoked to get the app on the big screen. I was hoping that being able to utilize it on my television would help strengthen my practice or at least get me jazzed for a bit to maybe implement it more. Nope. You guys have not developed the Apple TV version yet‚Ä¶‚Ä¶WHHHHYYYYY?!?!?
title: SHOCKED AND DISAPPOINTED

review: The headspace program allows me to relax my body and brain for at least a short period of time.  It has taught me so much about how the body and mind are connected.  It gives me improved clarity and tools to control my stress.   As a person who is highly active and wired this is best training I can do for myself    It is truly a friend that is always there whenever I need it most.
title: My friend

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for years. Sometimes I‚Äôll go months without using it, but I always come back to it. Andy‚Äôs my favorite, and I love how you can choose from short meditations or multi-session courses. There are even emergency ones that I‚Äôve used from time to time. Give it a try!
title: I keep coming back to this app

review: I began meditation over twenty years ago, sometimes for long periods of time and for hours at a time. However, daily duties took over, I stopped my practice, and my anxiety soared. This App works for me in many ways, especially simply calming my mind as I go through my day. It helps with my sleep as well. I am happier, clear minded and more calm.
title: It Works

review:
Ok for a mindfulness app, they should have more downloadable sessions so you can turn your phone onto airplane mode and still listen to your meditations, including the sleep casts!! 

I used to have this app a few years ago and downloading sleepcasts to access without WiFi was an option but for some reason they took it away. I put my phone on airplane mode when I go to bed but then I have to turn WiFi back on so I can listen to a sleep cast‚Ä¶ ugh just get the download toggle back please!!!!
title: Download toggle???

review: Prior to finding Headspace, I had suffered from a p*rn addiction for 10 years. No matter how many different avenues I tried, I couldn‚Äôt seemed to quit. With Headspace, I have been p*rn free for about a month and a half now going strong. If you need a healthy coping mechanism for the ups and downs that life throws at you, take up meditation with Headspace. You won‚Äôt regret it.
title: Helped with my addiction

review: So we all know headspace and how awesome it is. It does it all from sleep to stress. Although I have one issue. Everything and I mean everything is blocked behind a paywall and I want to see what it‚Äôs like. But I don‚Äôt want to spend money on it so fast. I mean what if I dislike it or something. So (from what I‚Äôve heard from friends and reviews) it‚Äôs a good app, but the paywall is a bit annoying.
title: Awesome app, one issue

review:
They don‚Äôt have a phone to talk to someone and don‚Äôt allow you to cancel the automatic payment. The typical means used by not serious merchants to keep you in against your will. I had to call to my bank and I don't know yet if I'm going to be refunded. The email responds that you have to get help in they web page where there is none.

As you can see the answer they give me here is just send me to the email where they send me before to the web page. I think Apple should not have this app.
title: No phone support, no way to cancel subscription

review: As much as i want to rate this app higher i have found it very frustrating that when i am sent a notification of a meditation quote or advice, only half of the quote is sent and i have to click on it to open the app to see the rest. I thought because of the high monthly price that i would be sent full quotes without having to take the time to click on it and wait for the app to open.  This is something i would expect from a free app.

review: I really appreciate the guidance on how to meditate provided in the Headspace app. I have built a habit of daily meditation with Headspace as my guide. I have improved my ability to focus on what is important, avoid overreacting to situations, reduced my tendency to overthink things, and support my young students to be mindful as well. I like how Headspace keeps track of my minutes and days meditated.
title: Headspace

review:
I have anxiety based on sound triggers. Part of my therapy for this is mindfulness and learning to accept the sounds as normal and safe. 

This app makes that easy and enjoyable. I watch The Wake Up every morning for the fun and educational videos. The little animations are fun. The courses make getting in a daily habit much easier.
title: This app is helping my anxiety

review: Did my first two runs with Headspace and really enjoyed the coaching. The end of the first run the coach says ‚Äúsometimes it takes someone else believing in you before you believe in yourself‚Äù. I feel that Headspace gives that to everybody, they lead the way in believing. Headspace has the ability to really make a difference.
title: Run Easy rocks!

review: Now Imma tell you this this thing WORK cause I really trying to get more energy when I go to sleep cause I always stay up all night and barely get any sleep and this help me so well I didn‚Äôt subscribe but I rather listen to the two things over and over again I prefer you get this right now before it‚Äôs too late.
title: BUY RIGHT NOW

review: Great app for taking short breaks from busy schedule to reset and find piece. Highly recommend for anyone moving at full speed 24/7, be it an entrepreneur, executive, consultant, doctor and alike. Commitment is the key. Give this app at least 30 days without breaks and you will feel a completely different quality of your mind and spirit üòá
title: Simple yet powerful app for achieving clarity

review: Andy - wow, if I could only meet you to thank you in person. During times like these - homebound and stir crazy - this has been a daily joy to rely on. It impacts every aspect of my days and evenings. As long as I always have the ability to pay the small annual fee, I will never go without Headspace.
title: The only app I cannot live without.

review: I looked up all the app from calm to ten percent happier and finally picked headspace after reading multiple online reviews and found that it‚Äôs the one that keeps it real - love the talks and the mix of breathing techniques as I get bored and distracted with just breathing techniques .. also the music and section on movement is great. Highly recommend headspace if you are looking to subscribe
title: Keeps me grounded every day

review: This app has a special place in my heart because it truly taught me how to meditate, by meditating I found another perspective of life and this app showed me the path to that mindful peace I was looking for at that time. I really appreciate this app, I would like to subscribe yearly but for my budget right now is a little expensive but this app is WORTH EVERY PENNY! If I could give it 10 stars I would, thank you headspace!
title: I love this app

review: I started using headspace as a way to de-stress during nursing school 3 years ago and it changed my life. Meditation helps me control my emotions and give me a sense of calm when stress is high especially in the hospital. The accessibility, ease of use, types of mediation for different situations is superb. I will continue to use headspace as my mediation app for years to come.
title: Changed my life

review: I have been using Headspace daily since mid 2020 after the loss of my Mom. It‚Äôs so easy to find a meditation that works for that moment or that day. Sometimes I only have a few minutes sometimes, I have longer, sometimes there is some thing I need to work on, so I do one of the courses. It has been a Godsend to me.

review:
Admittedly, my meditation practice is erratic. Some weeks I make time daily. Other times I get swept up in other endeavors and push meditation to the back burner. But what I have realized through Headspace, is the value in continuing my practice and not adding judgment to the mix. 

Thank you Headspace for providing encouragement and wisdom in finding our own meditation path.
title: Focus

review: I like to use Headspace for guided meditation. It‚Äôs very helpful and useful. It used to be available on Alexa and I could use it when I had trouble getting to sleep, but it‚Äôs not on Alexa anymore. No more going to sleep to a soothing meditation. Still use it, but again, I wish it was available on Alexa.
title: Wish it was still available on Alexa

review: This app has many options on what you can do, you can go through and watch several videos on different practices of yoga and meditation. There are also videos to help you go to sleep, allowing you to listen to calm relaxing music to help. Overall, the little time I spent on it, did help me relax a bit
title: Fun

review: I like the meditations and guidance, however there need to be an option to customize the ‚ÄúToday‚Äù tab. I like to check the boxes and complete the task‚Äôs assigned for the day however, there should be an option to specify a goal or something for how much the user wants to meditate per day that can be adjusted and the Today tab should set the number of items based on this.
title: Great app but needs better customization options

review: Meditating has started to change my life, and I would not have been able to be consistent or understand the practice on my own. Headspace has a very user friendly and thought out app. I do subscribe, and I would recommend this app to any beginner wanting to start meditating.

review:
I loved this app. It was the first time that meditation finally made sense to me. It‚Äôs helped me tremendously, and I took pride in my daily commitment to mindfulness. After 1,474 days and over 302 hours of meditation, I‚Äôm now locked out from any features of the app unless I pay them a monthly ransom.

I understand that they need to make a profit, but this seems like a horrible time to be blocking people away from the tiniest amount of inner-peace they could find. I hope you know how much good you initially did for people, and how much harm this will cause going forward.
title: So long 1,474 day streak

review: I downloaded this app to help me wind down at nights because i can't sleep very well, very often. I used it for the last time last night and when i went on it today the three things that were free are now locked. i don't have the money right now to purchase and keep on paying another subscription. Please fix this if you can because this is the only app that has helped me!!

review: Meditation made simple and accessible to everyone and anyone. I often go off track and skip the 10 minutes or so  it takes to do Headspace. But my life is always better when I invest the time. When I do get off track it is easy to come back.

review: I have no words for how much Headspace has helped me deepen my Meditation practice on all levels. You change the world by changing yourself! üíñ

review: I spent a lot of money on a Mindfulness class in 2013. It was a horrible experience and I gave up on meditation. In 2018 I found Headspace and it change my life. I am able to deal with so many situations differently now. It allows me to witness my thoughts and emotions without judging them and has helped me observe instead of acting on my emotions
title: Change my life

review: Headspace is my place to go when I need to get away sometimes. Wether I‚Äôm in a car with my family or my bed. You can even mend the time of the meditation to fit your schedule. title: Great app

review:
Headspace is a great app that has everything you may need to get some mindfulness in your life. There‚Äôs everything to learn meditating, sleep well, start your day right and even more. Also I like the design very much, it‚Äôs easy to use and pleasant to look at.
I want to thank Andy and all the members of the Headspace team for this amazing work they have made!
title: The best app for getting mindfulness!

review:
This app makes meditation so much easier to learn. You can use the free sessions to get a solid foundation and be totally fine with just that.  But the paid subscription has so much substance to it.  So many more lessons, guided sessions with specific goals.  

This is a great app that I recommend all the time.
title: Absolutely worth the subscription cost

review:
I actually am really enjoying headspace right now because the narrators are so good (as always) but it also makes me less scared and I am able go into scary places on my own while listening to a meditation. That said I do wish they had more story type ones, something to listen to when you are bored that is entertaining.  

          Respectfully, 
           Annamaria Rauti
title: Helpful

review: I started using headspace in 2016 and it has help me deal with a lot of depression and anxiety in everyday life. I have been able to enjoy a more present and happy mindset through meditation. title: Lifechanging

I used to be able to play Apple Music while listening to the jogging coach in the move section - but not anymore :(. He‚Äôs relatable and always seems to know what I‚Äôm thinking or feeling and never judges. Great app.
title: Headspace is Amazing

review: I absolutely love this app!!! I bought the full version and it is so worth it!!! title: Amazing!

 Headspace let me start our at 2 or 3 minute sessions and as I felt the benefits (immediately ) I was able to gradually increase session time.

review:
I suffered from sudden episode of stressful anxiety, being 76 and having to resolved all the burdens and worries of having to be two people in one, due to my 83 yr old husband diagnosed with Parkinson and a bit of dementia.
I am in the middle of a most due trip to Europe with my husband, due to his pensions being stop on account of his memory forgetting to send the offices what they called: proof of life!
It‚Äôs very challenging for me, having to deal with the burocracias of France and Spain‚Ä¶
I am overwhelmed and at times full of thoughts that do not let me sleep well.
I hope very much, that Headspace will help me sort my mind out!
Thanks, merci, gracias
Eva Canovas-Miami
title: Trying to control my anxiety

review: I highly recommend buying a headspace subscription for everyone. This app has helped me become a better person and accept myself for who I am. I had a phase where I was suffering through bad anxiety and this app helped me overcome it Ann‚Äôs make me a stronger person. You won‚Äôt regret using this app and buying a subscription.
title: The Perfect App

review: It‚Äôs too cluttered, way too many things to click. I am guessing some marketing research nonsense is involved here in an attempt to ‚Äúincrease customer engagement‚Äù. No, I don‚Äôt want that, all I am looking for is an easy way to resume meditation and then be done with it. Don‚Äôt make me spend 30 seconds trying to figure out where I was the last time I was using the app.  A meditation app shouldn‚Äôt look like a cockpit of a 747.
title: The UI gives me anxiety
developerResponse: {'id': 29176278, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.", 'modified': '2022-04-14T15:51:01Z'}

review: My favorite thing about this app is that it is not just a guided meditation app, it becomes your private meditation teacher that teaches you about the practice. Also, there is such a variety of content that I have been meditating with it everyday for 556 days in a row and I'm still finding new things courses and packs to keep things interesting.
title: Headspace changed my life

review: This app has become part of my daily routine. It has helped with so many aspects of my life. But, most of all has improved my mental health dramatically. I struggle with anxiety and depression, particularly depression. It has helped me fortify my mind and use joy to inoculate my mind. It‚Äôs a top to step outside of depressive thoughts and see the silly stories they tell.
title: Daily gem

review: An excellent daily practice of meditative mindfulness, awareness and clarity in stopping and taking a relaxation reset of body, mind and spirit in the direction of the intention to practice the presence of peace in each moment throughout the day. Truly inspirational, renewing and invigorating in the continual pursuit of peace, love and understanding, with an emphasis on moving beyond tolerance toward allowance‚Ä¶ and a consistent improvement in connecting with Source.
title: Mindfulness 365

review: I started using Headspace around 2013 because it was recommended to me by a grad school professor. Back then the app was simple and effective. It focused on deepening mindfulness. Fast forward to 2023 and the app feels like a bloated and chaotic mess. It seems that they went with quantity over quality, more gimmicks and features rather than deeper practice. They have YouTubers, political trending topics, foam rolling and stretching. It‚Äôs a weird mix of stuff. I guess maybe it happens when things get to be billion dollar commercial enterprises.
title: Bloated and chaotic
developerResponse: {'id': 39507681, 'body': "Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us!  We're sorry to hear you aren't enjoying the new changes in the app, and will make sure to let our team know. Our goal at Headspace has always been to reach as many people as we can with the tools to help live healthier and happier lives. Our intention is not to stray away from what makes Headspace so special and unique. If anything, our hope is to continue offering a variety of beneficial content and topic areas to help our members find mindfulness in all areas of their lives.  If you have any suggestions or additional feedback for us, please send our support team an email at help@Headspace.com.", 'modified': '2023-10-14T07:31:04Z'}

review: I‚Äôve found the more I listen to the meditations in Headspace, the more I benefit and enjoy them. Over the last couple of weeks since I‚Äôve started, I‚Äôve noticed I‚Äôm getting to sleep faster and I‚Äôm less stressed out during the day. It‚Äôs sort of a residual peace that stays with me after my meditation time.
title: It really helps

review: For most of my life I have been lost in finding ways to cope with myself and things in my life in general that affect who I feel overall. Having an app that can really focus on your mind & body & soul is super uplifting, I would recommend this 1000%. I am grateful my partner introduced me to it and I will never go back.
title: Wonderful App!!

review: The app itself is cool and I like the main narrators voice. However, be extremely mindful of whether or not you‚Äôve done a free trial before. They advertise the ‚ÄúFree Trial!!‚Äù button everywhere - but they charge you immediately if you have already had a trial. It‚Äôs extremely annoying that they don‚Äôt say ‚Äúhey, actually this offer won‚Äôt work for you. don‚Äôt continue.‚Äù They also can‚Äôt refund you and you have to go through Apple to a refund. It‚Äôs so annoying
title: Charges for free trial
developerResponse: {'id': 35875982, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we apologize for any issues with the refund process, we'll be sure your feedback is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2023-04-11T01:23:20Z'}

review: As I approach 60, I‚Äôm realizing that meditation helps me relax and sort out my day.  The Headspace app has helped me start practicing slowly and I enjoy this time in the morning.  I keep telling myself that I‚Äôm exercising my brain, training it to come back when I realize I‚Äôm distracted.  I‚Äôm still a newbie but anxious to see where this takes me.
title: Learning

review: I use this app everyday and it has changed my life for the better. It helps me to understand myself and others in a deeper way. It helps me to pay attention when I‚Äôm in physical pain, or angry, or frustrated. Understanding yourself is the best way to be helpful to others and give your energy to help the planet
title: Life Changing

review: For the past week I‚Äôve been unable to utilize this app. Every time the screen hours black the app shuts down within 15-30 seconds. The only time I‚Äôm annoy to use this is when I keep the app open and the primary app. I cannot let the screen go to black. If this app is not the focus app , within 2 minutes the app will shut down even with the phone active.  Which is frustrating because it‚Äôs my go to app, especially for sleep. Have had to turn to other apps during this time.

developerResponse: {'id': 30629942, 'body': "Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry for the trouble with the app crashing. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com and we'd be happy to assist further.", 'modified': '2022-06-29T22:46:13Z'}

review: Every single meditation is locked behind a paywall. Absolutely vile marketing tactic. If you‚Äôre offering a subscription the least you can do is provide advertisements for the free plan, while granting access to a few meditation sequences. Additionally, the developers keep replying to negative reviews with generic responses such as ‚Äúwe have free content outside our app‚Äù. I installed the app in the first place so i could keep track of meditations before going to sleep, but i can‚Äôt even seem to do that since they‚Äôre locked behind a subscription.

Here I am looking for a way to fall asleep that I can no longer use. I would gladly watch 2-3 ads every time I use something like rainyday antiques instead of having to pay $13 a month to use ONE of the many things they offer. title: Nothing is free anymore

review: Download button is frustrating, it shows no indication of how much already is downloaded and when it will complete. Also I would like to download timers for 5 and 10 minutes, instead I have to download all of them, which takes a lot of space. Otherwise everything is fine
title: Nice, but need some UX improvements

review: It‚Äôs crazy how quickly you can achieve benefits from meditating. I‚Äôm on day 16 today and I‚Äôve loved ever day. The app itself does everything it‚Äôs supposed to and does it well and looks great at the same time. Never noticed a bug or had a crash. I don‚Äôt review apps often so it means something when I do.
title: Transformed!

review:
Started with their Netflix series and still return to those periodically. I subscribe to the mobile app.

I like the app content and variety, a little of it is from Netflix, but not much. On a few occasions content was not available, but again, only a few times and I‚Äôm a heavy user.

A good, stable app, looking forward to some enhancements and additions
title: Enjoying!

review: I participated in the pregnancy mediation course and admittedly, I wasn‚Äôt sure what benefits I would get from it. I ended up being able to tap into what I learned and keep focused and calm while getting an epidural in the middle of labor pains. I am a full believer in meditation after that experience. Thank you, Headspace.
title: Helped me focus when I needed it most

review: My daughter was having a few issues getting the family plan to work (user error on my part, I think) and within two hours at night after emailing them it was fixed! And they were so nice. Above and beyond my expectations.
title: The customer service is top notch

review: Sometimes I feel at night that I shouldn‚Äôt go to sleep and keeping using devices, I saw this app and wanted to try it out. I downloaded the app one night, and complete success! I put a rain soundscape on and I fell asleep in less then 2 minutes! Definitely recommend to Donald this fantastic app! üòÅüíï
title: 5 stars! Absolutely amazing!

review: This simple app has enabled me to let go of emotional baggage and identify my toxic traits that have been sabotaging my marriage and other relationships. I feel lighter, happier, and I‚Äôm able to witness myself living life, which then allows me to live in the moment and soak up every bit of positivity while letting the negative float on by.
title: This has changed my life!!!

review:
Andy is great. No bells and whistles just what you need. Definitely worth a try for anyone who is looking for an everyday guided meditation to help with mindfulness.

Disclaimer: Everyone is different and has different styles. I think headspace is great and could help a lot of people, but that doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs for everyone. Recommend just to try me see if it‚Äôs right for you.
title: Simple and powerful

review: Listening to Headspace has made a significant impact on my life.  The courses, wake-ups, sleepcasts, and mindful moments help me to start and end each day with a focused mind. I use the lessons throughout the day to stay more relaxed when issues arise. I have gifted it to friends and highly recommend it to anyone willing to use it wisely.
title: Amazing and life changing

review: I started using this app at least 6 years ago.  I now use it daily. I find that it helps me understand and cope with my everyday emotions as well as have better relationships with my friends and family. I also feel more productive because I am able to focus on one task at a time. This app has been life changing for me.
title: Life changing

review: Superlatives are wonderful, they all apply to Headspace. Andy and all of the team have changed the way I see this journey we are all on. I AM happy now for no other reason than I/we are meant to be happy. I AM able to choose happiness and I truly believe that this happiness is contagious with those around me/us. Thank you.
title: Freedom

review: I've been dealing with infertility and recently had a miscarriage and it feels horrible to have the Today feed recommend parenting videos to me every single day. There's no way to remove them, or opt out of topics that don't interest me. How ironic that the app that is supposed to help me with my mental health is pushing triggering content. I paid for an annual subscription and can't use the app anymore due to this issue. The whole UI is awful, it's really hard to find useful content. Shame on you, Headspace.
title: Can't customize Today feed that contains sensitive topics
developerResponse: {'id': 39348626, 'body': "We're so sorry to hear about your situation, and would love to make this right.  Please send our support team an email at:  Help@Headspace.com, and they will be happy to help you.", 'modified': '2023-10-06T00:11:44Z'}

review:
Terrible app for meditation. Too difficult to use off line. Too much chatter in the sessions I tried. Impossible to use if you have emf  sensitivity. Too obsessed with tracking.
Nobody can correctly tell you when to breathe in or out unless they are watching you and they know what to observe and how to interpret it.
There are other apps that describe how to breathe in and out, and then leave you the space to do it without continuing to confuse you with chatter.  
Now I will unsubscribe. Wasting my time was more annoying than wasting my money.
title: Clueless

title: Great app

review: Over the years I‚Äôve used Headspace, I‚Äôve watched the company grow and expand their offering to serve to a more inclusive population. title: Lifesaver!
